Question: rd aml
Answer: rd aml saarf kay antrfys ki tamyr kay liye ayk mshhawr jawa askrpt laibryry haay۔yha fys bk nay tyar kya tha aur mthark aur antrayktw ayply kyshnza bnanay kay liye wyb dawylpmnt main braay pymanay par astamal hawta haay۔rd aml sy dawylprza ko dwbarha kabl astamal UI ajzaaa tyar karnay ki ajazat mlty hay jo bnyady aadad wa shmar main tbdyly aatay wkt mwsar aur khud bkhwd ap dayt karty hayn۔ kuch klydy khsawsayat aur rd aml ki tsawrat main shaml hayn: ajzaaa: rd aml UI ko dwbarha astamal kay kabl aur madaywlr ajzaaa main mnzam krta haay۔ajzaaa aazaad bldangh blaks hain jo saarf kay antrfys kay ayk hasaay ki sakht ، tarza aml aur aslwb ko shaml karty hayn۔an ko ghhwnsla aur pychydha UI haaiyrarchyza bnanay kay liye tyar kya jaskta haay۔ wrchwil dawm: rd aml dawm (dstawyza aabjykt madal) ki wrchwil nmaindghy ka astamal krta hay jsay kaha jata haay۔

Question: rd aml kay ajzaaa kay tsawr aur saarf kay antrfys ki tamyr main un kay krdar ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml main ، ajzaaa saarf kay antrfys kay bldangh blaks hayn۔wha dwbarha prywst aur madaywlr kwda kay tkraay hain jo UI kay dahanchay ، tarza aml aur shylywn kay ayk hasaay ko shaml karty hayn۔rd aml kay ajzaaa aap ko saarf kay antrfys ko chhwtay ، kabl antzaam hasawn main twranay ki ajazat dytay hain ، js sy pychydha ayply kyshnza ko tyar karna aur brkrar rkhna aasan hawjata haay۔taham ، rd aml 16.8 ki rhaaiy kay bad sy ، fnkshnl ajzaaa (jsay "fnkshnl astyt lys ajzaaa" bhi kaha jata haay) haks kay taarf ki wjha sy lkhnay kay ajzaaa ka trjyhay tarykha bn gaya haay۔ yahan ajzaaa ki do aksam ka jaizaha: klas ajzaaa: klas: klas ajzaaa: klas ajzaaaajzaaa ko ES6 klaswn kay tawr par byan kya gaya hay jo bys ry aykt daat kam prwynt klas main twsya karty hayn۔an kay pas ayk ryndar tarykha hay jo jzaw ko lwtata hay

Question: rd aml kay jzaw aur un kay astamal kay laif saiykl tarykwn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml kay ajzaaa main zandghy kay kiy tarykay hain jo aap ko jzaw kay laif saiykl kay mkhtlf mrahal par aamal anjam denay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔yha tarykay jzaw ki tkhlyk ، ap dayt aur tbahay kay doran kwda ko amly jamha phananay kay liye haks mhaya karty hayn۔taham ، rd aml 16.8 main haks kay taarf kay sath ، laif saiykl tarykwn kay astamal ko jzawy tawr par ywzafykt aur dyghr haks nay tbdyl kya haay۔bhar haal ، klas ajzaaa kay sath kam karty wkt ya myrasay kwda bys sy nmtnay kay wkt laif saiykl kay tarykwn ko smjhna ab bhi mddghar saabt hawskta haay۔ klas ajzaaa main dstyab laif saiykl tarykwn ka ayk jaizaha haay: brahtay hawiay: tamyr knndha (): yeh pehla tarykha hay jab yeh pehla tarykha hay jab ayk msaal kay tawr par kaha jata haay۔

Question: rd aml main ryast kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh ajzaaa kay andr is ka antzaam kesay kya jata haay۔
Answer: rd aml main ، ryast ayk jawa askrpt aabjykt hay jo kesi jzaw kay dakhly aadad wa shmar ki nmaindghy krty haay۔as sy ajzaaa ko dayta astwr aur un ka nzam karnay ki ajazat mlty hay jo wkt kay sath sath tbdyl hawsktay hayn۔ryast rd aml main ayk klydy tsawr hay kywnkha yeh ajzaaa ko un kay dayta ko ap dayt krkay aur saarf antrfys ki dwbarha pysh ksh ko mthark karnay kay kabl bnata haay۔ astyt aam tawr par ywsstyt hak (fnkshnl ajzaaa kay liay) ya bazaria kesi jzaw kay andr ya is ka antzaam kya jata haay۔rd aml ko brahana aur is ko astamal krna۔ywsstyt hak ka astamal karty hoey ryast ka antzaam krna۔ywsstyt hak do anasar kay sath ayk saf lwtata haay: mwjwdha haalt

Answer: klydy shaara ayk khasa wsaf hay jo anasar ya ajzaaa ki fharst pysh karty wkt rd aml main astamal hawta haay۔as ki fharst main hr aaitm ko ayk anwkha shnakht knndha tfwyzu karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ klydy shaara denay ka mksad anasar ki mؤsar tarykay sy ap dayt aur dwbarha pysh karnay wali fharstwn ko mwsar andaza main rd aml zaahar karnay main mdd karna haay۔jb kesi fharst ki pysh ksh ki jati hay aur is ki ashyaa main ayk klydy shaara hawta hay tou ، rd aml hr shay ki shnakht par nzar rkhnay kay liye klydy kdr ka astamal krta haay۔as sy fharst main shaml ، hataiay janay waly ، ya dwbarha aardar shuda ashyaa ko mwsar andaza main shnakht krkay ap dayt ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ klydy shaara mndrjha zayl wjwhaat ki bnaa par aham haay: mwsar mfahamt: jab kesi fharst ko dwbarha pysh kya jata hay tou ، is bat ka tayn karnay ki zurwrt hay keh kon sy aaitmza kay pas haay۔tbdyl ya ap dayt karnay ki zurwrt haay۔klydy shaaray kay baghair ، rd aml ko prany fharst main shaml hr aaitm ka mwazanha tbdylywn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye niy fharst main hr aaitm sy karna hoga

Answer: rd aml ki janch main rd aml kay ajzaaa ki faalyt ، tarza aml aur drstghy ki tsadyk karna shaml hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh woh araday kay mtaabk kam kryn۔ry aykt ayply kyshnza kay mayar aur wshwsnyyta ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye mnasb janch zurwry haay۔rd aml kay ajzaaa ki janch kay l several kiy nktaha nzar mwjwd hayn: ywnt tystngh: ywnt tystngh main tnhaaiy main anfrady ajzaaa ki janch karna shaml hay ، js main faalyt kay sab sy chhwtay akaiywn par twjha mrkwza ki jati haay۔rd aml main ، is main aam tawr par un ki anhasaar ya mjmway drkhwast ki haalt par bhrwsha kyay baghair fnkshnl ajzaaa ya klas ajzaaa ki janch karna shaml haay۔aap ywnt tyst lkhnay kay liye tystngh laibryrywn jesay mzaak ، anzaaim ، ya rd aml tystngh laibryry ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ywnt tyst is bat ko ykyny bnatay hain keh hr jzaw tnhaaiy main sahayha tarykay sy kam krta hay aur kyraay ko jld pkranay main mdd krskta haay۔

Question: ry aykt haks tystngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur aap kis tarah kstm haks ki janch krsktay hayn۔
Answer: ry aykt haks tystngh main ry aykt haks kay tarza aml aur faalyt ki janch karna shaml hay ، jo aysay afaal hain jo aap ko fnkshnl ajzaaa main ryast aur dyghr rd aml ki khsawsayat ko astamal karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔haks ki janch karty wkt ، aap aam tawr par is bat ki tsadyk par twjha dytay hain keh hak twka kay mtaabk brtaؤ krta hay ، bshmwl is ki ryast ki tbdylywn ، zumny asarat ، aur dusray haks kay sath taaml bhi shaml haay۔ kstm haks ki janch kay l you ، aap un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: tystngh mahawlyat: shrwa kryn: shrwa kryn۔apnay rd aml kay ajzaaa aur haks kay liye janch ka mahawl mrtb krna۔aap tystngh laibryrywn jesay jyst ya ry aykt tystngh laibryry kay sath sath kesi bhi azuafy tystngh ywtylytyza ya frym wrk kay sath astamal krsktay hain js ko aap trjyha dytay hayn۔ kstm hak ko tyar kryn: apni kstm hak ko draamd karain js ki aap apni tyst fail main janchna chahti hayn۔ tyst jzaw bnaiyn: ayk tyst jzaw bnaiyn keh is tyst ka jzaw bnaiyn۔kstm hak astamal krta haay۔yha jzaw hak kay rypr kay tawr par kam kray ga ، js sy aap isy pysh krsktay hain aur hak ki waps shuda akdar tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hain ya is kay asarat ki janch krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main twsayk aur ajazat ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟
Answer: ry aykt ayply kyshnza main twsayk aur ajazat sy nmtnay main saarf ki twsayk ka antzaam ، rastwn ki hafazat ، aur kuch khsawsayat tak rsaiy ko kntrwl karna shaml haay۔

Question: rd aml main srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔ays ays aar kay fwaid kya hayn؟
Answer: rd aml main srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) sy mrad srwr par rd aml kay ajzaaa pysh karnay aur tyar krdha bhyjnay kay aml sy mrad hay

Question: ry aykt main kwda tksym karnay kay tsawr aur bndal saiza ko bhatr bnanay kay l its is kay fwaid ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: kwda aspltngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo rd aml (awr dusray jawa askrpt frym wrk) main astamal ki jati hay takha bndal jawa askrpt fail ko chhwtay "tkrawn" main tksym kya jaskay jsay daymanda par lwda kya jaskta haay۔kwda tksym karnay ka hadf abtdaiy bndal saiza ko kam karna aur lwdangh kay zaryaha karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana hay

Question: aap rd aml main farm ki twsayk ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟twsayk ki mkhtlf tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt main farm ki twsayk ko snbhalnay main saarf kay un pt ki twsayk karna shaml hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh farm jma krwanay sy pehlay yeh mkhsawsa mayar ya zurwryat ko pora krta haay۔rd aml main farm ki twsayk kay liye aap bohat sari tknykyn astamal krsktay hayn: blt un aych ty aym ayl twsayk safat: aych ty aym ayl kuch blt un twsayk safat fraham krta hay jo rd aml kay ajzaaa kay sath mil kar astamal kya jaskta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap farm fylda ko lazmi bnanay kay liye mtalwbha wsaf ka astamal krsktay hain ، ya un pt ki twsayk kay liye ayk mkhsawsa nmwnha ko nafza karnay kay liye pytrn wsaf ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ kndayshnl ryndarngh: aap twsayk ki haysayt ki bnyad par ghltay kay pyghamat ya astail ko mshrwta tawr par pysh krsktay hayn۔jb twsayk ki ghltay hawty hay tou ، aap ghltay kay pyghamat ki pysh ksh ko mthark karnay kay liye ryast ya jzaw ki prwp ko ap dayt krsktay hain ya ghalat fyldaza ki nshandhay karnay kay liye sy ays ays klaswn ka atalak krsktay hayn۔

Question: rd aml yaddasht kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh karkrdghy ko kis tarah bhatr bna sakta haay۔
Answer: ry aykt mymwizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mhanghay kmpywtyshn kay ntaij ya fnkshnl ajzaaa main pysh karnay kay kamwn kay ntaij ko bhatr bnanay kay liye karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔as ka mksad ajzaaa ki ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay ko rwkna hay aur rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki mjmway karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakta haay۔ jab ayk jzaw pysh krta hay tou ، rd aml niay prwps aur ryast kay sath mwazanha krta hay takha is bat ka tayn kya jaskay keh dwbarha pysh karnay wala zurwry hay ya nhayn۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، jab bhi is kay waldyn ko dwbarha pysh krta hay tou ، rd aml kesi jza ko dwbarha pysh kray ga ، chahaay jzaw kay prwps ya ryast main koi tbdyly nahin aai haay۔as sy ghair zurwry dwbarha kmpywtyshn aur dwbarha pysh karnay ka sbb bn sakta hay ، khasa tawr par pychydha ya kmpywtyshnl mhanghay ajzaaa kay liay۔ aar aay sy ty ayk mymw haair aardar jzaw (HOC) ya ayk rd aml fraham krta haay۔ fnkshnl ajzaaa ko lpytnay aur un kay ntaij ko yadghar bnanay kay liye mymw fnkshn۔jb kesi jzaw ko yad kya jata hay tou ، rd aml ka ayk atly mwazanha anjam dyta hay

Question: rd aml faibr kya haay؟as sy rd aml main ryndarngh kay aml ko kis tarah bhatr bnaya jata haay؟
Answer: ry aykt faibr rd aml mfahamt alghwrthm ki dakhly asalaha haay۔yha aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay aur alghwrthm ka ayk mjmwaha hay jo ryndarngh kay aml ko bhatr bnanay aur ryndarngh ki trjyhaat aur nzaam alawkat par bhatr kntrwl kay kabl bnanay kay liye ry aykt wrzen 16 main mtaarf kraya gaya haay۔ ry aykt faibr ka bnyady mksad yeh hay keh ryndarngh kay aml ko zayada mwsar ، zamha dar aur hayndalngh kay kabl bnaya jaiay۔mrkzay dhaghay ko msdwd kyay baghair pychydha saarf antrfys۔yha "faibr" kay nam sy ayk nya tsawr mtaarf krwa kar aur zayada lchkdar mfahamt alghwrthm ko nafza krkay is ko haasal krta haay۔ yahan rd aml faibr kay kuch aham phalw hain aur yeh kis tarah ryndarngh kay aml ko bhatr bnata haay: ankrymntl ryndarngh: ry aykt faibr pysh karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔"ryshwn" kay nam sy kam۔as sy ryndarngh kay aml ko rwknay ، trjyha denay aur zurwrt kay mtaabk dwbarha shrwa karnay kay kabl bnata hay ، bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krta hay aur tawyl arsaay sy msdwd karnay ki mdt sy ghryza krta haay۔

Question: aap srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshn main rwtngh ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟
Answer: srwr saiyda ryndarda (ays ays aar) main rwtngh ko snbhalnay main ry aykt ayply kyshn main klaint saiyda aur srwr saiyda rwtngh ko hum aahangh karna shaml hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh mtalwbha yw aar ayl ki bnyad par sahayha ajzaaa pysh kyay jaiyn۔ays ays aar ry aykt ayply kyshn main rwtngh ko snbhalnay kay liye yahan ayk amwmy nktaha nzar haay: syt ap

Question: saarf kay tjrbay kay l reac rd aml smwrty mwda aur is kay fwaid kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt smwrty wzua ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo ry aykt 18 main mtaarf krwaiy hogi hay js ka mksad ayply kyshnza ko zayada zamha dar bna kar aur saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bnana hay aur ryndarngh kay doran mrkzay dhaghay ko msdwd karnay sy ghryza karna haay۔yha ayk sy zayada kamwn par byk wkt kam karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jesay ryndarngh ، dayta bazayaft ، aur saarf ki bat chyt۔ yahan rd aml kay mwda kay kuch klydy phalw aur fwaid hayn: bhatr rdaml: hum aahanghy mwda chhwtay ywntwn main ryndarngh kay kam ko twranay ki ajazat dyta hay awrsaarf kay taaml ko trjyha dyn ، js kay ntyjay main zayada zamha dar saarf antrfys hawta haay۔yha tawyl kam kay kamwn ko dyghr aham karrwaiywn ko rwknay sy rwkta hay ، jesay saarf kay un pt ya mthark tsaawyr ko snbhalna۔ taim slaisngh:

Question: aap braay pymanay par rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main astyt mynjmnt ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟ryasty antzaamyha ki mkhtlf laibryrywn aur un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: braay pymanay par rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main ، ryast ka antzaam zayada pychydha hawjata hay ، aur mtadd ajzaaa main mstkl aur mwsar ryasty antzaam ko ykyny bnanay kay l often is kay liye aksar mrkzay nktaha nzar ki zurwrt hawty haay۔braay pymanay par rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main ryast ko snbhalnay kay liye ryasty antzaamyha ki mtadd laibryryan dstyab hayn۔yhaan kuch mkbwl akhtyarat hayn: rydaks: rydaks ry aykt mahawlyaty nzaam main sab sy zayada astamal hony wali astyt mynjmnt laibryrywn main sy ayk haay۔yha ghair mstkym dayta kay bhaaؤ ki pyrwy krta hay aur ayk wahad aalmy ryast kay drkht ka astamal krta haay۔ajzaaa afaal aur kam karnay walon kay zaryaha ryast kay sath taaml karty hayn۔rydaks ayk pysh ghwiy fraham krta hay

Question: sst lwdangh aur dayta bazayaft kay l reac rd aml ki mataly aur is kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt sspns ayk khsawsayt hay js main rd aml 16.6 main mtaarf kraya gaya hay jo ajzaaa ko kesi chyza ka antzaar karty hoey ryndarngh ko "matal" karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jesay sst bwjh waly ajzaaa ya dayta ki bazayaft ، mkml karnay ky۔yha ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ghair mtzalzal karrwaiywn ko snbhalnay ko aasan bnata haay۔yhaan rd aml ki mataly aur is kay astamal ki sst lwdangh aur dayta bazayaft kay astamal ki ayk wzuahat haay: sst lwdangh: sst lwdangh sy mrad ajzaaa ya wsail sirf is wkt zurwrt hawty hay jab un ki zurwrt ho ، blkha

Question: rd aml kay sath srwr lys ayply kyshnza kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔aap srwr lys plyt farmza main ry aykt ayply kyshnza ko kis tarah taynat karty hayn؟
Answer: srwr lys ayply kyshnza ، rd aml kay tnazar main ، un ayply kyshnza ka hawalha dyn jo srwr lys kmpywtngh plyt farm ka astamal karty hoey bnaiay gaye aur taynat hayn۔srwr lys fn tamyr main ، srwr saiyda anfrastrkchr aur antzaamyha ko khlasaha kya jata hay ، js sy dawylprza ko kwda aur amart ki ayply kyshnza par twjha mrkwza karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔

Question: aap rd aml main mthark tsaawyr ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟mkhtlf harkt pzayry laibryrywn aur nktaha nzar ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer:
rd aml main mthark tsaawyr ko hayndal karna mkhtlf laibryrywn aur tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔mthark rd aml kay ajzaaa kay liye kuch mshhawr akhtyarat yeh hayn: sy ays ays tranzayshn aur mthark tsaawyr: rd aml bnyady mthark tsaawyr kay liye sy ays ays tranzayshn aur mthark tsaawyr ka faidha atha sakta haay۔aap mntkly ya harkt pzayry ki khsawsayat kay sath sy ays ays klaswn ki wzuahat krsktay hain aur un lain astail ya sy ays ays madaywlza ka astamal karty hoey ajzaaa par rd aml zaahar karnay par un ka atalak krsktay hayn۔klaswn ko twghl karnay ya astail ki khsawsayat ko tbdyl krkay ، aap sadha mthark tsaawyr jesay dhndla pn ، slaiydangh ، ya askylngh asar pyda krsktay hayn۔ msaal kay tawr pr: jsxcopy kwdaympwrt ry aykt ، 'ry aykt' ؛ ampwrt 'say {usestate}const [isvisible ، setisvisible] = usestate (ghlta) ؛const togglevisibility = () => {setisvisible (! isvisible) ؛} ؛wapsy (
twghl
) ؛} ``

Question: rd aml ajzaaa ki tshkyl kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kwda kay dwbarha astamal ko kis tarah frwgh dyta haay۔
Answer: braay aur pychydha ajzaaa ya saarf kay antrfys ki tamyr kay l rea rd aml ajzaaa ki trkyb sy mrad mtadd chhwtay ajzaaa ko jwranay ki mshk haay۔as main ghhwnsla karna aur dwbarha astamal kay kabl ajzaaa ko shaml karna shaml hay takha aysay ajzaaa ka ayk drjha bndy pyda kya jaskay jo ayk mkhsawsa faalyt ya fychr ko pora karnay kay liye mil kar kam karty hayn۔ksy drkhwast kay hasaay۔ajzaaa ki tshkyl kwda kay dwbarha astamal ko kis tarah frwgh dyty hay is kay baray main kuch aham nkat yeh hayn: dwbarha astamal ki salahayt: UI ko chhwtay ، dwbarha astamal kay kabl ajzaaa main twra kar ، aap mkhsawsa afadyt ya bsary anasar ko alag thlgh aur ankpt krsktay hayn۔as kay bad yeh ajzaaa poray atalak main mtadd bar astamal kyay jasktay hain ، kwda ki nkl ko kam karty hain aur mstkl mzaajy ko frwgh dytay hayn۔ khdshat ko khtm krna: jzaw ki tshkyl aap ko mkhtlf khdshat ya zamha darywn ko alag alag ajzaaa main alag karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔har jzaw kesi khasa kam par twjha mrkwza krskta hay ، jesay fharst pysh karna ، saarf kay un pt ko snbhalna ، ya

Question: rd aml kay dayzaain kay nmwnay kya hayn؟ry aykt ayply kyshnza main aam tawr par astamal shuda dayzaain nmwnwn ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: rd aml kay dayzaain kay nmwnay aam msail kay kaim krdha aur dwbarha kabl astamal halwn ka hawalha dytay hain jn ka dawylprza ka samna karty wkt dawylprza ka samna karna prata haay۔yha nmwnay rd aml kay ajzaaa ki tshkyl aur un ko mnzam karnay ، ryast ka antzaam karnay ، dayta kay bhaaؤ ko snbhalnay ، aur mkhtlf khsawsayat ko nafza karnay kay liye rhanma khtawta aur bhatryn taryk kar mhaya karty hayn۔ry aykt ayply kyshnza main kuch aam tawr par astamal shuda dayzaain kay nmwnay yeh hayn: kntynr kay ajzaaa ka nmwnha: kntynr ajzaaa ka nmwnha (jsay asmart damym jzaw pytrn bhi kaha jata haay) ajzaaa ko do ksmwn main alag krta haay: kntynr kay ajzaaa aur pryzantyshnl ajzaaa۔kntynr kay ajzaaa ryast kay antzaam ، dayta lanay ya tghyrat ko snbhalnay aur byrwny khdmat kay sath bat chyt karnay kay liye zamha dar hayn۔pryzantyshnl ajzaaa UI anasar ko pysh karnay aur prwps kay zaryaha kntynr ajzaaa sy dayta wsawl karnay par twjha dytay hayn۔yha nmwnha ajzaaa ki dwbarha prywstyt aur khdshat ko alag karnay ko frwgh dyta haay۔

Question: rd aml main aap zumny asarat (jysay API kalza ya sbskrpshnza) ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟useefectect hak kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml main ، API kalza ، sbskrpshnza ، ya dawm hayra phyry jesay zumny asarat aam tawr par useefect hak ka astamal karty hoey snbhalay jatay hayn۔ywzafykt hak aap ko fnkshnl ajzaaa main zumny asarat anjam denay aur un kay laif saiykl ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔as ka ayk jaizaha yahan hay keh Useeffect hak ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: USEEFECT hak draamd kryn: JSXCOPY Codeimport rd aml ، {Useeffect} 'rd aml' sy ؛ zumny asar mntak ki wzuahat kryn: fnkshnl jzaw kay andr ، ywzafykt hak ka aalan karain aur kal byk fnkshn fraham karain js main mwjwd haay۔zumny asar mntak۔as kal byk fnkshn ko ajzaaa kay pysh aanay kay bad aml main laya jaye gha۔// anhasaar araypysyt anhasaar (akhtyary): yw ays ay ay ayfykt hak dusri dlyl kay tawr par akhtyary anhasaar srny la sakta haay۔yha

Question: rd aml ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ki tknyk kya hayn؟ryndarngh ko bhatr bnanay aur bndal kay saiza ko kam karnay kay tarykwn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ki tknyk ryndarngh ki rftar ko bhatr bnanay aur ry aykt ayply kyshnza kay bndal saiza ko kam karnay par mrkwza haay۔rd aml ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly tarykay yeh hayn: mymwaizayshn aur mymwizayshn laibryry: mymwaizayshn mhanghay fnkshn kalwn kay ntaij ko kych karnay aur un ko dwbarha astamal karnay ka aml hay jab un pt ayk jesay hi rahain ghay۔rd aml main ، aap faal ajzaaa ko yaddasht karnay aur ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon ko rwknay kay liye React.memo aaly aardar jzaw (HOC) ka astamal krsktay hayn۔mzayd braan ، ryslykt aur yw ays ay aym ay aym aw jesi laibryrywn ko yaddasht karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay

Question: aap rd aml kay ajzaaa ki janch ko kis tarah snbhaltay hain jo byrwny anhasaar ya API par anhasaar karty hayn؟
Answer: jab byrwny anhasaar ya APIs par anhasaar karty hain tou rd aml kay ajzaaa ki janch karty wkt ، yeh zurwry hay keh jza ko tyst kay that alag thlgh karain aur kabl aatmad aur mstkl tyst kay ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye byrwny anhasaar ka mzaak araaiyn۔as tarah kay mnzarnamwn main tystngh sy nmtnay kay liye kuch nktaha nzar yeh hayn: laibryrywn ya afaal ka mzaak araana: jyst ki blt un mzaak ki salahaytwn ya tesri party ki laibryrywn jesi mzaak karnay wali laibryrywn ka astamal kryn۔mzaak araanay sy aap ko API kalwn kay liye kstm rdaml ya tarza aml ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat mlty hay ، janch kay doran pysh kyasy ntaij ko ykyny bnatay hawiay۔as tarah ، aap asal byrwny anhasaar par anhasaar kyay baghair mkhtlf mnzarnamwn ، jesay kamyaby ، nakamy ، ya mkhsawsa knaray kay maamlat ki nkaly krsktay hayn۔ anhasaar anjykshn: anhasaar anjykshn ka astamal janch kay doran jzaw par byrwny anhasaar ya APIs kay mzaak wrzen fraham karnay kay liay۔an anhasaar kay frzuy aml ko anjykshn lghatay hoey ، aap un kay tarza aml aur rdaml ko kntrwl krsktay hayn۔yha nktaha nzar aap ko ajzaaa ko alag thlgh karnay aur mkhtlf mnzarnamwn main is ki faalyt ko janchnay ki ajazat dyta hay baghair asal API kal kyay ya hakyky byrwny anhasaar par anhasaar krta haay۔

Question: rd aml ki ghltay sy nmtnay kay tsawr aur ghltay ki hadwd kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml main ، ghltay sy nmtnay sy mrad ajzaaa ki pysh ksh ya laif saiykl tarykwn kay doran hony wali ghltaywn sy khwbsawrty sy nmtnay aur bazayaft kay aml sy mrad haay۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، jab kesi rd aml kay jzaw main ghltay hawty hay tou ، yeh jzaw kay ghair mnktaa hony ki taraf jata hay aur mmknha tawr par poray jzaw kay drkht ko mtasar krta haay۔ghltay ki hadwd rd aml kay ajzaaa hain jo apnay jzaw kay drkht main kahain bhi ghltaywn ko pkraty hain ، js sy aap pehlay sy taay shuda ghltay kay pyghamat ki bjaiay fal byk byk UIs ko snbhalnay aur zaahar karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔wha hafazaty jal ki haysayt sy kam karty hain ، ghltaywn kay phylaؤ ko rwktay hain aur ayply kyshn ko ryndarngh aur kam ko jary rkhnay kay kabl bnatay hayn۔ ghltay ki hadwd ko jzaw bnanay kay l you ، aap ayk aysay jzaw ki wzuahat karty hain jo rd aml daat kam ki klas main twsya krta hay aur ajzaaa daydakch laif saiykl kay tarykha kar ko nafza krta haay۔yha tarykha is wkt kaha jata hay jab ghltay ki had kay nechay jzaw kay drkht kay andr ghltay hawty haay۔ajzaaa dayda kych kay tarykha kar kay andr ، aap ghltay ko lagh un krkay ya is ko snbhal saktay hain

Question: rd aml syak wa sbak API kya haay؟ryasty antzaam kay l red yeh rydawks sy kesay mkhtlf haay؟
Answer: rd aml ka syak wa sbak API rd aml main ayk khsawsayt hay jo aap ko hr staha par wazuha tawr par prps pas kyay baghair jzaw kay drkht kay zaryaay ryast ko shyir karnay aur dayta ko mntkl karnay ki shawlt dyta haay۔yha aalmy ya mshtrkha ryast ko zayada mwsar aur jama andaza main snbhalnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: aap kesi rd aml ki ayply kyshn main srwr saiyda ryndarngh ko kis tarah snbhaltay hain js kay liye twsayk ki zurwrt hawty haay؟
Answer: jab kesi ry aykt ayply kyshn main srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) ko snbhaltay ho js main twsayk ki zurwrt hawty hay tou ، bohat sary nktaha nzar hain jn par aap ghwr krsktay hayn۔as main shaml akdamat ka ayk amwmy khakha yeh haay: twsayk ki hakmt amly ki nshandhay kryn: twsayk ki hakmt amly ka tayn karain jo aap apnay rd aml ki drkhwast kay liye astamal karna chahti hayn۔yha twkn par mbny twsayk (jysay ، jay dablyw ty) ، syshn par mbny twsayk ، ya tesri party ki twsayk fraham karnay wala (jysay ، awaawt) hawskta haay۔ srwr saiyda ki twsayk ko syt kryn: twsayk ki drkhwastwn aur msilay ko snbhalnay kay liye srwr saiyda ki twsayk ki mntak ko nafza kryn۔twsayk twkn ya syshn kwkyza۔as main aam tawr par saarf ki asnad ki twsayk karna ، twkn ya kwkyza tyar karna ، aur srwr par twsayk ki malwmat ko zakhyrha karna shaml hawta haay۔ tsadyk ki haalt ko klaint ko pas kryn: srwr saiyda ryndarngh kay doran ، twsayk ki haalt (jysay ، twsayk twkn ، saarf ki malwmat) pas kryn۔

Question: ry aykt mymw kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kis tarah fnkshnl ajzaaa ki pysh ksh ko bhatr bnata haay۔
Answer: ry aykt mymw ayk aaly aardar ka jzaw (HOC) hay jo ry aykt kay zaryaha fraham kya jata hay jo aap ko fnkshnl ajzaaa ki pysh ksh ko bhatr bnanay ki shawlt dyta haay۔as sy ajzaaa ko ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon ko rwknay main mdd mlty hay js main jzaw ko yad kar kay aur sirf is wkt ap dayt kya jata hay jab is ko mwsawl hawta haay۔ jab kesi jzaw ko ry aykt mymw sy lpyta jata hay tou ، rd aml kay ntyjay main pysh aanay walon kay mabyn prwps ka atly mwazanha anjam dyta haay۔aghr prwps ayk jesay hi rahain tou ، rd aml jzaw kay pehlay pysh krdha ntaij ko dwbarha astamal kray ga ، js sy poray ryndarngh kay aml ko chhwra diya jaye gha۔as sy karkrdghy ko bohat bhatr bnaya jaskta hay ، khasa tawr par aysay mnzarnamwn main jahan kesi jzaw kay shaaray shaza wa nadr hi tbdyl hawtay hayn۔ mymw ko rd aml astamal karnay kay l you ، aap apnay fnkshnl jzaw ko rd aml kay sath lpyt dytay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: JSXCOPY Codemport 'React' sy rd aml ka azahaar ؛ const mycompointent = react.memo (props => {// jzaw ryndarngh mntak yhaan}) ؛ braamd dayfalt mycompointe ؛ is msaal main ، mycomponent ko rd aml kay sath lpyt diya gaya haay۔asay bhatr bnanay kay l me yad rkhna chahaiay۔yadghar wrzen

Question: aap rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main safhaha bndy ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟safhaha bndy ki mkhtlf tknykwn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt ayply kyshnza main safhaha bndy ko snbhalnay main mwjwdha safhaay ki haalt aur hr safhaay ko zaahar karnay kay liye aaitmza ki tadad ka antzaam karna shaml haay۔yhaan safhaha bndy ki kuch aam tknykyn hayn: klaint saiyda pyghynyshn: klaint saiyda pyghynyshn main ، srwr sy tamam dayta laya jata hay ، aur safhaha bndy ko klaint ki taraf sy snbhala jata haay۔pwra dayta syt klaint par dstyab hay ، aur is ka sirf ayk hasaha ayk wkt main zaahar hawta haay۔safhaha bndy kay kntrwl ، jesay pchhlay aur aghlay btnwn ya safhaha nmbrwn ، saarfyn ko dayta kay zaryaay tshryf la janay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ klaint saiyda pyghynyshn ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap aam tawr par mwjwdha safhaha nmbr aur jzaw ki haalt main hr safhaay ki tadad ko astwr karain ghay۔jb dayta pysh karty ho

Question: mthark draamdat ka astamal karty hoey sst lwdangh aur kwda tksym karnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: mthark draamdat ka astamal karty hoey sst lwdangh aur kwda tksym karna ayk aysy tknyk hain jo kesi rd aml ki ayply kyshn main ajzaaa ki lwdangh aur ryndarngh ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jati hayn۔yha tknyk abtdaiy bndal kay saiza ko kam karnay aur kwda ko chhwtay hasawn main tksym krkay aur sirf jab zurwrt pranay par inhain lwda krkay karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krty haay۔ kwda tksym krna: kwda tksym karna aap kay ayply kyshn kay kwda bys ko chhwtay ، zayada kabl antzaam hasawn main twrana shaml haay۔as kay bjaiay poray ko bndal karnay ki

Question: skht rd aml ka mksad kya haay؟yha mmknha amwr ki nshandhay karnay main kis tarah mdd krta haay؟
Answer: ry aykt skht mwda ayk dawylpmnt mwda twl hay jo rd aml kay zaryaha fraham kya jata hay jo aap kay atalak kay kwda main mmknha msail aur aam ghltaywn ki nshandhay karnay main mdd krta haay۔as ka mksad pydawary mahawl main astamal kay liye nahin hay ، blkha trky kay doran aap kay kwda kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay kay ayk aalay kay tawr par haay۔ jab aap apni drkhwast ya is kay kesi khasa hasaay ko skht mwda main lpyttay hain tou ، rd aml azuafy chyk aur antbahaat anjam dyta hay jo mmknha amwr ko ajaghr krta haay۔yhaan rd aml skht wzua kay astamal kay kuch fwaid hayn: ghair mhafwza tarykwn ki nshandhay krna: skht mwda aap ko ghair mhafwza tarykwn ki shnakht aur mtnbha karnay main mdd krta hay jo aap ki drkhwast main pryshany ka sbb bn saktay hayn۔yha haadsaaty zumny asarat aur dyghr aam ghltaywn kay mmknha zaraia ka ptha lghata hay aur is ko lagh un krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par ، yeh khbrdar hoga keh agar aap kay pas un kay ryndar tarykwn main zumny asarat kay sath ajzaaa mwjwd hain ، jo ghair mtwka slwk ka baasa bn saktay hayn۔yha frswdha ya jld hi chyk krta hay

Question: aap rd aml main mtadd ajzaaa kay mabyn ryasty hum aahanghy ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟
Answer: rd aml main ، aap mkhtlf tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey mtadd ajzaaa kay mabyn ryasty hum aahanghy ko snbhal saktay hayn۔yhaan kuch aam tawr par astamal hony wali tknykyn hayn: lft astyt ap (waldyn aur bchwn ki bat chyt): agar aap kay pas waldyn ka koi jzaw hay jo bchwn kay mtadd ajzaaa pysh krta hay tou ، aap mshtrkha ryast ko kryb trien aam aabaؤ ajdad tak atha saktay hayn۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh mshtrkha ryast ka antzaam waldyn kay jzaw kay zaryaha kya jata hay ، aur yeh bchwn kay ajzaaa ko prwps kay tawr par mntkl krdyta haay۔jb kesi bchay kay jzaw ko mshtrkha ryast ko ap dayt karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay tou ، is ko waldyn kay jzaw ki taraf sy ayk prwp kay tawr par mnzawr krdha fnkshn kehty hayn۔ yeh nktaha nzar is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh ryast mtadd ajzaaa main hum aahangh rhaty hay kywnkha woh sab waldyn sy ayk hi tazaha trien ryast wsawl karty hayn۔: rd aml ka syak wa sbak aap ko tkhlyk karnay ki ajazat dyta hay

Question: srwr saiyda ryndarngh aur is kay fwaid kay sath rd aml sspns kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) kay sath rd aml sspns rd aml ki mataly ki twsya hay jo aap ko srwr ki taraf mtnazaaha dayta bazayaft aur pysh karnay ko snbhalnay ki shawlt dyta haay۔yha saarf ko jld sy jld mhaya krdha mwad ko dkha kar saarf kay ayk hamwar tjrbay ko kabl bnata hay ، yahan tak keh agar kuch dayta abhi bhi haasal kya jarhaa haay۔

Question: ry aykt prfarmns prwfailngh twlza kya hayn؟ry aykt ayply kyshnza main karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ki nshandhay karnay kay l tools twlza ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt prfarmns prwfailngh kay mtadd twlza mhaya karty hain jo karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ki nshandhay karnay aur rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ko bhatr bnanay main mdd karty hayn۔ry aykt ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko prwfailngh kay liye kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly twlza yeh hayn: ry aykt prwfailr: ry aykt prwfailr braؤzarza kay liye ry aykt dawylpr twlza ki twsya main dstyab ayk blt un twl haay۔yha aap ko apnay rd aml kay ajzaaa ki pysh ksh kay aml kay baray main karkrdghy ki malwmat par kbzuha aur tjzayha karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ry aykt prwfailr kay sath ، aap un ajzaaa ki nshandhay krsktay hain jo ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon ka sbb bn rahay hain ya ryndar main zayada wkt la rahay hain ، aap ko karkrdghy kay amkany amwr ki nshandhay karnay main mdd mlty haay۔، bshmwl rd aml ki drkhwastyn۔yha aap ko apni drkhwast ki karkrdghy ko rykarda karnay aur is ka tjzayha karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، js main ryndarngh ، askrptngh ، nyt wrkngh ، aur bohat kuch shaml haay۔aap jawa askrpt par aml draamd ki rkawtwn ، trtyb aur ryndarngh kay msail ، aur nyt wrk sy mtalk karkrdghy kay msail ki nshandhay karnay kay liye is twl ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ REACT Devetools prwfailr tyb: ry aykt dawylpr twlza main prwfailr tyb

Question: aap rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main fail ap lwda ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟mkhtlf nktaha nzar aur laibryrywn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt ayply kyshnza main fail ap lwda ko hayndal karna mkhtlf tarykwn aur laibryrywn ka astamal karty hoey haasal kya jaskta haay۔yhaan aam tawr par astamal hony waly kuch tarykay hayn: HTML fail un pt: sab sy bnyady nktaha nzar HTML <an pt taip = "fail"> ansar ko astamal karna haay۔as sy saarfyn ko apnay mkamy sstm sy failyn mntkhb karnay aur fail ap lwda kay aml ko mthark karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔aap apnay rd aml kay jzaw main aan chynj ya awnsmyt jesay jawa askrpt aywnt kay hayndalrza ka astamal karty hoey fail ka antkhab aur ap lwdak ko snbhal saktay hayn۔taham ، is nktaha nzar kay liye azuafy khsawsayat jesay fail ki twsayk ، pyshrft sy bakhbr rhanay ، aur ghltay sy nmtnay kay dsty aml draamd ki zurwrt haay۔ farm dayta API: farm dayta API fail ap lwdaza kay liye mlty part/farm dayta ki drkhwastwn ki tamyr aur bhyjnay ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krta haay۔aap ayk nya farm dayta aabjykt tshkyl dy saktay hain ، mntkhb krdha fail (zabanyn) ko is main shaml krsktay hain ، aur bazayaft ya ayksyws laibryry ka astamal karty hoey srwr ko dayta bhyj saktay hayn۔yha nktaha nzar aap ko ayk sy zayada failwn ko snbhalnay aur failwn kay sath azuafy farm dayta shaml karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ aar aay sy ty fail ap lwda laibryrywn: yahan tesri party kay kiy laibryryan hayn۔

Question: rd aml smwrty mwda kay tsawr aur saarf kay tjrbay aur rdaml par is kay asarat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt smwrty wzua ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo ry aykt 18 main mtaarf krwaiy hogi hay js ka mksad saarf kay tjrbay aur rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki rdaml ko bhatr bnana haay۔yha byk wkt mtadd kamwn par kam karnay kay kabl rdaml ko kabl bnata hay ، js sy bhatr nzaam alawkat aur kam ki trjyha ki ajazat mlty haay۔ rwayty rd aml pysh karnay main ، ryndarngh ka aml hum aahanghy aur msdwd haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh jab koi jzaw ki tazaha kary ya nya jzaw pysh kya jata hay tou ، rd aml ka azahaar jzaw kay drkht ko kar dyta hay aur ayk hi pas main poray drkht ko ap dayt krta haay۔as sy tawyl almyaad awkat ka sbb bn sakta hay aur ghair zamha dar saarf antrfys ka baasa bn sakta hay ، khasa tawr par jab pychydha ya braay ajzaaa sy nmtnay kay۔taim slaisngh ryndarngh kay kam ko chhwtay ywntwn main tksym krta hay jsay "taim slaisza" kehty hain aur un ko trjyhaat tfwyzu krty hayn۔as kay bad un trjyhaat ki bnyad par ryndarngh main khll daal sakta hay aur dwbarha shrwa krskta hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh aaly trjyhay kam

Question: rd aml ki ghltay ki had kya haay؟yha ghltaywn ko snbhalnay aur drkhwast kay kryshwn ko rwknay main kis tarah mdd krta haay؟
Answer: rd aml ki ghltay ki hadwd rd aml kay ajzaaa hain jo apnay bchwn kay ajzaaa kay pysh ksh ، laif saiykl tarykwn aur aywnt hayndalr kay doran jawa askrpt ki ghltaywn ko pkraty hayn۔wha ghltaywn ko snbhalnay aur fal byk UI ko khwbsawrty sy snbhalnay aur zaahar karnay sy rwknay main mdd karty hain jab un kay sab try kay andr koi ghltay waka hawty haay۔ pehlay sy taay shuda tawr par ، jab kesi rd aml kay jzaw main ghltay hawty hay tou ، yeh jzaw kay drkht ko phylata hay jab tak keh yeh upar ki staha kay jzaw tak nah phanch jaiay۔(aam tawr par jra ka jzaw)۔yha slwk saarf ko ghltay ka pygham krysh hony ya zaahar karnay ka baasa bn sakta haay۔ ayrr ki hadwd ayk khasa jzaw sab try main un ghltaywn ko rwknay aur un ko snbhalnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krty hayn۔wha ayk khasa jzaw kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey tshkyl dyiay gaye hain jsay ajzaaa dayda kych (klas ajzaaa myn) ya ajzaaa dayda kych laif saiykl hak (USEEFECT hak waly fnkshnl ajzaaa myn) kehty hayn۔jb ajzaaa kay bchwn main ghltay phynk di jati hay tou is tarykha kar ki drkhwast ki jati haay۔ ajzaaa daydaychch kay tarykha kar ko do pyramytrza mltay hayn: ghltay (ghltay (

Question: ajzaaa ki tshkyl kay l rea aykt ryndar prps aur un kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt ryndar prps ayk nmwnha hay jo rd aml main jzaw ki tshkyl kay liye astamal hawta hay jahan ayk jzaw kesi fnkshn ko ayk prwp kay tawr par kbwl krta hay aur zurwry aadad wa shmar aur faalyt kay sath kam krta haay۔yha nmwnha ajzaaa ko pychydha wrasat ya lpytnay waly ajzaaa ki zurwrt kay baghair kwda aur tarza aml ko bantnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ ryndar prps kay pychhay bnyady khyal yeh hay keh ayk jzaw ayk ryndar prwp ko bay nkab krta hay ، jo ayk aysa fnkshn hay jo kuch dlail lyta hay aur jay ays ayks ko lwtata hay jsay pysh kya jana chahaiay۔jzaw ryndar prwp fnkshn ko zurwry aadad wa shmar ya tarza aml fraham krta hay ، js sy astamal karnay waly jzaw ko ryndarngh lajk par kabw panay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ hr ayk msaal pysh karnay ki ayk msaal hay keh ryndar prwps kis tarah kam karty hayn: jsxcopy kwda // parentcompointe.jsimport 'React' ؛ klas pyrntkpynt twsyareact.component {reder () {const dayta = 'haylw ، dnya!' ؛wapsy (<div> <h1> waldyn ka jza < /h1> <chailda kampynt ryndarprwp = {dayta => <chailda ryndarprwp dayta = {dayta} />} />

Question: ry aykt haks kay kwaad aur bhatryn aml kya hayn؟aam ghltaywn aur un sy bchnay kay tarykwn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt haks main kwaad aur bhatryn tarykwn ka ayk syt hawta hay js ki pyrwy ki jany chahaiay takha mnasb astamal ko ykyny bnaya jaskay aur aam ghltaywn sy bcha jaskay۔ry aykt haks kay sath kam karnay kay liye yahan kuch asawl aur bhatryn aml hayn: sirf aaly drjay par kal haks: haks ko sirf fnkshnl jzaw ki aaly staha par ya dusray kstm haks kay andr blaya jana chahaiay۔lwps ، haalat ، ya ghhrylw afaal kay andr haks ko kal karnay sy ghryza karain ، kywnkha is sy ghair mtwka slwk ka sbb bn sakta haay۔ ayk hi trtyb main haks kal kryn: jab kesi jzaw kay andr ayk sy zayada haks astamal karty ho tou ، hr ryndar par inhain isi trtyb main kal karna ykyny bnaiyn۔yha ykyny bnata hay keh rd aml haks aur un ki mtalkha ryastwn kay mabyn mnasb ayswsy ayshn ko brkrar rkhta haay۔ fnkshnl ajzaaa main haks ka astamal kryn: haks sirf fnkshnl ajzaaa ya kstm haks main astamal hawsktay hayn۔wha klas ajzaaa main astamal nahin hawsktay hayn۔aghr aap ko kesi tabkay kay jzaw main ryast ya laif saiykl slwk astamal karnay ki zurwrt hay tou ، aap ko chahaiay

Question: aap rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main zamha dar dayzaain ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟jwabdha trtyb bnanay ki tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt ayply kyshnza main zamha dar dayzaain ko snbhalnay main trtyb aur UI kay ajzaaa ko mkhtlf askryn saiza aur aalat par dahalna shaml haay۔rd aml main jwabdha trtyb bnanay kay liye kuch tknyk yeh hayn: sy ays ays mydaya kay swalat: askryn kay saiza ki bnyad par mkhtlf shylywn ko laghw karnay kay liye sy ays ays mydaya kay swalat ka astamal kryn۔aap mkhsawsa bryk pwaints kay liye mkhtlf sy ays ays kwaad ki wzuahat krsktay hain aur is kay mtaabk trtyb ، fwnt kay saiza ، wkfha kary ، ya kesi aur bsary phalw ko aydajst krsktay hayn۔ jwaby UI laibryrywn: bwtstryp ، mady UI ، ya tyl wnda CSS jesay zamha dar UI laibryrywn ka astamal karain ، jo pry blt fraham karty hayn۔zamha dar ajzaaa aur la aaؤt sstm۔an laibryrywn main aksar blt un rdaml ki khsawsayat hawty hain ، jesay ghrda sstm ، zamha dar nwa taip ، aur jwabdha

Question: aap ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ryil taim apdayts ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟braha rast dayta ko snbhalnay ki tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ryil taim apdayts ko snbhalnay aur braha rast dayta ka antzaam karnay kay l you ، aap apni mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk mkhtlf tknykwn aur laibryrywn ko astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly nktaha nzar hayn: wyb sakt mwasalat: wyb skat klaint aur srwr kay mabyn do tarfha mwasalaty chynl fraham karty hain ، js sy ryil taim ap dayt bhyjnay aur mwsawl hony ki ajazat hawty haay۔aap wyb sakt laibryrywn jesay sakt.yw astamal krsktay hain

Question: klas ajzaaa sy zayada haks aur un kay fwaid kay sath rd aml fnkshnl ajzaaa kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: haks kay sath ry aykt fnkshnl ajzaaa rwayty tabkaty ajzaaa kay mkablay main rd aml main ajzaaa lkhnay kay liye ayk nya nktaha nzar hayn۔fnkshnl ajzaaa jawa askrpt kay afaal hain jo UI ki wzuahat kay liye JSX waps karty hayn۔haks aysay afaal hain jo astyt mynjmnt aur fnkshnl ajzaaa main azuafy khsawsayat ko ahal bnatay hayn۔

Question: rd aml ki rsai kay bhatryn aml kya hayn؟kabl rsaiy rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: kabl rsaiy ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki tamyr yeh ykyny bnanay kay liye bohat zurwry hay keh tamam saarfyn ، bshmwl mazawr afrad ، aap ki drkhwast tak rsaiy aur astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch rd aml kabl rsaiy bhatryn tarykwn aur tknyk hayn: symntk aych ty aym ayl ka astamal kryn: apni drkhwast ko bamksad dahanchha aur syak wa sbak fraham karnay kay liye symntk aych ty aym ayl anasar (<Heder> ، <vav> ، <myn> ، <sykshn> ، wghyrha) ka astamal kryn۔as sy maawn tyknalwjyza ko mwad ko smjhnay aur saarfyn kay liye nywyghyshn ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mlty haay۔ tsaawyr kay l alternative mtbadl mtn: tsaawyr kay liye wzuahaty ALT safat shaml karain takha mtbadl mtn fraham kya jaskay jo tsawyr kay mwad ko byan krta haay۔yha un saarfyn kay liye aham hay jo askryn kay kariyn par bhrwsha karty hain ya un ki tsaawyr ghair faal hawskty hayn۔ mynj fwks: is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh fwks mnasb tarykay sy hay

Question: srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main aap kwda tksym aur sst lwdangh ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟

Answer: ry aykt aabaiy main ، mthark tsaawyr aap ko mthark ajzaaa aur khsawsayat ko mthark krkay mthark aur antrayktw saarf antrfys bnanay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔mthark tsaawyr pwlsh ko shaml krskty hain aur aap kay mwbail ayp kay saarf kay tjrbay ko braha sakti hayn۔ry aykt aabaiy blt un harkt pzayry APIs mhaya krta hay ، aur harkt pzayry ki salahaytwn ko aasan bnanay aur brahanay kay liye bhi mshhawr harkt pzayry laibryryan dstyab hayn۔yhaan rd aml aabaiy mthark tsaawyr aur kuch aam tawr par astamal hony wali harkt pzayry laibryrywn kay tsawr ka ayk jaizaha haay: blt un anymyshn APIs: rd aml ka aabaiy blt un harkt pzayry APIs ka ayk syt fraham krta hay jo aap ko ajzaaa ki mkhtlf khsawsayat ko mthark karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔an APIs main mthark aur trtyb main shaml hayn۔an APIs kay zaryaha ، aap praprtyza ko mthark krsktay hain jesay dhndlapn ، pwzayshn ، pymanay aur ghrdsh۔blt un anymyshn APIs harkt pzayry ryast ka antzaam karnay kay liye mthark laibryry ka astamal karty hayn۔yha mthark tsaawyr ki wzuahat aur kntrwl kay l inter antrpwlyshn afaal aur tarykwn ka ayk wsya syt fraham krta haay۔aap mthark akdar ki wzuahat karnay aur jzaw ki khsawsayat ko mthark karnay kay l in un ko antrapwlyt karnay kay liye mthark۔ wylyw klas ka astamal krsktay hayn۔mthark laibryry tslsl ، mtwazay mthark tsaawyr ، aur asharay par mbny mthark tsaawyr bnanay ki bhi hamayt krty haay۔ REACT aabaiy dwbarha tyar krdha: rd aml aabaiy dwbarha mthark ayk laibryry hay js ka mksad ry aykt aabaiy main mthark tsaawyr ki karkrdghy aur lchk ko bhatr bnana haay۔yha pychydha mthark tsaawyr ki wzuahat kay liye ayk aalanyha API fraham krta hay

Question: aabaiy prfarmns prwfailngh twlza kya hayn؟rd aml aabaiy ayps main karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ki nshandhay karnay kay l tools twlza ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jab bat rd aml dysy ayply kyshnza main karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ki nshandhay karnay ki ho tou ، bohat sary twlza dstyab hain jo aap ko aap ki ayp ki karkrdghy ka tjzayha aur un ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly ry aykt aabaiy prfarmns prwfailngh twlza hayn: rd aml dysy karkrdghy ka manytr: ry aykt aabaiy karkrdghy ka manytr ayk blt un twl hay jo aap ko apnay ayp ki karkrdghy ko braha rast daywais ya aymwlytr par manytr karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha ayf py ays (frym fy syknda) ، jay ays (jawa askrpt) thryda astamal ، aur mymwry kay astamal kay baray main hakyky wkt ki malwmat fraham krta haay۔aap aalay ko hala kar ya iOS smylytr main "kmanda + D" shart kt ya ayndarwiyda aymwlytr main "CTRL + M" ka astamal krkay prfarmns manytr ko ahal bnasktay hayn۔

Question: rd aml dysy ayply kyshnza main aap dayta ki astkamt ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay ki tknyk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: rd aml dysy ayply kyshnza main ، aap mkhtlf tknykwn aur laibryrywn ka astamal krkay dayta ki astkamt ko snbhal saktay hayn۔ry aykt aabaiy main aadad wa shmar ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye yahan kuch aam nktaha nzar hayn: asyncstorage: asyncstorage ayk sadha klydy kdr ka zakhyrha karnay wala nzaam hay jo ry aykt aabaiy kay zaryaha fraham kya jata haay۔yha aap ko mstkl tawr par dayta ko mstkl tawr par astwr karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔aysnk astwryj ayk halka phlka aapshn hay jo saarf ki trjyhaat ya tsadyk kay twkn jesay kam mkdar main dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mwzawn haay۔aap Asyncstorage kay zaryaha fraham krdha syt aaitm ، ghyt aaitm ، aur hatanay waly aaitm kay tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey dayta ko astwr aur bazayaft krsktay hayn۔ askylait: ays kyw aylait ayk mshhawr rshtha dar dayta bys mynjmnt sstm hay jo laibryrywn kay zaryaha ry aykt aabaiy ayply kyshnza main astamal kya jaskta hay jesay ry aykt sy mtalk۔aabaiy asklait -2۔ays kyw aylait aysnk astwryj kay mkablay main dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay ka ayk zayada mnzam aur taaktwr tarykha fraham krta haay۔tm

Answer: ry aykt aabaiy main ryasty antzaamyha main poray ajzaaa kay drjha bndy main drkhwast kay dayta aur is ki tbdylywn ka antzaam karna shaml haay۔yha ykyny bnata hay keh ajzaaa mshtrkha dayta ko mwsar aur mstkl tawr par rsaiy aur ap dayt krsktay hayn۔ry aykt aabaiy ayply kyshnza kay liye ryasty antzaam kay mtadd hal dstyab hayn۔yhaan kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly afrad hayn: ry aykt aabaiy ki blt un astyt mynjmnt: ry aykt aabaiy apna ryasty antzaamyha ka nzaam fraham krta hay jesa keh ry aykt kay ywsstyt aur ywzar daysr haks ki tarah haay۔aap un haks ka astamal karty hoey mkamy ajzaaa ki haalt ka antzaam krsktay hain ، jo aap ko kesi jzaw kay andr dayta astwr aur ap dayt karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔yha ayk mrkzay astwr fn tamyr ki pyrwy krta hay jahan pori ayply kyshn astyt kesi ayk aalmy astwr main mhafwza haay۔ajzaaa slyktrza ka astamal krkay astwr kay dayta tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hain aur ryast ko ap dayt karnay kay liye aykshn bhyj saktay hayn۔rydawks ryast kay antzaam ka ayk pysh kyasy nmwnha fraham krta hay aur khdshat ki bhatr alyhadghy ko kabl bnata haay۔ aym aw by ayks: aym aw by ayks ayk aur astyt mynjmnt laibryry hay js ki twjha mrkwza haay۔
