) ؛} is msaal main ، ghnty ayk ryast mtghyr hay jo mwjwdha ko astwr krty haay۔kymt ki kymt.syt kaؤnt fnkshn kaؤnt astyt ko ap dayt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔jb "ankrymnt" kay btn par klk kya jata hay tou ، yeh ankrymnt fnkshn ko kal krta hay ، jo syt akaؤnt ko kal krkay 1 ki ghnty main azuafha krta haay۔ klas ajzaaa: klas ajzaaa is ko astamal krkay ryast ka antzaam karty hayn۔ryast ko ap dayt karnay kay l you ، aap React.com ajzaaa klas kay zaryaha fraham krdha syt astyt tarykha astamal karty hayn۔jb syt astyt ko kaha jata hay tou ، rd aml ko dwbarha pysh krta hay aur is kay bchay kay ajzaaa ko tazaha trien ryast kay sath pysh krta haay۔ klas kay jzaw main ryast ka antzaam karnay ka nmwnha: JSXCOPY kwdaympwrt ry aykt ، {ajzaaa 'say' rd aml '؛ klas maikmpyntynt jzaw {tamyraty (prps) main twsya krta haay۔{spr (prwps) ؛this.state = {ghnty: 0 ،} ؛} ankrymnt () {this.setState ({ghnty: this.state.Count + 1}) ؛} ryndar () {wapsy (

ghnty: {this.state.Count}

this.increment ()}> ankrymnt
) ؛} the is msaal main ، ghnty ki praprty jzaw ki haalt kay hasaay kay tawr par ajzaaa kay knstrktr main shrwa ki hogi haay۔ankrymnt ka tarykha niy ghnty ki kymt kay sath syt astyt ko kal krkay ryast ko ap dayt krta haay۔ is sy ktaa nzar keh aap fnkshnl ajzaaa main haks ka astamal karty hain ya klas ajzaaa main syt astyt ، rd aml is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh jab is main tbdyly aaty hay tou is jza ko tazaha trien haalt kay sath dwbarha pysh kya jata haay۔as sy UI ko jdyd trien aadad wa shmar ki akasy karnay aur ayk rd aml ka tjrbha fraham karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh ryast ko rd aml main ghair mnkwl smjha jana chahaiay۔ryast ko braha rast trmym karnay kay bjaiay ، aap ko ap dayts ki sahayha hayndalngh ko ykyny bnanay aur jab zurwry ho tou dwbarha pysh karnay ko mthark karnay kay liye fraham krdha astyt ap dayt kay afaal (syt kaؤnt ، syt astyt) ka astamal karna chahaiay۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo apni mrzuy kay mtaabk mntkly kay asarat kay sath tsaawyr ka slaida shw pysh krta haay۔
Answer:
rd aml main ، aadad wa shmar ko prwps ka astamal karty hoey waldyn aur bchwn kay ajzaaa kay mabyn mnzawr kya jaskta haay۔prwps (praprtyza kay liye mkhtsar) waldyn kay jzaw sy is kay bchay kay ajzaaa ko dayta mntkl karnay ka ayk tarykha kar haay۔ yahan aap waldyn kay jzaw sy dayta ko kesi bchay kay jzaw main mntkl krsktay hayn: waldyn kay jzaw: waldyn kay jzaw main ، aap bchay kay jzaw ki wzuahat karty hain awrprwps kay zaryaha zurwry dayta fraham kryn۔waldyn kay JSX mark ap kay andr bchwn kay ajzaaa main prwps shaml hayn۔ jsxcopy kwdaympwrt 'ry aykt' sy rd aml ka azahaar ؛waps ؛}} is msaal main ، pyrntkmpynt chailda kay ajzaaa ko pysh krta hay aur dayta ko namzad pygham kay tawr par mntkl krta haay۔aadad wa shmar ki kdr kesi bhi jawa askrpt wylyw hawskty hay ، jesay strngh ، aabjykt ، ya fnkshn۔ chailda jzaw: bchay kay jzaw main ، aap prps aabjykt kay zaryaay pas shuda dayta tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔prwps ko bchwn kay ajzaaa kay fnkshn kay dlail kay tawr par ya is ki khsawsayat kay tawr par mwsawl kya jata haay۔ is ki khsawsayat kay tawr pr۔> ؛} is msaal kay tawr par ، chailda kmpwynt prwps dlyl kay zaryaha pygham ka shaara haasal krta hay aur isy

ansar kay andr dkhata haay۔ prwps kay zaryaha dayta pas karnay kay bad ، waldyn ka jzaw apnay bchwn kay ajzaaa ko mthark dayta fraham krskta haay۔as kay bad bchwn kay ajzaaa dayta ko pysh karnay ya kesi aur zurwry karrwaiywn ko anjam denay kay liye mwsawlha shaaray astamal krsktay hayn۔mzayd braan ، agar waldyn kay ajzaaa ki haalt ya prps tbdyl hawjatay hain tou ، rd aml ka azahaar khud bkhwd niay aadad wa shmar kay sath bchwn kay jzaw ko ap dayt krta hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh UI hum aahangh rhaay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh prwps sirf bchwn kay jzaw main prahay jatay hayn۔an ko braha rast bchwn kay jzaw main tbdyl nahin kya jana chahaiay۔aghr aap ko dayta ko ap dayt karnay ki zurwrt hay tou ، aap ko waldyn kay jzaw main aysa karna chahaiay ، aur tbdylywn ko prwps kay zaryaay bchwn kay jzaw tak phylaya jaye gha۔yha rd aml main ghair mstkym dayta kay bhaaؤ ko ykyny bnata haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo darygh aybl ry rysaiza aybl ghrda la aaؤt ko zaahar krta haay۔
Answer:
ry aykt haks aysay afaal hain jo rd aml main faal ajzaaa ko azuafy salahaytyn mhaya karty hayn۔wha aap ko klas lkhay baghair ryast ، laif saiykl tarykwn aur dyghr rd aml ki khsawsayat ko astamal karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔haks ko rd aml 16.8 main mtaarf kraya gaya tha takha ryast kay antzaam aur jzaw ki mntak ko aasan bnaya jaskay۔ yahan kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly rd aml kay haks aur un kay mkasad hayn: USESTATE: USESTATE ayk hak hay jo ryast ko fnkshnl ajzaaa main shaml karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha do anasar kay sath ayk saf lwtata haay: mwjwdha ryast ki kymt aur is ryast ko ap dayt karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn۔yha fnkshnl ajzaaa ko apni apni haalt rkhnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ USESTATE kay msaal kay tawr par astamal: JSXCOPY CODEMPORT React ، 'React' sy 'react' ؛ fnkshn kaؤntr () cont const [Cont ، count ، setCount] = usestate (0) ؛kanst ankrymnt = () => {syt kaؤnt (ghnty + 1) ؛} ؛wapsy (

ghnty: {ghnty}

ankrymnt
) ؛} is msaal main ، ywsstyt hak ko ghnty shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔kaؤntr jzaw main ryast mtghyr۔ghnty mtghyr mwjwdha ghnty ki kymt ko brkrar rkhty hay ، aur syt kaؤnt ko ryast ko ap dayt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ useefefct: useefectect ayk hak hay jo fnkshnl ajzaaa main zumny asarat ko anjam denay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha aap ko ajzaaa laif saiykl wakaat ، jesay ajzaaa main brahtay hoey ، ap dayt karna ، aur ghair mnktaa karnay kay jwab main kwda chlanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔aap aadad wa shmar ki bazayaft ، sbskrpshnza ، ya kesi aur aml ko snbhalnay kay liye USEEFECT ka astamal krsktay hain js main safaiy ki zurwrt hawty hay ya jab kuch anhasaar tbdyl hawta hay tou is ki zurwrt hawty haay۔{Const [dayta ، syt dayta] = usestate (null) ؛useeffect (() => {// dayta ki bazayaft ki bazayaft ('https://api.example.com/data'). phir ((jwab) => rspans.jsn ()). phir ((dayta) =>syt dayta (dayta)) ؛ // klyn ap fnkshn (akhtyary) wapsy () => {// agar zurwry ho tou wsail ko saaf kryn} ؛} ، []) ؛// khaly anhasaar srny sirf ayk bar rytrn
{dayta ko chlanay kay liay؟

{dayta}

:

lwdangh ...

}
؛} is msaal main ، jab jzaw brahta hay tou kesi API sy dayta lanay kay liye useeffect hak astamal hawta haay۔safaiy ka fnkshn akhtyary hay aur jab jzaw ko ghair mnktaa kya jata hay tou kesi bhi zayr altwa drkhwastwn ko mnswkh karnay ya wsail ko saaf karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔khaly anhasaar srny [] is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh asar sirf ayk bar chlta hay ، klas ajzaaa main ajzaaa daydawmaؤnt ki tarha۔ useContext: USEContext ayk hak hay jo rd aml kay syak wa sbak ki kdr tak rsaiy kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha faal ajzaaa ko kesi syak wa sbak sy kesi syak wa sbak sy ghhwnsla karnay ki zurwrt kay baghair akdar ka astamal karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ USEContext kay msaal kay tawr par astamal: JSXCOPY Codeimport rd aml ، {USEContext} sy 'ry aykt' ؛ const thimecontext = react.createcontext ('rwshny') ؛ fnkshn fnkshn ؛thymdakmpynt () {Const thym = USEContext (ThemeContext) ؛rytrn
mwjwdha thym: {thym}
؛} is msaal main ، USEContext hak ko ankwnykst ki mwjwdha kymt tak rsaiy kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yha kryby thymkwntykst kay zaryaha mnzawr shuda kymt ko bazayaft krta haay۔ ajzaaa kay drkht ko tyar karnay waly jzaw۔ yeh aam tawr par astamal hony waly ry aykt haks ki sirf chnd msaalyn hayn۔ry aykt kiy dusray haks fraham krta hay jesay saarf ، astamal knndha ، astamal ki janay wali ، ywzaymymw ، aur bohat kchh۔haks aap ko ryasty mntak ko dwbarha astamal karnay ، ajzaaa laif saiykl wakaat ka antzaam karnay ، aur zayada jama aur bdyhay andaza main ry aykt ki khsawsayat kay sath mrbwta hony ki ajazat dytay hain ، js sy fnkshnl ajzaaa ko zayada sy zayada bnaya jata haay۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw lkhyn jo ryil taim mysjngh salahaytwn kay sath chyt antrfys pysh krta haay۔
Answer: wrchwil dawm (VDOM) ayk aysa tsawr hay jo saarf kay antrfys ko pysh karnay aur ap dayt karnay ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye rd aml main astamal hawta haay۔yha asaly dawm (asal HTML dstawyza ka dahanchha) ka khlasaha hay aur UI ki yaddasht ki nmaindghy kay tawr par rd aml kay zaryaha brkrar rakha jata haay۔asaly dawm ki halka phlka kapy۔yha ayk drkht ki tarah ka dahanchha hay jahan hr nwda kesi jzaw ya HTML ansar ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as main ajzaaa ، un kay prwps ، aur un ki mwjwdha haalt kay baray main tamam zurwry malwmat shaml hayn۔mfahamt kay doran ، ry aykt ryast ya prwp ki tbdylywn sy mtasarha ajzaaa ko dwbarha pysh krkay ayk nya wrchwil dawm try tshkyl dyta haay۔as kay bad is niay wrchwil dawm try ka mwazanha pchhlay wrchwil dawm try kay sath kya jata haay۔ REACT niay wrchwil dawm sy mlnay kay liye hakyky dawm ko ap dayt karnay kay liye drkar tbdylywn ki kam sy kam tadad ka mwsar andaza main taay karnay kay liye ayk mkhtlf alghwrthm ka astamal krta haay۔pwray asaly dawm ko ap dayt karnay kay bjaiay ، rd aml sirf un mkhsawsa hasawn ko ap dayt krta hay jo tbdyl hoey hayn۔as aml ko "daf" ya "mfahamt" kay tawr par jana jata hay aur yeh rd aml main ayk klydy asalaha haay۔yha sirf zurwry hasawn ko ap dayt krta hay ، jo braؤzar kay zaryaha anjam dyiay gaye hayra phyry aur ryflwza ki tadad ko kam sy kam krta haay۔as ki wjha sy pysh ksh ki karkrdghy main bhatry aaty hay ، khasa tawr par jab pychydha aur mthark UIS sy nmtnay kay liay۔ ryndarngh ki asalaha: wrchwil dawm dwbarha pysh karnay ko bhatr bnanay main bhi mdd krta haay۔rd aml pchhlay aur niay wrchwil dawm drkhtwn ka mwazanha krta hay aur is bat ka tayn krta hay keh asal main kon sy ajzaaa bdl chukay hayn۔yha ghair mtasarha ajzaaa ko dwbarha pysh karnay sy ghryza krta hay ، jo ghair zurwry ryndarngh ki karrwaiywn ko kam karnay main mdd krta hay aur mjmway karkrdghy ko bhatr bnata haay۔ aydayshnl tawr par ، rd aml "mfahamt ki haywrstks" kay nam sy ayk tsawr ko nafza krta hay jahan yeh jzaw ki trjyha ki bnyad par ap dayt kay aml ko trjyha dyta hay ، ajzaaa ki pysh ksh ko bhatr bnata haay۔as kay liye fwry twjha ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ rd aml main wrchwil dawm ki ahamyt is ki salahayt main hay jo hakyky dawm ki braha rast hayra phyry ko khlasaha karnay ki salahayt main haay۔wrchwil dawm ka astamal krkay ، rd aml sy sirf UI kay zurwry hasawn ko mؤsar tarykay sy ap dayt kya jaskta hay ، js sy dsty DOM hayra phyry sy wabstha karkrdghy kay awwr hayda ko kam kya jaskta haay۔as sy ayk zayada aalanyha prwghramngh madal mhaya karnay ki ajazat mlty hay ، jahan aap yeh byan karty hain keh ryast aur prwps par mbny UI ko kis tarah nzar aana chahaiay ، aur rd aml hakyky DOM ko mؤsar tarykay sy ap dayt karnay ka khyal rkhta haay۔wrchwil dawm ry aykt ayply kyshnza ko zayada prfarmns bnanay main mdd krta hay aur antrayktw aur mthark saarf antrfys ki tamyr kay liye ayk aasan prwghramngh madal fraham krta haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo apni mrzuy kay mtaabk shbyhayn aur antrayktw hawwr asarat kay sath drjha bndy ka nzaam dkhata haay۔
Answer: rd aml main ، aywnt sy hayndalngh rwayty jawa askrpt main wakaat ko snbhalnay kay mtradf hay lekin kuch msanway akhtlafat kay sath۔rd aml msanway wakaat ka astamal krta hay ، jo braؤzar kay aabaiy wakaat kay aas pas kras braؤzar kay mwafk rypr hayn۔ yahan aap rd aml kay ajzaaa main wakaat ko snbhal saktay hayn: aywnt hayndalngh nhaw: jay ays ayks main ، aap awnt ki bnyad par wakaha kay namwn ka astamal karty hoey anasar sy aywnt kay hayndalrza ko jwratay hain aur ayk fraham karty hayn۔aywnt hayndalr kay tawr par kam kryn۔fnkshn main ، aap mtalwbha tarza aml ya aamal ki wzuahat karty hain jab wakaha pysh aata haay۔ jay ays ayks main aywnt hayndalngh ka nmwnha: jay ays ayks kwpy kwdaympwrt 'ry aykt' sy rd aml ka azahaar karain ؛ fnkshn btn () {kwns hayndal klyk = () => {knswl.lwgh('btn par klk kya!') ؛} ؛<< btn onclick = {hayndal klyk}> mujhey klk karain </button> ؛} is msaal main ، jab btn par klk kya jata hay tou hayndal klyk fnkshn kesi pygham ko lagh un karnay kay liye byan kya jata haay۔aan klyk aywnt hayndalr btn ansar kay sath mnslk hay aur hayndal klyk fnkshn ka hawalha dyta haay۔ aywnt ki khsawsayat ki tkmyl: rd aml kay msanway wakaat main wahi khsawsayat aur tarykay hain jo mkamy wakaat ki tarah hayn۔aywnt kay pyramytr ko aywnt kay hayndalr fnkshn main mntkl karnay waly aywnt kay pyramytr ka astamal karty hoey ، aywnt kay pyramytr ka astamal karty hoey aywnt ki khsawsayat tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔(wakaha) => {knswl.lagh ('an pt wylyw:' ، aywnt.tarjt۔ wylyw) ؛} ؛waps <an pt taip = "tykst" aan chynj = {hayndal chynj} /> ؛} is msaal main ، jab un pt ki kymt main tbdyly aaty hay tou hayndal chynj fnkshn un pt wylyw ko lagh un krta haay۔aywnt.tarjt۔ wylyw azahaar un pt ansar ki kdr ko bazayaft krta haay۔ hayndalngh farm ki ghzaarshat: jab farm ki ghzaarshat ko snbhaltay ho tou ، aap farm jma kranay kay wakaay par kbzuha karnay aur pehlay sy taay shuda braؤzar kay tarza aml ko rwknay kay liye <farm> ansar par awnsmyt aywnt hayndalr ka astamal krsktay hain ،jysay pyj rylwda۔ hayndalngh farm jma kranay ka nmwnha: JSXCOPY kwdaympwrt 'ry aykt' sy rd aml ka azahaar ؛ fnkshn farm () {CUNST hayndalyswbyt = (wakaha) => {aywnt.prywynt dayfalt () ؛knswl.lagh ('farm pysh kya ghya!') ؛} ؛wapsy (<farm onsubmit = {handlesubmit}> <an pt ki ksm = "mtn"/> <btn ki ksm = "jma kryn"> jma karain </btn> </form>) ؛} is msaal main ، hayndalyswbyt fnkshn ko blaya jata hay jbfarm jma kraya gaya haay۔aywnt۔ prwynt dayfalt () pehlay sy taay shuda farm jma kranay kay rwyay ko rwkta hay ، js sy aap ko jma kranay ko prwghram kay lhaaza sy snbhalnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ REACT mkhtlf taamlat kay liye msanway wakaat fraham krta hay jesay klk ، tbdyly ، jma krwanay ، maؤs awwr wghyrha۔ aap aywnt kay kesi bhi JSX ansar sy mnslk krsktay hain awrjb wakaha pysh aata hay tou mtalwbha slwk ki wzuahat kryn۔rd aml main wakaha sy nmtnay sy ayk aalanyha nktaha nzar ki pyrwy hawty hay ، js sy aap saarf ki bat chyt ki bnyad par mtalwbha akdamat ki wzuahat krsktay hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo mntkhb shuda tarykhwn aur hasb zurwrt tarykh kay farmyts kay sath tarykh chnnay waly ko pysh krta haay۔
Answer: klydy shaara ayk khasa wsaf hay jo anasar ya ajzaaa ki fharst pysh karty wkt rd aml main astamal hawta haay۔as ki fharst main hr aaitm ko ayk anwkha shnakht knndha tfwyzu karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ klydy shaara denay ka mksad anasar ki mؤsar tarykay sy ap dayt aur dwbarha pysh karnay wali fharstwn ko mwsar andaza main rd aml zaahar karnay main mdd karna haay۔jb kesi fharst ki pysh ksh ki jati hay aur is ki ashyaa main ayk klydy shaara hawta hay tou ، rd aml hr shay ki shnakht par nzar rkhnay kay liye klydy kdr ka astamal krta haay۔as sy fharst main shaml ، hataiay janay waly ، ya dwbarha aardar shuda ashyaa ko mwsar andaza main shnakht krkay ap dayt ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ klydy shaara mndrjha zayl wjwhaat ki bnaa par aham haay: mwsar mfahamt: jab kesi fharst ko dwbarha pysh kya jata hay tou ، is bat ka tayn karnay ki zurwrt hay keh kon sy aaitmza kay pas haay۔tbdyl ya ap dayt karnay ki zurwrt haay۔klydy shaara kay baghair ، rd aml ko prany fharst main shaml hr aaitm ka mwazanha tbdylywn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye niy fharst main hr aaitm sy karna hawgha۔yha ghair mwsar hawskta hay ، khasa tawr par bray fharstwn kay l .۔ hr shay ko ayk anwkha klydy shaara fraham karnay kay bad ، rd aml un ashyaa ki jld shnakht krskta hay jo shaml ، hataiay gaye ، ya dwbarha aardar kyay gaye hayn۔yha aaitm ki shnakht ko tryk karnay kay liye klydy akdar ka astamal krta hay ، js sy mfahamt kay aml ko zayada mwsar bnaya jata haay۔ ansar ka dwbarha astamal: rd aml fharst main mwjwd anasar ki shnakht ko tryk karnay kay liye klydy shaara astamal krta haay۔as sy mwjwdha DOM anasar ko dwbarha astamal karnay main mdd mlty hay jab mmkn ho tou shrwa sy niay anasar bnanay ki bjaiay۔ jab kesi shay ki klyd dwbarha pysh karnay walon kay mabyn ayk jesi rhaty hay tou ، rd aml isy ayk hi shay ki tarah phachanta hay aur isi tarah kay DOM ansar ko dwbarha bnanay ki zurwrt kay baghair is kay mwad ko mwsar andaza main ap dayt krskta haay۔as asalaha sy mtalwbha dawm hayra phyry ki mkdar ko kam krkay karkrdghy main bhatry aaty haay۔aghr aaitmza ki klydy akdar dwbarha pysh karnay walon kay mabyn tbdyl hawjaty hain tou ، rd aml un ko mkml tawr par niy ashyaa kay tawr par brtaؤ kray ga aur prany aham akdar sy wabstha pchhlay ajzaaa ko un kay maؤnt kray gha۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh jzaw ki haalt mnasb tarykay sy dwbarha trtyb di hogi hay aur mmknha ghltaywn ya ghair mtwka rwyay sy prhayza krty haay۔ yeh bat aham hay keh klydy shaara is fharst kay dairha kar main mnfrd hona chahaiay jahan isy astamal kya jata haay۔yha aam tawr par hr aaitm sy wabstha ayk msthakm aur anwkha shnakht knndha hona chahaiay ، jesay dayta swrs sy aai day۔klydy kdr kay tawr par andayks ka astamal aam tawr par hawsalha shkny ki jati hay ، kywnkha jab aaitmza ko shaml ، hata diya jata hay ، ya dwbarha aardar diya jata hay tou is sy mtalkha amwr ka baasa bn saktay hayn۔karkrdghy aur jzaw ki shnakht aur ryasty antzaam kay sath amkany amwr sy ghryza krna۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw lkhyn jo hasb zurwrt mwad aur mthark tsaawyr kay sath jwabdha mwdal daaiylagh dkhata haay۔
Answer:
fnkshnl ajzaaa: fnkshnl ajzaaa jawa askrpt kay afaal hawtay hain jo jzaw kay UI ki wzuahat kay liye jay ays ayks (jawa askrpt XML) waps karty hayn۔ woh klas ajzaaa kay mkablay main prahnay lkhna aasan aur aasan hayn۔ fnkshnl ajzaaa ki apni andrwny haalt nahin haay۔rd aml 16.8 sy pehlay ، fnkshnl ajzaaa astyt kay antzaam kay liye rydawks jesay byrwny ryast kay antzaam kay hal par anhasaar karty thay۔ rd aml 16.8 main ry aykt haks kay taarf kay sath ، fnkshnl ajzaaa ab ryast aur dyghr rd aml ki khsawsayat ka astamal krsktay hain jesay haks ، yw ays ay ay ay ayf ay sy ty tykst ka astamal karty hayn۔؛.wha ryndar () tarykha kar main jzaw kay UI ki wzuahat karty hain ، jo jsx.class kay ajzaaa ko waps krta hay un ki apni dakhly haalt rd aml kay zaryaha hawskty haay۔as ko astamal karty hoey ryast ko ap dayt kya jaskta haay۔wakaat ko snbhalnay kay liye kstm tarykay ، hasab ktab karnay ، ya dyghr jzaw sy mtalk mkhsawsa faalyt۔ klas ajzaaa aam tawr par astamal kyay jatay hain jab aap ko zayada pychydha ryast kay antzaam ، laif saiykl tarykwn ، ya is tnazar tak rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ klas jzaw ka nmwnha: JSXCOPY kwdaympwrt rd aml ، {ajzaaa ، {ajzaaa'' rd aml 'say ؛ klas klaskmpynt jzaw {knstrktr (prwps) {spr (prwps) main twsya krta haay۔this.state = {ghnty: 0} ؛} ankrymnt kaؤnt () {this.setState ((prevestate) => ({ghnty: previstate.Count + 1})) ؛} ryndar () {wapsy (

ghnty: {this.state.Count}

this.incrementCount ()}> ankrymnt
) ؛}} khlasaha yeh keh ، fnkshnl ajzaaa aasan hain aur prwps par mbny UI ko pysh karnay par mrkwza hain ، jabky klas kay ajzaaa dakhly ryast kay antzaam aur laif saiykl tarykwn jesay mazeed jdyd khsawsayat pysh karty hayn۔ry aykt haks kay taarf kay sath ، fnkshnl ajzaaa ab ryast aur dyghr rd aml ki khsawsayat ko snbhal saktay hain jo pehlay klas kay ajzaaa kay liye khsawsay thay ، jo tamyraty ajzaaa kay l a zayada jama aur lchkdar nktaha nzar fraham karty hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo darygh aur darap spwrt kay sath fail ap lwdaza kay liye pyshrft kay asharay ko pysh krta haay۔
Answer: rd aml main ، hayndalngh farm main farm un pt akdar ka antzaam karna aur saarf kay un pt wakaat ko ghrft main lana shaml haay۔aam tawr par astamal hony wala nktaha nzar kntrwl shuda ajzaaa ka astamal krkay haay۔ kntrwl ajzaaa farm aysay anasar hawtay hain jn ki akdar ko ryast kay zaryaay rd aml kay zaryaha kntrwl kya jata haay۔farm dayta ko snbhalnay kay liye mkml tawr par dawm par anhasaar karnay kay bjaiay ، kntrwl shuda ajzaaa farm kay aadad wa shmar ko jzaw ki haalt main rkhtay hain aur isy aywnt hayndalrza kay zaryaha ap dayt karty hayn۔ yahan par kabw panay waly ajzaaa ko farmwn ko snbhalnay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jata haay: farm ki haalt ko shrwa krna: farm ki shrwaat krkay shrwa krynjzaw kay knstrktr main ya usestate hak ka astamal karty hoey byan kryn۔har un pt ansar js par kabw panay ki zurwrt hawty hay is ki ayk hi ryast ki kymt honi chahaiay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: JSXCOPY Codeimport React ، {USESTATE} sy 'ry aykt' ؛ fnkshn maiy farm () {Const [nam ، syt nam] = usestate ('') ؛kanst [ay myl ، syt myl] = usestate ('') ؛// aywnt kay hayndalrza ko hayndalynymychynj = (wakaha) => {syt nam (aywnt.tarjt.Value) ؛} ؛kwnt hayndal myl chynj = (wakaha) => {setemail (aywnt.tarjt.alyw) ؛} ؛// farm jma kranay waly hayndalr ko hayndalyswbyt = (wakaha) => {aywnt.prywynt dayfalt () ؛knswl.lagh ('nam:' ، nam) ؛knswl.lagh ('ay myl:' ، ay myl) ؛// farm jma kranay ki mntak prfarm karain ...} ؛wapsy (<farm onsubmit = {handlesubmit}> <lybl> nam: <an pt ki ksm = "mtn" wylyw = {nam} aan chynj = {hayndalynym chynj} /> < /lybl> <lybl> ay myl: <an pt ki ksm = "ay myl"wylyw = {ay myl} onChange = {hayndal myl chynj}/> </lybl> <btn ki ksm = "jma kryn"> jma karain </btn> </form>)} pabnd un pt wylywza: hr un pt ansar mtalkha ryast ki kymt sy wabstha haaywylyw prwp kay zaryaay۔yha ykyny bnata hay keh un pt ki zaahar krdha kymt mwjwdha ryast ki kymt ki akasy krty haay۔aan chynj aywnt hayndalr jab bhi un pt tbdyl hawta hay tou ryast ki kymt ko ap dayt karnay kay liye zamha dar haay۔as sy aap ko prwghram ko prwghram kay zaryaha prwghram pysh karnay ki shawlt mlty hay ، jesay un pt ki twsayk karna ، AJAX drkhwast ko anjam dena ، ya ayply kyshn astyt ko ap dayt krna۔ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hayndalyswbmyt fnkshn farm dayta ko lagh un krta hay aur pehlay sy taay shuda farm jma kranay kay rwyay ko rwkta haay۔ajzaaa ، rd aml ka farm dayta par mkml kntrwl rkhta hay ، js sy jma kranay sy pehlay is ki twsayk aur hayra phyry karna aasan hawjata haay۔yha farm astyt mynjmnt kay liye schaiy ka ayk wahad zaryaha bhi fraham krta hay ، js sy aap jzaw ki haalt kay zaryaay farm ki akdar tak rsaiy aur trmym krsktay hayn۔kntrwl shuda ajzaaa UI aur jzaw kay mabyn ayk pysh ghwiy aur mtaabkt pzayr haalt ko brkrar rkhnay main mdd karty hain ، js sy rd aml ko zayada kabl antzaam aur mzubwta rdaml main hayndalngh bnata haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo lamhadwd skrwlngh faalyt kay sath aaitmza ki ayk askrwl kabl fharst dkhata haay۔
Answer:
rd aml main mshrwta pysh ksh sy mrad kuch shraita ya akdar ki bnyad par mkhtlf ajzaaa ya anasar ko pysh karnay ki mshk haay۔as sy aap ko drkhwast ، saarf kay un pt ، ya kesi dusray mayar ki bnyad par UI main jo kuch zaahar kya jata hay is par kabw panay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ yahan rd aml main mshrwta pysh ksh ki tknyk ki kuch msaalyn hayn: aghr/dyghr byanat kay sath mshrwta pysh ksh: aap rwayty astamal krsktay hayn۔jawa askrpt agar /dyghr byanat ajzaaa kay ryndar kay tarykha kar main mshrwta tawr par mkhtlf ajzaaa ya anasar ko pysh karty hayn۔ msaal kay tawr pr: jsxcopy kwdaympwrt 'rd aml' sy rd aml ka azahaar karain ؛ fnkshn maikmpynt ({aslwjdayn}) {aghr (aslwjdayn) {wapsy ؛} dusri {wapsy ؛}} is msaal main ، aslwghdayn prwp yeh taay krta hay keh saarf daysh bwrda kay jzaw ya lagh anfarm jzaw ko pysh karna haay۔kndayshn.ayks nmwnha: JSXCOPY kwdaympwrt 'rd aml' sy rd aml ka azahaar ؛ fnkshn maikmpynt ({isadmin}) {wapsy (

khwsh aamdyd {isadmin؟>}

) ؛} is msaal main ، asadamyn prwp ko mshrwta tawr par ayk khwsh aaind pygham aur aydamnyl jzaw pysh karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ajzaaa ya ansar agar kesi khasa haalt ko pora kya gaya haay۔mwad ko zaahar karnay kay liay۔aap is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye swich astytmnt ka astamal krsktay hain keh kon sa jzaw ya ansar pysh karna haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: jsxcopy kwdaympwrt 'ry aykt' sy rd aml ka azahaar karain ؛ fnkshn maikmpynt ({saarf taip}) {swich (ywzar taip) {kys 'aydamn': wapsy ؛kys 'saarf': waps ؛phalay sy taay shdha: waps ؛}} is msaal main ، ywzar taip prwp ka astamal is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye kya jata hay keh mkhtlf maamlat ki bnyad par kon sa jzaw pysh karna haay۔ kndayshnl ryndarngh aap ko rd aml main mthark aur antrayktw saarf antrfys bnanay ki ajazat dyty haay۔shraita ya akdar ka jaizaha lenay sy ، aap drkhwast ya saarf ki bat chyt ki haalt par mbny UI ka tjrbha fraham karnay kay liye mkhtlf ajzaaa ya anasar ko pysh krsktay hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw lkhyn jo nystda sbyns kay sath twt janay wali saidabar mynw ko pysh krta haay۔
Answer: rd aml ka syak wa sbak ayk khsawsayt hay jo aap ko ajzaaa kay mabyn aadad wa shmar ko shyir karnay ki shawlt dyta hay js main ajzaaa kay drkht ki hr staha par prps kay zaryaay wazuha tawr par dayta pas kyay baghair ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta shyir kya jaskta haay۔yha jzaw kay drjha bndy kay nechay aadad wa shmar ko phylanay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta hay ، js sy yeh kesi bhi jzaw tak kabl rsaiy hawta hay jo isy astamal karna chahta haay۔ rd aml kay syak wa sbak sy mtalk klydy tsawrat yeh hayn: syak wa sbak fraham karnay wala ayk jzaw hay jo jzaw kay drkht ka hasaha lpytta haayjhaan dayta dstyab haay۔yha is kay nechay mwjwd tamam ajzaaa ko aadad wa shmar fraham krta hay ، js sy woh syak wa sbak tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔ msaal kay tawr pr: JSXCOPY Codeimport React ، {CreateContext ، USESTATE 'say' ry aykt '؛kanst [dayta ، syt dayta] = usestate ('haylw ، dnya!') ؛wapsy (<myContext.provider kdr = {dayta}> <ajzaaa /> </mycontext.provider>) ؛} is msaal main ، ayp ka jzaw syak wa sbak fraham karnay waly kay tawr par kam krta haay۔yha is kay andr pysh krdha ajzaaa ko kdr (dayta) mhaya krta haay۔ syak wa sbak: aysay ajzaaa jn ko syak wa sbak tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay is ko USEContext hak ka astamal karty hoey ya saarf kay ajzaaa kay sath jzaw ko lpyt kar astamal krsktay hayn۔، {USEContext} sy 'ry aykt' ؛ fnkshn ajzaaa () {kwnt dayta = usecontext (myContext) ؛<ajzaaa by dayta = {dayta} /> ؛}}} is msaal main ، ajzaaa saarf kay jzaw ka astamal karty hoey aadad wa shmar ko ajzaaa kay tawr par astamal krta haay۔() {wapsy (<myContext.consumer> {(dayta) => <ajzaaa by dayta = {dayta} />} </mycontext.consumer>))}}} is msaal main ، ajzaaa syak wa sbak kay aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy kay liye saarf kay jzaw ka astamal krta haayawr isy ajzaaa kay shaaray kay tawr par pas kryn۔ REACT syak wa sbak aap ko ayk mrkzay dayta astwr bnanay ki ajazat dyta hay js ko mtadd ajzaaa tak rsaiy haasal ki jaskty hay baghair prwp darlngh ki zurwrt kay۔yha jzaw mwasalat ko aasan bnata hay ، khasa tawr par jab ghhwnsla ki mtadd stahayn shaml hawn۔taham ، yeh zurwry hay keh syak wa sbak ko ansaaf kay sath astamal karain aur dayta shyirngh kay tamam mnzarnamwn kay liye is par zurwrt sy zayada anhasaar sy bchyn۔yha aalmy aadad wa shmar ، thym ki trtybat ، ya dyghr ayply kyshn wsya ryast ko shyir karnay kay liye bhatryn mwzawn hay js ko poray jzaw kay drkht main mtadd ajzaaa kay zaryaha rsaiy haasal karnay ki zurwrt haay۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo hasb zurwrt lybl aur shylywn kay sath twghl swich dkhata haay۔
Answer:
rd aml main ، dayta bazayaft karnay aur API kal karnay kay l several kiy nktaha nzar mwjwd hayn۔yhaan kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly tarykay hayn: bazayaft API: bazayaft API ayk blt main jawa askrpt API hay jo aap ko HTTP drkhwastyn karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha ayk wadha lwtata hay jo srwr kay rdaml ko hal krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: jsxcopy kwdaympwrt ry aykt ، {useefect ، usestate} sy 'ry aykt' sy ؛ fnkshn maikmpynt () {kwnst [dayta ، syt dayta] = usestate ([]) ؛useeffect (() => {bazayaft ('https://api.example.com/data'). phir ((jwab) => rspans.jsn ()). phir (dayta) => syt dayta (dayta)).catch ((ghltay) => knswl.rwr (ghltay)) ؛} ، []) ؛// aadad wa shmar ko pysh karain ... wapsy (
    {data.map ((aaitm) => (
  • {item.name}
    • ))}
)} ) ؛} is msaal main ، bazayaft ki tkryb dayta ko bazayaft karnay kay liye API kal karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔as kay bad jwab JSON kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey JSON main tbdyl krdya jata haay۔bazayaft shuda dayta syt dayta fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey jzaw ki haalt main mhafwza kya jata haay۔ AXIOS: AXIOS HTTP ki drkhwastyn karnay kay liye ayk mkbwl tesri party ki laibryry haay۔yha AJAX drkhwastwn ko React.example (Useefect kay sath Axios ka astamal karty hawiay) main AJAX drkhwastwn ko snbhalnay kay liye ayk aasan aur aasan API mhaya krta haay: JSXCOPY Codeimport rd aml ، {USEEFECT ، 'ry aykt' sy 'aykt' sy ampwrt ayksyws ؛ fnkshn maikmpmnt () {const [)dayta ، syt dayta] = usestate ([]) ؛useeffect (() => {axios.get ('https://api.example.com/data'). phir ((jwab) => syt dayta (rspans.dayta)). kych ((ghltay) => knswl۔ghltay (ghltay)) ؛} ، []) ؛// aadad wa shmar ko pysh karain ... wapsy (
    {data.map ((aaitm) => (
  • {item.name}
    • ))}
)} ) ؛} is msaal main ، ayksyws ko drkhwast denay ki drkhwast karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔rdaml kay aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy haasal ki jati hay aur ajzaaa ki haalt main zakhyrha kya jata haay۔-kyry): jsxcopy kwdaympwrt 'ry aykt' sy rd aml ka azahaar ؛ draamd {usequery} sy 'ry aykt kwiry' sy ؛ fnkshn maikmpynt () {kanst {dayta ، ghltay ، isloading} = usequery ('dayta' ، ()) => bazayaft ('https://api.example.com/data').then(omesponse) => rspans.jsn ())) ؛aghr (isloading) {waps
lwda ho raha hay ...
؛} if (ghltay) {wapsy
ghltay: {ghltay.mysyj}
؛} // dayta ko pysh karain ... wapsy (
    {dayta.aymp ((aaitm) => (
  • {item.name}
    • ))}
) ؛} is msaal main ، dayta lanay kay liye rd aml ki laibryry aur is kay astamal kay hak ka astamal kya jata haay۔hak ayk klyd ('dayta') aur ayk mtzuad fnkshn lyta hay jo dayta ko waps krta haay۔ hr nktaha nzar kay apnay fwaid hain ، aur antkhab aap kay mnsawbay ki zurwryat aur zaaty trjyha par mnhasar haay۔chahaay aap bazayaft API ، Axios ، ya dayta haasal karnay wali laibryry ka astamal karain ، achhay saarf ka tjrbha fraham karnay kay liye lwdangh ، ghltay ، aur kamyaby ki ryastwn ko mnasb tarykay sy snbhalna zurwry haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo apni mrzuy kay mtaabk mwad aur pwzayshn kay sath twl taip pysh krta haay۔
Answer:
ry aykt rwtr ayk mshhawr laibryry hay jo aap ko kesi ry aykt ayply kyshn main rwtngh ko snbhalnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha rastwn ki wzuahat karnay aur mkhtlf ajzaaa ya safhaat kay mabyn mkml safhaha dwbarha lwda ki zurwrt kay baghair tshryf la janay ka ayk aalanyha tarykha fraham krta haay۔ ry aykt rwtr ka astamal karty hoey kesi rd aml ki ayply kyshn main rwtngh ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap aam tawr par un mrahal par aml kryn: ry aykt rwtr anstal kryn: ry aykt rwtr anstal krkay shrwa kryn۔ayn py aym ya yarn.ayks nmwnha jesay pykyj mynyjr ka astamal karty hoey (ayn py aym ka astamal karty hawiay): kapy kwdan py aym anstal ry aykt rwtr dawmsyt ap rwtr jzaw: ry aykt rwtr kay zaryaha fraham krdha rwtr jzaw kay sath apnay ayply kyshn kay jra kay jzaw ko lpytyn۔as sy aap ki drkhwast kay liye rwtngh ki faalyt ko kabl bnata haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: jsxcopy kwdaympwrt 'ry aykt' sy rd aml ؛/} ) ؛}} is msaal main ، braؤzarwrtr ko rwtr jzaw kay tawr par astamal kya jata haay۔ rwts rwt: ry aykt rwtr sy rwt jzaw ka astamal rastwn ki wzuahat karnay kay liye karain aur yeh btaiyn keh hr rwt kay liye kon sa jzaw pysh kya jana chahaiay۔'rd aml' sy rd aml ؛ draamd {rwt} sy 'ry aykt-rwtr-dawm' ؛ fnkshn ayp () {rytrn ( ) ؛} kay baray myn} is msaal main ، tyn rastwn ki wzuahat ki hogi haay: ayk hawm pyj (/) kay liye ، ayktkryba page safhaha (/kay baray myn) ، aur ayk rabtaay kay safhaay (/rabtaha) kay liay۔har rastha isi tarah kay jzaw kay sath wabstha hawta hay js ko pysh kya jaye ga jab rwt mwjwdha url.link rastwn sy mmasal hawta haay۔rd aml '؛ draamd {lnk} say' ry aykt-rwtr-dawm '؛ fnkshn nywyghyshn () {wapsy (
  • hawm
  • kay baray main
  • rabtaha
rabtaha kryn))؛} is msaal main ، lnk jzaw mkhtlf rastwn par nywyghyshn lnks bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ksy lnk par klk karnay sy yw aar ayl ko ap dayt kya jaye ga aur is sy mtalkha jzaw pysh kya jaye gha۔ aar aay sy ty rwtr bohat sy khsawsayat aur ajzaaa fraham krta hay ، jesay ghhwnslay waly rastay ، rwt pyramytrza ، rwt ghardangh ، aur bohat kchh۔mzakwrha bala mrahal par aml karnay aur ry aykt rwtr dstawyzaat ki khwj sy ، aap apni ry aykt ayply kyshn main mkml tawr par faal rwtngh sstm bna saktay hain ، js sy saarfyn ko baghair kesi rkawt kay mkhtlf safhaat ya ajzaaa kay mabyn tshryf la jasktay hayn۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw lkhyn jo hasb zurwrt shrwa aur akhttamy awkat kay sath alty ghnty taimr dkhata haay۔
Answer:
rd aml main ghltay ki hadwd aysay ajzaaa hain jo jawa askrpt ki ghltaywn ko pkraty hain jo kesi jzaw kay laif saiykl kay ryndarngh mrhalay kay doran hawty hayn۔wha aap ko pori ayply kyshn ko krysh hony ki bjaiay fzul sy hayndal aur dasplay karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ ghltay ki hadwd kay tsawr main do aham ajzaaa shaml hayn: ghltay ki hadwd jzaw: ayk ghltay ki had ka jzaw ayk bakaadha rd aml jzaw hay jo ayk khasa laif saiykl tarykha par aml draamd krta hay jsay ajzaaa dayda kych kehty hain (ghltay ، malwmat)۔jb is kay bchay kay ajzaaa kay andr koi ghltay phynk di jati hay tou yeh tarykha tyar kya jata haay۔ msaal kay tawr pr: jsxcopy kwdaympwrt ry aykt ، {jzaw} sy 'ry aykt' sy ؛ klas ki khraby ki baؤndary jzaw {knstrktr (prwps) {spr (prwps) main twsya krty haay۔this.state = {haysrr: ghlta} ؛} ajzaaa dayda kych (ghltay ، malwmat) {knswl.rwr (ghltay) ؛this.setState ({haserror: true}) ؛} ryndar () {aghr (this.state.haserror) {waps
kuch ghalat ho ghya۔
؛this is ko waps kryn۔}} is msaal main ، ghltay ki baؤndary jzaw abtdaiy ryast kay mtghyr haasrwr ko tryk karnay kay liye trtyb dyty hay agar koi ghltay hui hay tw۔jb is kay bchay kay ajzaaa main ghltay phynk di jati hay tou ajzaaa dayda kych ka tarykha kaha jata haay۔yha ryast ko ap dayt krta hay is bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye keh ayk ghltay waka hui haay۔ ghltay ki hadwd ka astamal: ghltay ki hadwd un ajzaaa ko lpyt kar astamal ki jati hain jn kay liye aap ghltaywn ko snbhalna chahti hayn۔yha ghltay hayndalngh ki zurwrt kay ajzaaa kay waldyn kay tawr par ghltay ki had kay jzaw ko rakh kar kya jaskta haay۔ayp () {rytrn ( < /errorboundary>)}} is msaal main ، maikmpmnt jzaw ghltay baؤndary jzaw kay sath lpyta jata haay۔aghr koi ghltay maikmpmnt ya is kay bchay kay ajzaaa main hawty hay tou ، ghltay ki baؤndary jzaw ghltay ko pkra la gi aur isy khwbsawrty sy snbhal la ghy۔ ayrr ki hadwd pori drkhwast ko haadsaay sy rwknay main mdd fraham krty hayn۔ksy khaly askryn ya kesi ghltay ka pygham zaahar karnay kay bjaiay keh saarfyn ko aljhaؤ mil sakta hay ، ghltay ki hadwd aap ko fal byk UI ya kesi ghltay ka pygham zaahar karnay ki ajazat dyty hain jo is msilay ki wzuahat krty haay۔mkhsawsa ajzaaa main ghltaywn ko alag thlgh krkay ، aap saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham krsktay hain aur is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh baky ayply kyshn kam jary rakhy ghy۔yha nwt karna zurwry hay keh ghltay ki hadwd sirf ryndarngh mrhalay main ghltaywn ko snbhalty hain aur aywnt kay hayndalrza ، ghair mtzalzal kwda ، ya srwr saiyda ryndarngh kay doran ghltayan nah pkrayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo rnghwn ko mntkhb karnay aur kapy karnay ki salahayt kay sath rnghyn pylyt chnnay wala dkhata haay۔
Answer: rd aml main sst lwdangh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo aap ko ajzaaa ya dusray asaasawn (jysay tsaawyr ya dayta) ko ghair mtzalzal tawr par ، mtaalbha ، aan daymanda par lwda karnay ki ajazat dyty hay ، jab un ki asal main zurwrt hawty haay۔as sy abtdaiy bndal kay saiza ko kam krkay aur ghair tnkydy wsail ki lwdangh ko mwkhr krkay aap kay rd aml ki ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔ lyzay lwdangh khasa tawr par mfyd hay jab aap ki ayply kyshn main braay ajzaaa ya bhary anhasaar hawtay hain jab drkhwast pehlay hony par fwry tawr par zurwrt nahin hawty haay۔bhry hawiyabtdaiy bndal main un ajzaaa kay tamam kwda ko shaml karnay kay bjaiay ، aap inhain alag alag hasawn main tksym krsktay hain aur jab un ki zurwrt hawty hay tou woh mthark tawr par lwda krsktay hayn۔ REACT sst lwdangh ko nafza karnay kay liye "kahal" aur "sspns" kay nam sy ayk blt un khsawsayt fraham krta haay۔sst lwdangh kay astamal ki wzuahat karnay kay liye yahan ayk msaal haay: JSXCOPY Codemport rd aml ، {sst ، sspns} 'ry aykt' sy ؛ const mylazycomponent = sst (() => draamd ('./ mylazycompient')) ؛ fnkshn ayp () {wapsy () wapsy.sst fnkshn ko mthark tawr par mylazycompiention madaywl ko ghair mtzalzal tawr par draamd karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔sspns jzaw ko sst bwjh waly jzaw kay ard ghrd ayk rypr kay tawr par astamal kya jata hay ، js sy fal byk UI (as maamlay main ، ayk "lwdangh ..." pygham) fraham kya jata hay jo zaahar hawta hay jab jzaw bhry hui haw۔rd aml ps mnzar main is jzaw kay liye khud bkhwd kwda ko lwda krday gha۔ayk bar jab kwda bhry hawjaiay tou ، jzaw pysh kya jaye gha۔sspns ka jzaw is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh fal byk UI is wkt tak zaahar hawta hay jab tak keh sst bwjh waly jzaw pysh karnay kay liye tyar nah hawn۔ sst lwdangh ka astamal karty hoey ، aap mndrjha zayl karkrdghy main bhatry haasal krsktay hayn: tyza abtdaiy bwjh: sst lwdangh aap ki drkhwast kay abtdaiy bndal saiza ko kam krdyty haay۔ajzaaa ya wsail jn ki fwry tawr par zurwrt nahin hay abtdaiy bndal main shaml nahin ki jati hay ، js kay ntyjay main aap ki ayply kyshn kay liye abtdaiy bwjh ka tyza wkt hawta haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh ajzaaa ya asaasawn ko sirf is wkt bhra jata hay jab un ki asal zurwrt hawty hay ، mjmway karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana aur aap ki ayply kyshn ko lwda karnay main jo wkt lghta hay isy kam krna۔ bytr ryswrs ka astamal: sst lwdangh sirf is wkt ajzaaa ya asaasawn ko lwda krkay wsail kay astamal ko bhatr bnanay main maawn haaydrkar hayn.as sy aap ki drkhwast kay mymwry fwt prnt aur nyt wrk kay astamal ko kam kya jata hay ، khasa tawr par pychydha jzaw kay drjha bndy waly braay ayply kyshnza kay l .۔ yeh bat aham hay keh sst lwdangh sirf ajzaaa tak hi mhadwd nahin haay۔as ka atalak dusray wsail ، jesay tsaawyr ، dayta ، ya byrwny laibryrywn par bhi kya jaskta haay۔ rd aml main sst lwdangh ka faidha athatay hoey ، aap ajzaaa aur wsail ko talb karty hoey apni drkhwast ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hain ، js kay ntyjay main abtdaiy bwjh kay awkat tyza tr hawtay hain ،wsail ka bhatr astamal ، aur saarf ka ayk hamwar tjrbha۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo mlty slykt aur tlash ki faalyt kay sath darap daaؤn slykt fylda pysh krta haay۔
Answer:
aaly aardar waly ajzaaa (HOCs) rd aml main ayk dayzaain ka nmwnha hain jo aap ko kesi dusray fnkshn kay jzaw kay sath kesi jzaw ko lpyt kar jzaw ki mntak ko dwbarha astamal karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔HOC kesi dlyl kay tawr par jzaw main lyta hay aur azuafy faalyt kay sath ayk bhatr jzaw lwtata haay۔ HOCs ko aadad wa shmar ki bazayaft ، twsayk ، ya mshrwta pysh ksh jesay khdshat kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔wha khdshat ko dwbarha kabl astamal afaal main alag krkay tarza aml ki tshkyl ko kabl bnatay hayn۔ yahan ayk aaly aardar kay jzaw kay astamal ki wzuahat karnay ki ayk msaal haay: 'rd aml' sy JSXCOPY Codemport rd aml ka rdaml zaahar krta haay۔.} ryndar () {rytrn ؛}} ؛} // kesi jzaw ko brahanay kay liye ayk ajzaaa ko brahanay kay liye maiy kampynt (prwps) {rytrn
haylw ، {prwps.aym}!
؛} // kay sath bhatr jzaw kay sath wِlghr haakkwnst un hayn haynksda kmpynshn = kay sath wyt lwnjr ((mycompointent) ؛ // bhatr ajzaaa kay astamal ka astamal () {wapsy ؛} is msaal main ، wِlghr zayada aardar ka jzaw kesi niay dlyl kay tawr par jzaw (lpytay hoey ajzaaa) main lyta hay aur ayk nya lwtata haayjzaw jo rywpda ajzaaa kay prwps ko lagh un krta hay jab is main azuafha hawta haay۔as kay bad bhatr jzaw ayp kay jzaw main astamal hawta hay ، js ka nam prw par hawta haay۔ wِlghr haak laghngh slwk ko shaml krkay asal mycompointe ko brahata haay۔yha asal jzaw kay prwps ko {... this.props} ka astamal karty hoey phylanay waly jzaw main phylatay hoey brkrar rkhta haay۔ haaks mtadd ajzaaa main ajzaaa ki mntak ko dwbarha astamal karnay aur bantnay ka ayk tarykha fraham karty hayn۔wha aap ko khdshat ko alag karnay aur kwda bys ko zayada madaywlr aur brkrar rkhnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔HOCs kay zaryaha ، aap kwda ko nkl kyay baghair mkhtlf ajzaaa par mshtrkha faalyt ka atalak krsktay hayn۔ yeh bat kabl ghwr hay keh HOCs kay astamal main kuch hadwd hain ، jesay prwp tnazaaat ، lpytay hoey jzaw kay drjha bndy main mriyt ka fkdan ، aur ghhwnsla kay maamlat۔an hadwd ko door karnay kay liye ، rd aml nay haks mtaarf kraya ، jo jzaw ki mntak ko dwbarha astamal karnay aur kras ktngh kay khdshat ko snbhalnay ka ayk zayada lchkdar aur taaktwr tarykha fraham karty hayn۔

Question: ayk rd aml kay jzaw ko nafza karain jo mlty mrhalha farm ya wzarda kay liye pyshrft ka mzaaharha krta haay۔
Answer:
ry aykt pwrtlza ry aykt ayply kyshn kay mamwl kay dawm drjha bndy sy bahar ajzaaa pysh karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham karty hayn۔wha aap ko ayk mkhtlf dawm ansar main jzaw kay sab try ko pysh karnay ki ajazat dytay hain jo jzaw kay waldyn ki braha rast awlad nahin haay۔ rd aml kay pwrtlza kay liye bnyady astamal ka maamlha is wkt hawta hay jab aap ko kesi jzaw kay mwad ko dawm drjha bndy kay mkhtlf hasaay main pysh karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ayk mwdal ، ayk twl taip ، ya ayk pap ap jo poray safhaay par kabw pata haay۔pwrtlza ka astamal karty hoey ، aap is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh ajzaaa kay waldyn kay drjha bndy ko mtasar kyay baghair mwad ko dawm main sahayha jghha par pysh kya gaya haay۔ ry aykt pwrtlza kay astamal ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ayk msaal haay: JSXCOPY kwdaympwrt 'ry aykt' sy rd aml ka rd aml ؛-DOM '؛ klas mwdal main twsya ki hogi haay۔this.el = dstawyza۔ krytylymnt ('Div') ؛} ajzaaa daydawmaؤnt () {dstawyza.day.day.aypyndachailda (this.el) ؛} ajzaaa wln maؤnt () {dstawyza.day.bymwchylda (this.el) ؛} ryndar () reable rytrn ry ayktdawm۔ kryt pwrtl (this.props.children ، this.el) ؛}} fnkshn ayp () {rytrn (
