is mwad ko ayk mwdal kay andr pysh kya jaye gha۔} reactdom.Render ( ، dstawyza.jytylymnt baiy aai day ('rwt')) ؛ is msaal main ، mwdal jzaw ayk nya DIV ansar (this.el) tshkyl dyta hay aur isy dstawyza main shaml krta haay۔ajzaaa wln maؤnt ka tarykha DOM sy DIV ansar ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jab mwdal jzaw ghair mnkwlha hawta haay۔ mwdal ajzaaa kay ryndar kay tarykha kar par ، ry ayktdawm۔ kryt pwrtl fnkshn bchwn ko shaara denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay (mwdal kay andr pysh karnay waly mwad) ko pysh krta haay۔this.el ansar.kryt pwrtl fnkshn mwad aur hadf dawm ansar ko dlail kay tawr par lyta haay۔ ayp kay jzaw main ، mwdal jzaw astamal hawta hay ، aur is ka mwad (ayk pyraghraf) bchay kay jzaw kay tawr par pysh kya jata haay۔as kay bad yeh mwad mwdal jzaw kay zaryaha tkhlyk krdha DIV ansar kay andr pysh kya jata hay ، lekin yeh ayp kay jzaw kay aam dawm drjha bndy sy bahar zaahar hawta haay۔ REACT pwrtl mnzarnamay main mfyd hain jahan aap ko mwjwdha jzaw kay dawm drjha bndy sy bahar mwad pysh karnay ki zurwrt haay۔yha madalza ، twl tps ، ya dyghr UI anasar bnanay kay liye faidha mnd saabt hawskta hay jo safhaha par rwshny daaltay hain ya dawm kay kesi khasa hasaay main pysh karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔pwrtlza ka astamal krkay ، aap khdshat ko alag krsktay hain ، dawm dahanchay ko saaf sthra rakh saktay hain ، aur apnay ajzaaa ki ayk bhatr tnzaym ko brkrar rakh saktay hayn۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw lkhyn jo thmb nyl nywyghyshn kay sath ayk zamha dar amyj ghylry dkhata haay۔
Answer: rd aml main karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main ryndarngh ki rftar ko bhatr bnanay aur ghair zurwry ap dayts ko kam sy kam karnay ki tknykwn ko nafza karna shaml haay۔yhaan mtadd tknykyn hain jo aap apnay rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn: rd aml ka astamal kryn۔ aym ay aym aw ya pywrkmpynt: ry aykt fraham krta haay۔ajzaaa kayapnay fnkshnl jzaw ko lpyt kar ya pywrkmpmnt klas ko braha kar ، rd aml jzaw ko yaddasht kray ga aur sirf is ko dwbarha pysh kray ga agar is kay prwps tbdyl hawchkay hayn۔klas ka ayk jzaw ، aap dsty tawr par quempointipdate Lifecycle tarykha kar ko nafza krsktay hayn۔yha tarykha aap ko un shraita ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jn kay that kesi jzaw ko mwjwdha aur aghlay prps/ryast ka mwazanha krkay ap dayt karna chahaiay۔as sy aap ko mkhsawsa prwp ki tbdylywn ki bnyad par ryndarngh ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ fharstwn kay liye klydy shaaray ka astamal kryn: jab nkshha kay fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey anasar ki fharstyn pysh karty ho tou ، hr shay ko ayk anwkha klydy shaara fraham karna ykyny bnaiyn۔as sy pori fharst ko dwbarha pysh karnay kay bjaiay is fharst ko ap dayt karnay aur is sy salha karnay main mdd mlty haay۔yaddasht ki tknyk (jysay ، fnkshnl ajzaaa main USEMEMO kay sath mymwraizangh) ryndarza kay doran ghair zurwry tawr par akdar par dwbarha mkablha karnay sy bchnay kay liay۔talb par bhry hawiy۔as sy abtdaiy bndal saiza ko kam karnay main mdd mlty hay aur aap ki drkhwast ki lwdangh karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jata haay۔fal byk byk UI ko snbhalnay kay liye rd aml ko ykja kryn۔prwdakshn blda ko karkrdghy kay l optim bhatr bnaya gaya hay aur is main mkhtlf asalahaat shaml hain jesay mnyfykyshn aur dayda kwda ka khatmha۔ ry aykt daywtwls kay sath karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaiyn aur bhatr bnaiyn: apni drkhwast main karkrdghy ki rkawtwn aur nakarha ryndarngh pytrn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye ry aykt daywtwlza braؤzar ki twsya ka astamal kryn۔yha aap kay ry aykt ayply kyshn ko bhatr bnanay kay liye jzaw kay dwbarha ryndarza ، karkrdghy kay awkat ، aur dyghr mfyd malwmat kay baray main bsayrt fraham krta haay۔ mhanghay kmpywtwn aur slyktrza ko yad rkhyn: agar aap kay ajzaaa kmpywtyshnl mhanghay aapryshnza ya akhza krdha aadad wa shmar par anhasaar karty hain tou ، mymwraizayshn laibryrywn jesay mymwaizayshn tknyk (jysay ، jesay ،ntaij ko kysh aur dwbarha astamal karnay kay liye rysrch karain ya mymwraizayshn haks (jysay ، yw ays ay aym ay aym aw)۔as sy ghyrzurwry dwbarha kmpywtyshn sy bchnay aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mlty haay۔ayk halka phlka rypr jo azuafy dawm anasar nahin bnata haay۔ jzaw kay drjha bndy ko tjzayha aur bhatr bnaiyn: apni drkhwast kay jzaw kay drjha bndy aur sakht ka jaizaha lyn۔braay ajzaaa ko chhwtay ، zayada mrkwza ajzaaa main twranay kay mwaka ki nshandhay kryn۔as sy rd aml ki mkdar ko kam krkay ryndarngh ki karkrdghy main bhatry aaskty hay jab tbdylyan rwnma hawty hayn۔ un tknykwn ko nafza karty hoey ، aap apni rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hain ، ghair zurwry ryndarza ko kam krsktay hain ، aur saarf kay mjmway tjrbay ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔an asalahaat ki karkrdghy kay asarat ki pymaish aur is ki prwfail karna zurwry hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh woh mtalwbha bhatry fraham karty hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo mrzuy kay mtaabk had aur mrhalha war akdar kay sath darygh aybl slaiydar pysh krta haay۔
Answer: kynt kwmpynt ap dayt ka tarykha rd aml main ayk laif saiykl tarykha hay jo aap ko kntrwl krkay ryndarngh ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat dyta hay keh aya kesi jzaw ko ap dayt karna chahaiay ya nhayn۔as sy pehlay keh ryndar kay tarykha kar ko blaya jaye aur ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon ko rwknay ka ayk mwka fraham kya jaiay۔ kynt kmpwynt ap dayt ka mksad yeh taay karna hay keh aya kesi jzaw kay prps ya ryast is tarah tbdyl hochuki hay js main jzaw ki pydawar main tazaha kary ki zurwrt hawty haay۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، rd aml kesi jza ko dwbarha pysh krta hay jab bhi is ka waldyn dwbarha pysh krta hay ya jab is kay apnay shaaray ya ryast main tbdyly aaty haay۔taham ، bohat sy maamlat main ، tamam prwp ya ryasty tbdylywn ko dwbarha ryndar ki zurwrt nahin hawty hay ، khasa tawr par agar tbdyly jzaw kay aaؤt pt ko mtasar nahin krty haay۔ aml draamd kay zaryaha ، aap un shraita ki wzuahat krsktay hain jn kay that kesi jzaw ko ap dayt karna chahaiay۔as main do dlail mwsawl hawtay hayn: nykst prps aur nykst astyt ، jo baltrtyb prwps aur ryast ki aghly akdar ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔tarykha kar kay andr ، aap un akdar ka mwjwdha prps aur ryast sy mwazanha krsktay hain takha yeh malwm kya jaskay keh koi ap dayt zurwry hay ya nhayn۔ is ki wjha sy ayk bwlyn wylyw ko waps karna chahaiay js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh jzaw ko (sch) ko ap dayt karna chahaiay ya nahin (ghlta)۔aghr yeh ghalat lwtta hay tou ، rd aml ryndar kay tarykha kar aur is kay ntyjay main laif saiykl kay tarykwn ko chhwra dy ga ، js sy jzaw ko dwbarha pysh karnay sy rwkta haay۔ kybrpynt ap dayt ki asalaha ki salahayt ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon sy bchnay aur ryndarngh sy wabstha kmpywtyshnl awwr hayda ko kam karnay main mzumr haay۔ap dayts kay liye shraita ko ahatyata sy byan krkay ، aap dwbarha pysh karnay walon ko rwk saktay hain jab jzaw ki pydawar main tbdyly nahin aaty haay۔as sy ryndarngh taim ko kam krkay aur ghair zurwry dawm ap dayts ko kam sy kam krkay aap kay rd aml ki drkhwast ki mjmway karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔ yeh bat aham hay keh jab kynt kwmpynt ap dayt kuch maamlat main ryndarngh ko bhatr bnaskty hay tou ، is main mwazanha ki mntak ko anjam denay ka ayk azuafy awwr hayda bhi shaml krta haay۔lhazaa ، is ka astamal ansaaf kay sath aur sirf un ajzaaa kay liye kya jana chahaiay jahan mmknha karkrdghy main kamyaby kay mkablay ki laght sy bhi zayada azuafha hawta haay۔fnkshnl ajzaaa main ، isi tarah ki asalaha ko react.memo ya kstm mymwizayshn tknyk ka astamal karty hoey astamal kya jaskta hay jo USEMEMO hak kay sath haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo aydajst asplt tnasb kay sath ayk bhaaly shuda asplt pyn ko dkhata haay۔
Answer: rd aml mfahamt woh aml hay js kay zaryaha rd aml ka azahaar saarf kay antrfys ko ap dayt krta hay takha jzaw kay drkht main tbdylywn ki akasy ki jaskay۔jb kesi ajzaaa ki haalt ya shaaray tbdyl hawjatay hain tou ، rd aml sy mfahamt ki jati hay takha yeh taay kya jaskay keh dawm main kya tbdylyan lanay ki zurwrt haay۔yha mtalwbha akhtlafat ya tazaha karywn ki nshandhay krta hay aur un ko mؤsar tarykay sy laghw krta hay ، ghair zurwry tbdylywn ko kam sy kam krta hay aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnata haay۔ ajzaaa ki tazaha karywn kay doran rd aml ka mfahamt kis tarah kam krta hay is ka ayk jaizaha: ajzaaa ki tazaha kary ko mthark krna: A main tbdyly kay zaryaha ayk tazaha kary ko mthark kya jaskta haay۔ajzaaa ki haalt ، is kay shaaray main tbdyly ، ya waldyn kay jzaw ko dwbarha pysh karnay ka۔rd aml ki nshandhay krty hay keh ayk ap dayt zurwry hay aur mfahamt kay aml ka aaghaza hawta haay۔ ayk nya wrchwil dawm tyar krna: rd aml sy tazaha trien haalt ya prwps par mbny jzaw kay drkht ki ayk niy wrchwil dawm nmaindghy pyda hawty haay۔yha nya wrchwil dawm is bat ki nmaindghy krta hay keh kis tarah UI ko ap dayt ki dykh bhal karni chahaiay۔ wrchwil dawm ki nshandhay krna: rd aml pchhlay ayk kay sath niay wrchwil dawm ka mwazanha karnay kay liye ayk mkhtlf alghwrthm anjam dyta haay۔yha asal dawm ko ap dayt karnay kay liye drkar tbdylywn kay kam sy kam syt ka tayn karnay kay liye dono drkhtwn kay mabyn sakhty akhtlafat ka tjzayha krta haay۔ dawm ko ap dayt krna: mkhtlf ntaij ki bnyad par ، ry aykt mkhsawsa dawm aapryshnwn ki fharst tyar krta hay js kay mtaabk asal dawm ko zurwry haay۔nya wrchwil dawm۔an karrwaiywn main dawm nwdas ki tshkyl ، ap dayt ، ya hatana aur antsab ki akdar ko ap dayt karna shaml hawskta haay۔ dawm ap dayts ka astamal: rd aml mwsar andaza main shnakht shuda dawm aapryshnwn ko asal dawm ko ap dayt karnay kay liye laghw krta haay۔yha karkrdghy ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye ayk mtnasb andaza main zurwry tbdylyan anjam dyta haay۔ laif saiykl kay tarykay: rd aml ap dayt kay aml main shaml ajzaaa kay mnasb laif saiykl tarykwn ki drkhwast krta haay۔as sy ajzaaa ko zurwrt kay mtaabk ap dayt ka jwab denay ، zumny asarat anjam denay ، ya un ki dakhly haalt ko ap dayt karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ry aykt kay mkhtlf alghwrthm ko mtalwbha dawm hayra phyry ki tadad ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، js sy ryndarngh apdayts ki karkrdghy ko kam kya jaskta haay۔ yeh bat aham hay keh mfahamt ajzaaa ki staha par anjam di jati haay۔rd aml ka azahaar pori drkhwast ko dwbarha pysh karnay kay bjaiay ، un ki mkhsawsa tbdylywn ki bnyad par ، ajzaaa ko aazaadanha tawr par ap dayt krta haay۔as sy sirf UI kay zurwry hasawn ko ap dayt krkay ryndarngh ko bhatr bnanay kay kabl bnata hay ، js kay ntyjay main bhatr karkrdghy hawty haay۔jzaw ki haalt ya shaaray myn۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw lkhyn jo mntkhb shrwa aur akhttamy tarykhwn kay sath tarykh ki had chnnay wala dkhata haay۔
Answer: ry aykt ayply kyshnza main byn alakwamy kary (I18N) ko snbhalnay main mtadd zabanwn kay liye mdd fraham karna aur saarf ki trjyhay zaban main saarf antrfys pysh karna shaml haay۔rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main I18N ko nafza karnay kay l several aap bohat sary nktaha nzar la saktay hayn: rd aml antrnyshnlaizayshn (REACT-I18 nykst): rd aml antrnyshnlaizayshn (REACT-I18Next) I18N main rd aml main ayk mshhawr laibryry haay۔yha trjmay aur zaban main tbdyly sy nmtnay kay liye ayk jama hal fraham krta haay۔REACT-I18 nykst kay sath ، aap mkhtlf zabanwn kay liye trjmay ki failwn ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، apnay ajzaaa main trjmay ki chabyan astamal krsktay hain ، aur aasany sy zabanwn kay darmiyan swich krsktay hayn۔ya aap ki pori drkhwast main lwkl۔as sy aap ko kesi bhi jzaw sy mntkhb zaban tak rsaiy haasal karnay aur zurwrt pranay par isy ap dayt karnay ki shawlt mlty haay۔ JSON failwn main trjmany: zaban kay zaryaha mnzam JSON failwn main trjmay astwr kryn۔har JSON fail main klydy kdr kay jwraay hawtay hain jo ayk mkhsawsa zaban main trjmay ki chabyan aur un kay mtalkha trjmay ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔aap mntkhb krdha zaban ki bnyad par mnasb JSON fail ko lwda krsktay hain aur apnay ajzaaa main trjmay astamal krsktay hayn۔ antrnyshnlaizayshn laibryrywn: aap tarykh ، wkt ، wkt ، aur snbhalnay kay liye mkbwl jawa askrpt antrnyshnlaizayshn laibryrywn jesay farmyt. jay ays (intl.js) ya lmhaha. js ka faidha atha saktay hayn۔saarf kay mkam par mbny nmbr farmytngh۔yha laibryryan mtny aur addy aadad wa shmar ko farmytngh aur lwklaiza karnay kay liye taaktwr afadyt fraham krty hayn۔ kstm I18N hal: agar aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat hain ya aap kstm nktaha nzar ko trjyha dytay hain tou ، aap apna I18N hal tyar krsktay hayn۔as main aap ki apni trjmany failyn bnana ، zaban kay swichrza ki wzuahat karna ، aur aap kay ajzaaa kay andr lwklaizayshn mntak ko nafza karna shaml hawskta haay۔ aap kay antkhab kay nktaha nzar sy ktaa nzar ، yeh zurwry hay keh rd aml ki drkhwastwn main I18N ko nafza karty wkt drj zayl bhatryn tarykwn par ghwr karna zurwry haay: ajzaaa ki mntak sy alag alag trjmay: rkhynaap kay ajzaaa kay kwda sy alag trjmha۔aasany sy antzaamyha aur tazaha karywn ki shawlt kay l separate alag failwn ya zaban kay pyk main trjmay astwr kryn۔ plys hawldarza aur mtghyrat ka astamal kryn: mthark mwad ko snbhalnay kay liye trjmwn main plys hawldarza aur mtghyrat ka astamal kryn۔as sy aap ko trjmha shuda tar main akdar ya mtghyrat dakhl karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ tyst aur twsayk kryn: is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh tamam trjmay drst ، syak wa sbak kay lhaaza sy mnasb aur mnasb tarykay sy janch pratal karain takha mkhtlf zabanwn kay saarfyn kay liye hamwar tjrbha fraham kryn۔ hak sy dien baien baiyn(aar ty ayl) zabanyn: agar aap ki drkhwast byn alakwamy samayn kay liye hay tou ، aar ty ayl zabanwn ki hamayt karnay par ghwr kryn۔as bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh UI la aaؤt aur tykst sydh ko RTL zabanwn kay liye sahayha tarykay sy aydajst kya gaya haay۔ apnay rd aml ki ayply kyshn main I18N par aml draamd karty hoey ، aap mkhtlf zabanwn aur sakaftwn kay saarfyn ko mkamy tjrbha fraham krsktay hain ، js sy aap ki ayply kyshn ko aalmy staha par zayada kabl rsaiy aur saarf dwst bnaya jaskta haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo tygh un pt fylda ko hasb zurwrt tyghza aur twsayk kay sath pysh krta haay۔
Answer: rd aml ki janch main rd aml kay ajzaaa ki faalyt ، tarza aml aur drstghy ki tsadyk karna shaml hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh woh araday kay mtaabk kam kryn۔ry aykt ayply kyshnza kay mayar aur wshwsnyyta ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye mnasb janch zurwry haay۔rd aml kay ajzaaa ki janch kay l several kiy nktaha nzar mwjwd hayn: ywnt tystngh: ywnt tystngh main tnhaaiy main anfrady ajzaaa ki janch karna shaml hay ، js main faalyt kay sab sy chhwtay akaiywn par twjha mrkwza ki jati haay۔rd aml main ، is main aam tawr par un ki anhasaar ya mjmway drkhwast ki haalt par bhrwsha kyay baghair fnkshnl ajzaaa ya klas ajzaaa ki janch karna shaml haay۔aap ywnt tyst lkhnay kay liye tystngh laibryrywn jesay mzaak ، anzaaim ، ya rd aml tystngh laibryry ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ywnt tyst is bat ko ykyny bnatay hain keh hr jzaw tnhaaiy main sahayha tarykay sy kam krta hay aur kyraay ko jld pkranay main mdd krskta haay۔ anzumam ki janch: anzumam ki janch mtadd ajzaaa kay mabyn taaml ki janch par mrkwza hay aur woh mjmway tawr par mil kar kesay kam karty hayn۔yha tsadyk krta hay keh ajzaaa sahayha tarykay sy mrbwta hawtay hain aur twka kay mtaabk bat chyt karty hayn۔anzumam ki janch kesi jzaw kay drjha bndy ko pysh krkay aur mtwka slwk aur ntaij par zawr dy kar ki jaskty haay۔anzaaim aur ry aykt tystngh laibryry jesay twlza ko anzumam ki janch kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ snyp shat tystngh: asnyp shat tystngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jahan aap kesi jzaw ki pysh krdha aaؤt pt par kbzuha karty hain aur is sy pehlay zakhyrha shuda "asnyp shat" sy mwazanha karty hayn۔asnyp shat main jzaw ki aaؤt pt ki syrylaizada nmaindghy hawty haay۔as kay bad kay tyst rnza par ، aaؤt pt ka mwazanha asnyp shat sy kya jata hay ، aur jaizaha lenay kay liye kesi bhi akhtlaf ko jhndaa lghaya jata haay۔asnyp shat tystngh ajzaaa kay mhaya krdha aaؤt pt main tyzay sy ghair ykyny tbdylywn ka ptha lghaskty haay۔mzaak ، asnyp shat syrylaizarza kay sath ، aam tawr par asnyp shat tystngh kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ay 2 ay tystngh kay liye saiprs ya sylynym jesay twlza astamal kyay jasktay hayn۔E2E tyst ayply kyshn kay tarza aml ka ayk jama nzaryha pysh karty hain aur anzumam kay msail ، saarf kay bhaaؤ ki dshwarywn ، aur rjat bghs ko nngha karnay main mdd krsktay hayn۔yha tsadyk krta hay keh jzaw apnay prps aur prwp ki aksam ko sahayha tarykay sy snbhalta hay aur mkhtlf un pt mnzarnamwn ki bnyad par mtwka pydawar ko pysh krta haay۔yha tyst lkhnay kay zaryaha haasal kya jaskta hay js main mkhtlf shawlyat kay amtzaaj ka ahaataha kya gaya hay aur mtwka tarza aml par zawr diya gaya haay۔ mykngh aur zuwabta: jab aysay ajzaaa ki janch karty hain jo byrwny anhasaar par anhasaar karty hain jesay APIs ya khdmat par ، aap ko un anhasaar ka mzaak araanay ya zuaia karnay ki zurwrt praskty hay js ki janch ki jarhay haay۔mzaak araana aur zuwabta aap ko pysh ghwiy karnay waly tyst ki haaltwn ko tkhlyk karnay kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda rdaml fraham karnay ya un anhasaar sy tarza aml ki tklyd karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ yeh aap kay rd aml ki drkhwast ki pychydghy aur zurwryat ki bnyad par mnasb janch kay nktaha nzar ka antkhab karna zurwry haay۔tystngh kay mkhtlf nktaha nzar ka ayk mjmwaha aksar tyst kwryj ko haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aap kay rd aml kay ajzaaa kay sath sath tyst lkhna aap kay kwda bys ki wshwsnyyta aur brkrar rkhnay ko ykyny bnanay main mdd krta hay aur mstkbl main aasany sy ryfyktrngh aur daybghngh ki ajazat dyta haay۔

Question: ayk rd aml kay jzaw ko nafza karain jo safhaha bndy kay sath ayk trtyb denay aur fltr aybl tybl dkhata haay۔
Answer:
rydawks jawa askrpt ayply kyshnza kay liye ayk pysh ghwiy karnay wala astyt mynjmnt laibryry hay ، js main rd aml bhi shaml haay۔yha kesi ayply kyshn ki haalt ko snbhalnay kay liye ayk mrkzay astwr mhaya krta hay ، js sy mkhtlf ajzaaa main dayta ko tryk aur ap dayt karna aasan hawjata haay۔ rydawks kay bnyady asawl yeh hayn: schaiy ka wahad zaryaha: pori drkhwast ki ryast ko ayk hi jawa askrpt aabjykt main mhafwza kya jata hay jsay kaha jata haay۔"astwr۔"as sy ayply kyshn kay dayta ko smjhna aur un ka nzam karna aasan hawjata haay۔ astyt sirf prahnay kay liye haay: rydaks main ryast nakabl tskhyr haay۔ryast ko ap dayt karnay kay l you ، aap karrwaiywn ko rwanha karty hain ، jo sadha jawa askrpt aabjykt hain jo byan main kya hoa haay۔ tbdyly khalsa afaal kay zaryaha ki jati haay: rydawks khalsa afaal ka astamal karty hain js ko "rydawsrza" kaha jata hay is ki wzuahat karnay kay liye keh ryast ko afaal kay jwab main kis tarah ap dayt kya jana chahaiay۔rydawsrza mwjwdha haalt aur un pt kay tawr par aykshn lytay hain aur ayk niy ryast ko waps karty hayn۔ ayk rd aml ki drkhwast main ، rydawks ko ry aykt rydawks laibryry ka astamal karty hoey mrbwta kya jaskta hay ، jo fraham knndha ka jzaw aur knykt fnkshn fraham krta haay۔ A main rydawks anzumam ki ayk msaalry aykt ayply kyshn: mtalwbha anhasaar ko anstal kryn: kapy kwdan py aym anstal karain rydawks ry aykt rydawkstryt ayk rydawks astwr: jay ays ayks kwpy kwda // astwr.jsmpwrt {krytstwr} sy 'rydawks' sy ''۔// ayk sy zayada reducersconst astwr = CreateStore (rwtrydawsr) ko ykja karain Default dayfalt astwr braamd karain red rydawks rydawsrza bnaiyn: jsxcopy kwda // reducers.jsconst abtdaiy astyt = {kaؤntr: 0} ؛ kanstnt kaؤntrdawsr = (ryast = abtdaiy astyt ، aykshn) => {swich ({swich ({swich (switchaykshn۔ taip) {kys 'ankrymnt': wapsy {... ryast ، kaؤntr: astyt۔ kaؤntr + 1} ؛kys 'kmy': wapsy {... ryast ، kaؤntr: astyt. kaؤntr - 1} ؛phalay sy taay shdha: wapsy ki haalt ؛}} braamd dayfalt kaؤntrdawsr ؛ rd aml kay ajzaaa bnaiyn: jsxcopy kwda // kaؤntr.jsmpwrt 'rd aml' sy rd aml ؛ draamd {rabtaha} 'ry aykt-rydawks' sy rabtaha karain ؛ kanstr kaؤntr = ({kaؤntr ، kami ، kmy}) => {{wapsy (

kaؤntr: {kaؤntr}

ankrymnt kami
) ؛}cont cont mapStatetoprops = state => ({kaؤntr: state.counter}) cont cont mapdispatchtoprops = dispatch => ({azuafha: () => daspych ({ksm: 'ankrymnt'}) ، kmy: () => bhyjnay (){ksm: 'kmy'})}) ؛ aykspwrt dayfalt knykt (myp astytrwprwps ، myp daspych twprwps) (kaؤntr) ؛ ayp ko rydawks fraham knndha kay sath lpytyn: jsxcopy kwda // app.jsimport 'react' sy mtalk react ampwrt {fraham knndha} sy ''rd aml-rydawks '؛' ./store' sy ampwrt astwr 'say'؛} Default dayfalt ayp braamd karain ؛ is msaal main ، hum ayk rydawks astwr bnatay hain ، kaؤntr rydawsr ki wzuahat karty hain ، aur ry aykt rydawks sy knykt fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey kaؤntr kay jzaw ko astwr sy mrbwta karty hayn۔kaؤntr jzaw rydaks astwr sy myp astytwprwps fnkshn kay zaryaha kaؤntr wylyw wsawl krta hay aur myp dayspchtrwprwps fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey aykshn bhyjta haay۔ jzaw ko rydawks astwr sy mrbwta karnay kay bad ، kaؤntr jzaw ryast tak rsaiy haasal krskta hay aur kaؤntr wylyw ko ap dayt karnay kay liye karrwaiywn ko bhyj sakta haay۔ryast main hony wali kesi bhi tbdyly sy ajzaaa ki dwbarha pysh ksh ko khud bkhwd mthark krday gha۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw lkhyn jo ghwghl myps ya myp baks jesay mypngh laibryry ka astamal karty hoey nkshha dkhata haay۔
Answer: ry aykt haks tystngh main ry aykt haks kay tarza aml aur faalyt ki janch karna shaml hay ، jo aysay afaal hain jo aap ko fnkshnl ajzaaa main ryast aur dyghr rd aml ki khsawsayat ko astamal karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔haks ki janch karty wkt ، aap aam tawr par is bat ki tsadyk par twjha dytay hain keh hak twka kay mtaabk brtaؤ krta hay ، bshmwl is ki ryast ki tbdylywn ، zumny asarat ، aur dusray haks kay sath taaml bhi shaml haay۔ kstm haks ki janch kay l you ، aap un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: tystngh mahawlyat: shrwa kryn: shrwa kryn۔apnay rd aml kay ajzaaa aur haks kay liye janch ka mahawl mrtb krna۔aap tystngh laibryrywn jesay jyst ya ry aykt tystngh laibryry kay sath sath kesi bhi azuafy tystngh ywtylytyza ya frym wrk kay sath astamal krsktay hain js ko aap trjyha dytay hayn۔ kstm hak ko tyar kryn: apni kstm hak ko draamd karain js ki aap apni tyst fail main janchna chahti hayn۔ tyst jzaw bnaiyn: ayk tyst jzaw bnaiyn keh is tyst ka jzaw bnaiyn۔kstm hak astamal krta haay۔yha jzaw hak kay rypr kay tawr par kam kray ga ، js sy aap isy pysh krsktay hain aur hak ki waps shuda akdar tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hain ya is kay asarat ko janch saktay hayn۔ tyst kay jzaw ko pysh kryn: tystngh ki afadyt ka astamal karty hoey tyst kay jzaw ko pysh kryn۔yha tystngh laibryry kay zaryaha fraham krdha ryndar ya isi tarah kay afaal ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap hak ki abtdaiy haalt par zawr dy saktay hain ، wakaat ya afaal ki tklyd krsktay hain jo ryast ki tbdylywn ko mthark karty hain ، aur is kay ntyjay main ryast ya zumny asarat ki tsadyk krsktay hayn۔bad kay tystwn main mdakhlt karnay sy ghryza kryn۔as main aywnt kay snnay walon ko saaf karna ، ryast ko dwbarha trtyb dena ، ya kesi bhi trmym shuda aalmy tshkylat ko bhaal karna shaml hawskta haay۔ jab kstm haks ki janch karna zurwry hay tou ، un ki mzubwtay aur drstghy ko ykyny bnanay kay l various mkhtlf mnzarnamwn aur knaray kay maamlat par ghwr karna zurwry haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap yeh janch saktay hain keh hak kis tarah mkhtlf aadanwn ko snbhalta hay ، nwl ya ghair mtaynha akdar jesay knaray kay maamlat ko snbhalta hay ، ya asynkrwns aapryshnza ko snbhalta haay۔ yahan kstm hak ki janch karnay ki ayk msaal hay js main yw ays kaؤntr kaha jata hay aur is main azuafha hawta haay: jsxcopy kwda // usecounter۔'rd aml' sy jSimport {usestate} ؛ aykspwrt fnkshn usecounter () {const [count ، setCount] = usestate (0) ؛kanst ankrymnt = () => {syt kaؤnt (ghnty + 1) ؛} ؛Const decrement = () => {setCount (ghnty - 1) ؛} ؛wapsy {ghnty ، azuafha ، kmy} ؛} jsxcopy kwda // usecounter.test.jsimport {ryndar hak ، aykt att '@tystngh-laibrry/ry aykt haks' sy '۔USECUNTER ankrymnt aur kami ki ghnty '، () => {const {ntyjha} = ryndar hak (() => usecounter ()) ؛ twka (ntyjha.kwrynt.kaؤnt) .tobe (0) ؛ aykt (() => {ntyjha.current.increment () ؛}) ؛ twka (ntyjha. current.Count) .tobe (1) ؛ aykt (() => {ntyjha۔.tobe (0) ؛}) ؛ is msaal main ، hum @tystngh-laibryry/ry aykt haks sy ryndar hak fnkshn astamal karty hain takha yws kaؤntr hak pysh kryn۔as kay bad hum abtdaiy ghnty ki kymt par zawr dytay hain ، aykt ka astamal karty hoey ankrymnt aykshn ki nkaly karty hain ، aur tsadyk karty hain keh ghnty main azuafha hoa haay۔asy tarah ، hum ayk kami ki karrwaiy ki nkaly karty hain aur hatmy ghnty ki kymt par zawr dytay hayn۔ kstm haks ko bakaadha ajzaaa ki janch karnay kay liye isi tarah kay nmwnha ki pyrwy krta hay lekin khasa tawr par hak kay tarza aml aur faalyt par twjha mrkwza krta haay۔kstm haks ki achhy tarah sy janch kar kay ، aap apnay rd aml kay ajzaaa main un ki drstghy ، wshwsnyyta aur mnasb anzumam ko ykyny bnasktay hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo fwldar aur fail nywyghyshn kay sath fail ayksplwrr antrfys pysh krta haay۔
Answer: ry aykt ayply kyshnza main twsayk aur ajazat sy nmtnay main saarf ki twsayk ka antzaam ، rastwn ki hafazat ، aur saarf kay krdar ya ajazatwn ki bnyad par kuch khsawsayat ya wsail tak rsaiy ko kntrwl karna shaml haay۔ksy rd aml ki drkhwast main twsayk aur ajazat ko snbhalnay kay liye yahan ayk amwmy nktaha nzar haay: saarf ki twsayk: saarf ki twsayk kay nzaam ko nafza karain jo saarfyn ko sain ap karnay ، sain un karnay aur sain aaؤt karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔as main jay dablyw ty (JSON wyb twkn) ya syshn par mbny twsayk jesi tknalwjywn ka astamal shaml hawskta haay۔drkhwast ki haalt main saarf ki mtalkha malwmat (jysay ، saarf ID ، saarf nam) aur twsayk waly twkn (jysay ، rsaiy twkn ، ryfrysh twkn) ko zakhyrha kryn۔yha ayk aaly aardar jzaw (HOC) ya ayk kstm ry aykt hak bna kar haasal kya jaskta hay jo twsayk ki haalt ko chyk krta hay aur ghair tkwyt bkhsh saarfyn ko lagh un safhaay par ry daairykt krta haay۔wha rastha js main ajazat ki kuch staha ki zurwrt hawty haay۔saarf ki ajazat ki haysayt ya krdar ki bnyad par mkhsawsa ajzaaa ko mshrwta tawr par pysh karnay ya ghair faal karnay kay liye mntak ko nafza kryn۔ tsaw .r: mkhtlf saarf kay krdar ya ajazatwn kay liye ajazat ki mntak ka tayn kryn۔as main aap kay psdyd main krdar aur ajazat ki wzuahat aur un ko mkhsawsa saarfyn kay sath mnslk karna shaml hawskta haay۔saarf kay krdar ya ajazat ki bnyad par kuch khsawsayat ya wsail tak rsaiy ko mhadwd karnay kay l your apnay frnt aynda kwda main ajazat ki janch pratal kryn۔ aay py aai ki twsayk: jab frnt aynda sy API ki drkhwastyn karty ho tou ، drkhwast kay haydarwn main twsayk twkn (jysay ، rsaiy twkn tak rsaiy) shaml kryn۔as sy drkhwast par karrwaiy karnay sy pehlay ps mnzar ko saarf ki twsayk aur ajazat denay ki ajazat mlty haay۔bghyr kesi rkawt ki twsayk kay tjrbay ko ykyny bnanay kay l You aap ko twkn ki myaad khtm hony aur tjdyd ko snbhalnay ki zurwrt praskty haay۔ ayrr hayndalngh: twsayk sy mtalk ghltaywn ko khwbsawrty sy snbhalyn۔msaal kay tawr par ، agar koi API drkhwast 401 (ghyr mjaza) rdaml ko lwtaty hay tou ، aap saarf ko lagh un pyj par ry daairykt krsktay hain ya kesi ghltay ka pygham zaahar krsktay hain js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh karrwaiy ki twsayk ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ laghw aaiwt fnkshnlty: ayk lagh aaؤt mykanzam fraham karain jo saarf kay twsayk twkn ko saaf krta hay awranhayn lagh un safhaay par ry daairykt krta haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh saarf ki twsayk ki haalt ka sahayha tarykay sy antzaam kya gaya hay aur woh mhafwza tarykay sy sain aaؤt krsktay hayn۔ yeh nam hay keh twsayk aur ajazat kay nfaza main sykywrty aham haay۔hamyshha bhatryn tarykwn par aml karain ، jesay saarf ki asnad ko mhafwza tarykay sy astwr karna aur mntkl karna ، aadanwn ki twsayk karna aur saaf karna ، mnasb twkn mynjmnt aur myaad khtm hony par aml draamd ، aur sy ays aar ayf (kras sait ki drkhwast jalsazay) hamlwn jesay mshtrkha sykywrty kay khtarat sy hafazat krna۔ajazat laibryrywn ya khdmat jo aap ki ry aykt ayply kyshn main sykywrty kay khtarat kay khtaray ko kam karnay kay liye blt un sykywrty khsawsayat pysh karty hain aur aam twsayk kay bhaaؤ ko snbhaltay hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo darygh aybl aur ryj aybl amyj fsalwn ka aalay dkhata haay۔
Answer: rd aml main srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) sy mrad srwr par rd aml kay ajzaaa pysh karnay aur abtdaiy ryndarngh kay liye klaint ko pyda shuda HTML bhyjnay ka aml haay۔rwayty klaint saiyda ryndarngh (sy ays aar) main ، ayply kyshn ki abtdaiy ryndaryngh klaint saiyda par hawty hay ، jahan jawa askrpt dayta lanay aur ajzaaa pysh karnay kay liye zamha dar haay۔ rd aml main srwr saiyda ryndarngh kay fwaid main shaml hayn: abtdaiy safhaha bwjh ki karkrdghy main bhatr haay۔: ays ays aar kay sath ، srwr safhaay kay liye abtdaiy HTML mark ap tyar krta hay ، jo mؤkl ko bhyja jata haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh saarf mwad ko zayada tyzay sy dykhta hay kywnkha srwr mkml tawr par pysh krdha HTML safhaha bhyj sakta hay ، js sy jawa askrpt ko klaint saiyda par lwda karnay ، dayta lanay aur ajzaaa pysh karnay kay liye drkar wkt ko kam kya jaskta haay۔as sy tyza rftar sy smjhay janay waly safhaha kay bwjh kay awkat aur bhatr saarf kay tjrbay ka sbb bn sakta hay ، khasa tawr par aahastha aahastha nyt wrk knykshn ya aalat pr۔ bytr srch anjn aaptymaizayshn (SEO): srch anjn aam tawr par wyb safhaat kay HTML mwad ko rynghtay hain aur andayks karty hayn۔ays ays aar srch anjn kralrza ko pehlay sy pysh krdha HTML fraham krta hay ، js sy mwad ko zayada kabl rsaiy aur mnasb asharyha kay amkanat ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔as sy srch anjn ki drjha bndy aur tlash kay ntaij ki nmaish ko msabt tawr par mtasar kya jaskta haay۔srwr par aych ty aym ayl pyda krkay ، ayply kyshn kabl rsaiy aur kabl astamal hay yahan tak keh jawa askrpt spwrt kay baghair bhy۔ays ays aar mshtrkha mwad ki mnasb pysh ksh ko kabl bnata hay ، bshmwl myta dayta aur awpn ghraf tyghza ، drst pysh nzaarha aur bhatr shyirngh kay tjrbat ko ykyny bnana۔ trky psnd afzaaish ko bhatr bnata haay: ays ays aar trky psnd brahanay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jahan srwr sy pysh krdha mwad fwry tawr par saarfyn ko zaahar hawta hay ، aur phir klaint-jsaida jawa askrpt antrayktywyty aur faalyt ko brahanay kay liye snbhalta haay۔yha nktaha nzar aahastha rabtawn ya aalat kay haaml saarfyn kay liye ayk bhatr tjrbha fraham krta hay ، kywnkha woh jawa askrpt kay sath bat chyt karna shrwa kar saktay hain jab jawa askrpt lwda ho raha haay۔ kuch khsawsayat ka nfaza: ays ays aar kuch khsawsayat kay nfaza ko aasan bna sakta hay ، jesay srwr saiyda dayta bazayaftya kuch ajzaaa ki srwr saiyda ryndarngh js kay liye srwr saiyda wsail ya APIs tak rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ays ays aar ryndarngh kay aml kay doran srwr saiyda mntak kay sath bat chyt karnay aur aadad wa shmar ko bazayaft karnay ka braha rast tarykha fraham krta haay۔ yeh bat aham hay keh ays ays aar klaint saiyda ryndarngh kay mkablay main azuafy pychydghy bhi mtaarf krata haay۔srwr saiyda ryndarngh kay liye srwr srwr kay azuafy wsail ، kychngh ki hakmt amly ، aur klaint srwr ki hum aahanghy ko mhatata hayndalngh ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ry aykt srwr saiyda ryndarngh aur aghlay daat jay jesay twlza ki shawlt kay l rea ry ayktdawmsrwr jesi khsawsayat mhaya krta hay jo ays ays aar ki salahaytwn ko baks sy bahar pysh karty hain ، js sy ry aykt ayply kyshnza main srwr saiyda ryndarngh ko nafza karna aur un ka antzaam karna aasan hawjata haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw lkhyn jo saarf kay un pt par mbny mthark twsayk kay sath ayk farm dkhata haay۔
Answer: aghla daat jay ays srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) ki salahaytwn kay sath ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye ayk mshhawr awpn swrs frym wrk haay۔as sy taaktwr khsawsayat aur knwnshnwn ka ayk syt fraham krkay rd aml ki trky main azuafha hawta hay jo trkyaty aml ko aasan bnata hay aur mwsar srwr saiyda ryndarngh ko ahal bnata haay۔ yahan kuch kabl zakr khsawsayat aur nykst kay fwaid hayn۔aap apnay rd aml kay ajzaaa ki srwr saiyda ryndarngh anjam dyn ، srwr par HTML pyda karain aur isy klaint ko bhyjyn۔as sy abtdaiy safhaha bwjh ki karkrdghy main bhatry aaty hay ، bhatr SEO ko kabl bnata hay ، aur zayada kabl rsaiy aur saarf dwst tjrbha fraham krta haay۔ fail par mbny rwtngh: aghla daat jay ays fail par mbny rwtngh sstm ki pysh ksh krkay rwtngh ko aasan bnata haay۔"safhaat" daairktry main hr jawa askrpt fail drkhwast main ayk mkhsawsa rastay sy msawy haay۔as sy pychydha rwtngh syt ap ko tshkyl denay ki zurwrt khtm hawjaty hay aur niay safhaat tyar karna aasan hawjata haay۔ aatwmytk kwda tksym krna: aghla daat jay ays khud bkhwd aap kay jawa askrpt kwda ko chhwtay hasawn main tksym krta hay ، jsay "tkrawn" kaha jata hay ، js ki zurwrt pranay par sirf bhry hawty haay۔as sy abtdaiy pay lwda kay saiza ko kam krkay tyza rftar safhaha pysh karnay aur bhatr karkrdghy ka ahal bnata haay۔ aay py aai rwts: aghla daat jay ays "API rwts" ki khsawsayt ka astamal karty hoey aap ki ayply kyshn kay andr srwr lys API akhttamy nkat bnanay ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krta haay۔aap "safhaat/API" daairktry main API kay akhttamy mkamat ko alag failwn kay tawr par byan krsktay hain ، js sy aap srwr saiyda mntak aur dayta ko braha rast apnay aghlay. js ayply kyshn kay andr snbhalnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ astytk sait jnryshn (ays ays jy): aghla daat jay ays jamd sait jnryshn ki hamayt krta haay۔، jahan safhaat ko tamyr kay wkt pehlay sy pysh kya jata hay aur msthakm HTML failwn kay tawr par pysh kya jata haay۔yha nsbta stable msthakm mwad wali mwad sy chlnay wali wyb saitwn kay l useful mfyd hay ، tyza rftar bwjh kay awkat fraham krta hay aur srwr lwda ko kam krta haay۔ya abtdaiy tamyr kay aml kay bjaiay mkhsawsa wkfwn pr۔yha mthark mwad kay liye msaaly hay js main wkta fwkta ap dayt ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jesay saarf kay zaryaha tyar krdha mwad ya dayta jo aksar tbdyl hawta haay۔awr sas۔aap apnay ajzaaa main braha rast sy ays ays ya ays aay ays ays failwn ko draamd krsktay hain ، aur aghla daat jay ays talyf aur asalaha ko snbhalyn ghay۔ haat madaywl ryplysmnt (aych aym aar): trky kay doran ، aghla daat jay ays ayk tyza ryfrysh khsawsayt fraham krta hay jo ghrm madaywl ki tbdyly ko kabl bnata haay۔yha aap ko apnay kwda main tbdylyan karnay aur braؤzar main baghair kesi mkml safhaay ko dwbarha lwda kay fwry tawr par dykhnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، trky kay aml ko nmayan tawr par tyza krta haay۔ taip askrpt spwrt: aghla daat jay ays ko taip askrpt kay liye bhatryn mdd haasal hay ، js sy aap jamd kay sath ry aykt ayply kyshnza tyar krsktay hayn۔taipngh aur bhatr twlngh۔ srwr lys taynaty: aghla daat jay ays wrsl jesay srwr lys taynaty plyt farm kay sath baghair kesi rkawt kay kam krta hay ، js sy srwr anfrastrkchr kay baray main fkr kyay baghair aap ki ayply kyshn ko taynat karna aur khud bkhwd askyl karna aasan hawjata haay۔srwr saiyda ryndarngh ، rwtngh ، aur amart ko bhatr bnanay waly rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki khsawsayat۔yha rd aml kay mnsawbwn kay liye drkar zayada tr trtyb aur syt ap ko khlasaha krta hay ، js sy dawylprza ko aaly mayar ki ayply kyshnza ko mwsar andaza main tamyr karnay par twjha denay ki ajazat mlty haay۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo twsya aur khatmay ki faalyt kay sath drjha bndy kay drkhtwn kay nzaaray ko pysh krta haay۔
Answer: kwda aspltngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo rd aml (awr dyghr jawa askrpt frym wrk) main astamal hawty hay takha bndal jawa askrpt fail ko chhwtay "tkrawn" main tksym kya jaskay jsay daymanda par lwda kya jaskta haay۔kwda tksym karnay ka hadf abtdaiy bndal saiza ko kam karna aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana hay jo sirf mwjwdha safhaay ya jza kay liye drkar kwda ko lwda krkay bhatr haay۔ yahan kwda tksym karnay ka aml rd aml main kis tarah kam krta haay: kwda tksym karnay waly pwaints ki nshandhay krna: dawylprza kwda tksym karnay waly pwaints ka tayn karty hayn۔an ki drkhwast jahan kwda ko tksym karna smjh main aata haay۔yha aam tawr par mntaky hadwd jesay rastwn ، ajzaaa ، ya ghair mtzalzal madaywl ki draamdat par kya jata haay۔ alag alag hasawn ki tshkyl: jab kwda tksym karnay waly pwaints ki nshandhay ki jati hay tou ، blda twl ya bndalr (jysay wyb pyk) kwda bys ka tjzayha krta hay aur hr asplt kay liye alag alag hasaay bnata haay۔nktahayha tkraay alag jawa askrpt failyn hain jn main hr asplt pwaint kay liye mkhsawsa kwda hawta haay۔ aan daymanda ko lwda krna: jab drkhwast chl rahi hay tou ، hasawn ko zurwrt kay mtaabk mtaalbha par lada jata haay۔yha is wkt hawskta hay jab saarf kesi khasa rastay par jata hay ، kesi jzaw kay sath bat chyt krta hay ، ya jab ghair mtzalzal madaywlza ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ ry aykt main kwda tksym karnay kay kabl aml: abtdaiy bndal saiza main kmy: kwda tksym karnay sy abtdaiy jawa askrpt bndal kay saiza ko kam karnay main mdd mlty hay js ki zurwrt hawty hay js ki zurwrt hawty haay۔braؤzar kay zaryaha bhry hui haw۔chhwtay bndal saiza kay ntyjay main tyzay sy lwdangh kay awkat hawtay hain ، khasa tawr par aahastha antrnyt knykshn ya mwbail aalat par saarfyn kay l .۔ pysh krdha karkrdghy: hr safhaay ya jzaw kay liye sirf zurwry kwda ko lwda krkay ، kwda tksym karnay sy karkrdghy ko bhatr bnata hay js par aml draamd karnay ki zurwrt hay js par aml draamd karnay ki zurwrt haay۔as kay ntyjay main tyzay sy ryndarngh aur bhatr antrayktywyty hawty haay۔ antrayktw (ty ty aaiy) ka tyza wkt (ty ty aaiy): kwda tksym karnay kay sath ، tnkydy kwda ko pehlay trjyha aur lwda kya jaskta hay ، js sy saarfyn ko ayply kyshn kay sath zayada tyzay sy bat chyt ki jaskty haay۔as sy antrayktw ka ayk tyza wkt hawta hay ، jahan saarf ayply kyshn ka astamal shrwa krsktay hain jabky baky kwda ko ps mnzar main bhry hui haay۔ kychngh aur dwbarha astamal ki salahayt: kwda tksym karnay sy tkrawn ko braؤzar kay zaryaha kych karnay ki ajazat mlty hay ، js sy bad kay safhaha kay bwjh ko bhatr bnaya jata haay۔aghr mtadd safhaat ya ajzaaa mshtrkha kwda ka ashtrak karty hain tou ، mshtrkha hasawn ko ayply kyshn kay mkhtlf hasawn main dwbarha astamal kya jaskta hay ، js main nkl ko kam kya jaskta hay aur kychngh ko bhatr bnaya jaskta haay۔ tazaha karywn par ghranwlr kntrwl: jab kwda tksym karnay par aml draamd hawta hay tou ، drkhwast kay ayk hasaay main tbdylyan sirf chnk ko mtasar krty hayn۔(s) is mkhsawsa hasaay sy wabstha haay۔as sy zayada hadf shuda tazaha karywn ki ajazat mlty hay aur mamwly tbdylywn kay liye poray ayply kyshn bndal ko daaؤn lwda karnay ki zurwrt ko kam kya jaskta haay۔ kwda tksym karna khasa tawr par braay rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ya pychydha rwtngh aur mthark mwad waly afrad main mfyd haay۔yha kwda aan daymanda ko lwda krkay ، bndal kay saiza ko kam karnay ، aur tyza aur zayada mwsar ayply kyshn ki frahamy kay zaryaha saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bnanay kay zaryaha karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krta haay۔

Question: ayk rd aml kay jzaw ko nafza karain jo wakaat aur sngh myl kay sath ayk zamha dar taim lain dkhata haay۔
Answer: ry aykt main farm ki twsayk ko snbhalnay main saarf kay un pt ki twsayk karna shaml hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh farm jma krwanay sy pehlay yeh mkhsawsa mayar ya zurwryat ko pora krta haay۔rd aml main farm ki twsayk kay liye aap bohat sari tknykyn astamal krsktay hayn: blt un aych ty aym ayl twsayk safat: aych ty aym ayl kuch blt un twsayk safat fraham krta hay jo rd aml kay ajzaaa kay sath mil kar astamal kya jaskta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap farm fylda ko lazmi bnanay kay liye mtalwbha wsaf ka astamal krsktay hain ، ya un pt ki twsayk kay liye ayk mkhsawsa nmwnha ko nafza karnay kay liye pytrn wsaf ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ kndayshnl ryndarngh: aap twsayk ki haysayt ki bnyad par ghltay kay pyghamat ya astail ko mshrwta tawr par pysh krsktay hayn۔jb twsayk ki ghltay hawty hay tou ، aap ghltay kay pyghamat ki pysh ksh ko mthark karnay kay liye ryast ya jzaw ki prwp ko ap dayt krsktay hain ya ghalat fyldaza ki nshandhay karnay kay liye sy ays ays klaswn ka atalak krsktay hayn۔ kabw shuda jzaw ki twsayk: kntrwl shuda ajzaaa kay sath ، aap rd aml kay ajzaaa main farm ki haalt ko brkrar rakh saktay hayn۔ryast ya astyt mynjmnt laibryry jesay rydaks۔aap hr tbdyly kay wakaay par farm fyldaza ki twsayk krsktay hain ، is kay mtaabk ryast ko ap dayt krsktay hain ، aur saarf ko raiay fraham krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap ghltay kay pyghamat zaahar krsktay hain agar un pt twsayk kay mayar ko pora nahin krta haay۔yha laibryryan twsayk ki jama salahaytyn mhaya krty hain ، jn main fylda lywl ki twsayk ، askyma ki twsayk ، aur ghltay sy nmtnay shaml hayn۔wha farm ki twsayk kay aml ko aasan bnanay kay liye aalanyha nhaw aur haks pysh karty hayn۔ kstwm twsayk kay afaal: aap apni shkl ki zurwryat sy mtalk mkhsawsa kstm twsayk kay afaal tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔an afaal ko farm kay fyldaza ko drst karnay kay liye farm jma kranay ya un pt tbdyly kay wakaat par blaya jaskta haay۔apny mrzuy kay mtaabk twsayk kay afaal pychydha twsayk ki mntak ko anjam dy saktay hain ، jesay mkhsawsa nmwnwn ki janch karna ، akdar ka mwazanha karna ، ya twsayk kay liye API kal krna۔msaal kay tawr par ، YUP ayk mkbwl twsayk ki laibryry hay jo aap ko ayk zanjyr API ka astamal karty hoey twsayk askymwn ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔aap hr farm fylda kay liye twsayk kay kwaad ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، jesay mtalwbha fyldaza ، kam sy km/zayadha sy zayada lmbaiy ، ya pytrn mmasal۔ jab farm ki twsayk ko nafza karnay kay bad ، saarfyn ko un kay aadanwn ko drst karnay kay baray main saarfyn ki rhanmaiy kay liye wazuha ghltay kay pyghamat fraham karna zurwry haay۔dayta ki salmyt aur sykywrty ko ykyny bnanay kay l You aap ko srwr saiyda ki twsayk sy nmtnay par bhi ghwr karna chahaiay۔mzayd braan ، rsai bohat zurwry hay ، lhazaa askryn rydarza kay liye mnasb aay aar aai aay awsaaf aur lybl fraham karna ykyny bnaiyn۔ twsayk ki tknyk ko mntkhb karain jo aap ki zurwryat ko bhatryn tawr par ft bythty hay ، aur mwjwdha farm ki twsayk ki laibryrywn ko aml ko aasan bnanay aur apni rd aml ki shklwn main mzubwta twsayk ko ykyny bnanay kay liye astamal karnay par ghwr kryn۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jza lkhyn jo hasb zurwrt akdamat kay sath mlty mrhalha kay aml kay liye pyshrft kay asharay ko zaahar krta haay۔
Answer: ry aykt mymwizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mhanghay kmpywtyshn kay ntaij ya fnkshnl ajzaaa main pysh karnay kay kamwn kay ntaij ko bhatr bnanay kay liye karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔as ka mksad ajzaaa ki ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay ko rwkna hay aur rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki mjmway karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakta haay۔ jab ayk jzaw pysh krta hay tou ، rd aml niay prwps aur ryast kay sath mwazanha krta hay takha is bat ka tayn kya jaskay keh dwbarha pysh karnay wala zurwry hay ya nhayn۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، jab bhi is kay waldyn ko dwbarha pysh krta hay tou ، rd aml kesi jza ko dwbarha pysh kray ga ، chahaay jzaw kay prwps ya ryast main koi tbdyly nahin aai haay۔as sy ghair zurwry dwbarha kmpywtyshn aur dwbarha pysh karnay ka sbb bn sakta hay ، khasa tawr par pychydha ya kmpywtyshnl mhanghay ajzaaa kay liay۔ aar aay sy ty ayk mymw haair aardar jzaw (HOC) ya ayk rd aml fraham krta haay۔ fnkshnl ajzaaa ko lpytnay aur un kay ntaij ko yadghar bnanay kay liye mymw fnkshn۔jb kesi jzaw ko yad kya jata hay tou ، rd aml pchhlay lwghwn kay sath niay prps ka atly mwazanha krta haay۔aghr prps tbdyl nahin hoey hain tou ، rd aml ko pehlay sy pysh kyay gaye ntaij ko dwbarha astamal karain ، jzaw ko dwbarha pysh karnay sy rwkyn۔ yaddasht ka rd aml main kis tarah kam hawta haay: jzaw ko mymw sy lpytyn: mymw haak kay sath fnkshnl jzaw ko lpytyn ya ry aykt.mymw astamal kryn۔jzaw ka ayk yadghar wrzen bnanay kay liye fnkshn۔msaal kay tawr pr: jsxcopy kwdaykwnst mymwizada kmpwpynt = ry aykt.mymw (mycompointe) ؛ prps ka atly mwazanha: jab jzaw pysh kya jata hay tou ، rd aml niay prps ka mwazanha pchhlay prps kay sath atly mwazanha ka astamal karty hoey karty hayn۔aghr prps brabr hain tou ، rd aml ko pehlay sy pysh krdha ntaij ko dwbarha astamal karty hain aur jzaw ko dwbarha pysh karnay sy ghryza karty hayn۔ mymwizayshn mnzarnamwn main karkrdghy kay aham fwaid fraham krskty hay jahan ajzaaa ko wahi prwps mltay hain lekin un ko ap dayt karnay ki zurwrt nahin haay۔yha ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon sy bchnay main mdd krta hay aur ryndarngh ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta hay ، khasa tawr par pychydha ryndarngh mntak ya bhary kmpywtyshn waly ajzaaa kay liay۔ yeh bat aham hay keh yaddasht ko ansaaf kay sath astamal kya jana chahaiay۔tmam ajzaaa yaddasht sy faidha nahin athaiyn ga ، khasa tawr par woh lwgh jo bar bar ap dayt ya ajzaaa kay sath hain jo aalmy ryast par anhasaar karty hayn۔mzayd braan ، mymwraizayshn mwazanha kay aml ki wjha sy kuch awwr hayda mtaarf kraty hay ، lhazaa karkrdghy kay asarat ki pymaish karna aur is bat ka tayn karna zurwry hay keh aya hr mkhsawsa mnzar namay main hony waly akhrajat sy kahain zayada faidha hawta haay۔ mymwizayshn khasa tawr par karkrdghy ki asalaha ki dyghr tknykwn kay sath mil kar mؤsar hay jesay yw ays sy ayl byk byk aur ywzaymymw ، jwghyr zurwry kam ya kdr ki bazayaft ko rwknay main mdd kryn۔an tknykwn ko jwra kar ، aap apnay rd aml kay ajzaaa ki pysh ksh aur mjmway karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo bsary aaraa kay sath pas wrda ki taakt ka mytr pysh krta haay۔
Answer: ry aykt faibr rd aml mfahamt alghwrthm ki dakhly asalaha haay۔yha aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay aur alghwrthm ka ayk mjmwaha hay jo ryndarngh kay aml ko bhatr bnanay aur ryndarngh ki trjyhaat aur nzaam alawkat par bhatr kntrwl kay kabl bnanay kay liye ry aykt wrzen 16 main mtaarf kraya gaya haay۔ ry aykt faibr ka bnyady mksad yeh hay keh ryndarngh kay aml ko zayada mwsar ، zamha dar aur hayndalngh kay kabl bnaya jaiay۔mrkzay dhaghay ko msdwd kyay baghair pychydha saarf antrfys۔yha "faibr" kay nam sy ayk nya tsawr mtaarf krwa kar aur zayada lchkdar mfahamt alghwrthm ko nafza krkay is ko haasal krta haay۔ yahan rd aml faibr kay kuch aham phalw hain aur yeh kis tarah ryndarngh kay aml ko bhatr bnata haay: ankrymntl ryndarngh: ry aykt faibr pysh karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔"ryshwn" kay nam sy kam۔as sy ryndarngh kay aml ko rwknay ، trjyha denay aur zurwrt kay mtaabk dwbarha shrwa karnay kay kabl bnata hay ، bhatr saarf ka tjrbha fraham krta hay aur tawyl arsaay sy msdwd karnay ki mdt sy ghryza krta haay۔yha hr faibr ko apni ahamyt aur ajlt ki bnyad par trjyhaat tfwyzu krta haay۔as sy aaly trjyhay tazaha karywn ko trjyha denay kay kabl bnata hay ، jesay saarf ki bat chyt ، kam trjyhay tazaha karywn sy zayada ، jesay ps mnzar ki ryndarngh ya aaf askryn ajzaaa۔ taim slaisngh: taim slaisngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo ry aykt faibr kay zaryaha chhwtay chhwtay hasawn main ryndarngh kay kam ko twranay kay liye astamal ki jati hay awrmkhtlf kamwn main wkt mkhtsa kryn۔kam ko chhwtay hasawn main tksym krkay ، rd aml is bat ko ykyny bna sakta hay keh mrkzay dhaghha dusray aham kamwn kay liye dstyab rhata hay ، jesay saarf kay un pt ko snbhalna aur jwabdha saarf antrfys ko brkrar rkhna۔as sy bykar sy py yw wkt ko brwiay kar latay hoey aur is bat ko ykyny bnatay hoey karkrdghy main bhatry aaty hay keh ryndarngh ka aml mrkzay dhaghay par dyghr karrwaiywn ko rwkta nahin haay۔ ayrr ki hadwd aur bazayaby: ry aykt faibr bhatr ghltay sy nmtnay aur bazayaby kay tarykha kar ko fraham krta haay۔yha anfrady ajzaaa main ghltaywn ko alag krta hay aur drkhwast kay dyghr hasawn ko baghair kesi ayply kyshn krysh kay kam jary rkhnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ ryndarngh prwsys mynjmnt aur shydawlngh main REACT faibr ki bhatry sy mtalk rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ko zayada zamha dar bnnay kay kabl bnata hay ، pychydha UIs ko mwsar andaza main snbhalta hay ، aur saarf ka ayk hamwar tjrbha fraham krta haay۔yha mwjwdha ry aykt kwda bysza kay sath kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، aur zayada tr rd aml ki ayply kyshnza kabl aml kwda ki tbdylywn ki zurwrt kay baghair ry aykt faibr kay zaryaha mtaarf krwaiy janay wali karkrdghy ki asalaha sy faidha athaskty haay۔

Question: task mynjmnt kay liye ayk darygh aybl aur darap aybl knban bwrda ko zaahar karnay waly ayk rd aml kay jzaw ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: srwr saiyda ryndarda (ays ays aar) main rwtngh ko snbhalnay main ry aykt ayply kyshn main klaint saiyda aur srwr saiyda rwtngh ko hum aahangh karna shaml hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh mtalwbha yw aar ayl ki bnyad par sahayha ajzaaa pysh kyay jaiyn۔ays ays aar ry aykt ayply kyshn main rwtngh ko snbhalnay kay liye yahan ayk amwmy nktaha nzar haay: srwr saiyda rwtngh trtyb dyn: srwr par ، aap ko aanay wali drkhwastwn ko snbhalnay kay l your apnay srwr ko tshkyl denay ki zurwrt hay aur drkhwast krdha yw aar ayl ki bnyad par mnasb rd aml kay ajzaaa pysh karna hawgha۔as main aam tawr par srwr frym wrk jesay ayksprys daat jay ya aghlay daat jay ays ka astamal shaml hawta hay jo ays ays aar ki hamayt krta hay aur rwtngh ki salahaytwn ko fraham krta haay۔ rwt mypnghza ki wzuahat kryn: mtalwbha yw aar ayl aur isi tarah kay rd aml kay ajzaaa kay mabyn nkshha sazay ki wzuahat karain jo pysh kyay jaiyn۔yha rwtngh laibryry jesay ry aykt rwtr ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔rastwn aur un sy wabstha ajzaaa ki wzuahat karain ، bshmwl srwr par URL.Match rastwn main kesi bhi mthark pyramytrza smyt: jab srwr sy drkhwast ki jati hay tou ، rwtngh laibryry ko mtalwbha URL sy taay shuda rastwn kay khlaf mych karnay kay liye astamal karain aur ryndar kay liye mnasb jzaw ka tayn kryn۔ksy bhi zurwry aadad wa shmar ya pyramytrza ko yw aar ayl sy jzaw tak phanchaiyn۔ srwr par rd aml kay ajzaaa ko pysh kryn: ayk bar jab mnasb rd aml ka jzaw mmasal rastay ki bnyad par taay hawjata hay tou ، srwr saiyda ryndarngh kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey srwr par jzaw pysh karain ، jysayry ayktdawmsrwr ka ryndartwstrngh ya aghla daat jay ays kay srwr pysh karnay kay tarykay۔ksy bhi mtalwbha abtdaiy aadad wa shmar ko ajzaaa kay liye prwps kay tawr par mntkl kryn۔ klaint ko mhaya krdha HTML ko pysh kryn: ayk bar jab rd aml ka jzaw srwr par pysh kya jata hay tou ، ntyjay main HTML ko srwr kay rdaml kay hasaay kay tawr par klaint ko bhyjyn۔mwkl ko kesi bhi zurwry jawa askrpt aur sy ays ays bndal kay sath pehlay sy pysh krdha HTML mwsawl hawgha۔ klaint par haaidaryt: klaint ki taraf ، is ko antrayktw bnanay kay liye pehlay sy pysh krdha HTML ko jawa askrpt kay sath ry haaiydaryt kryn۔aywnt kay hayndalrza ko mnslk karnay ، klaint saiyda rwtngh trtyb denay ، aur zurwrt pranay par jzaw ki haalt ko shrwa karnay kay liye ry ayktdam kay haaiydaryt ka tarykha astamal kryn۔yha akdam ykyny bnata hay keh klaint saiyda nay pysh krdha ajzaaa srwr saiyda kay sath mwafkt pzayr hawn۔srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza kay sath۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw lkhyn jo nystda sbyns kay sath mlty lywl darap daaؤn mynw ko dkhata haay۔
Answer: ry aykt smwrty wzua ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo ry aykt 18 main mtaarf krwaiy hogi hay js ka mksad ayply kyshnza ko zayada zamha dar bna kar aur saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bnana hay aur ryndarngh kay doran mrkzay dhaghay ko msdwd karnay sy ghryza karna haay۔yha ayk sy zayada kamwn par byk wkt kam karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jesay ryndarngh ، dayta bazayaft ، aur saarf ki bat chyt۔ yahan rd aml kay mwda kay kuch klydy phalw aur fwaid hayn: bhatr rdaml: hum aahanghy mwda chhwtay ywntwn main ryndarngh kay kam ko twranay ki ajazat dyta hay awrsaarf kay taaml ko trjyha dyn ، js kay ntyjay main zayada zamha dar saarf antrfys hawta haay۔yha tawyl ryndarngh kay kamwn ko dyghr aham karrwaiywn ko rwknay sy rwkta hay ، jesay saarf kay un pt ya mthark tsaawyr ko snbhalna۔ taim slaisngh: hum aahanghy ka mwda taim slaisngh mtaarf krata hay ، ayk aysy tknyk jo ryndarngh kay kam ko "taim slaisza" kay nam sy chhwtay ywntwn main tksym krty haay۔rd aml mkhtlf kamwn kay liye wkt kay tkrawn ko mkhtsa krskta hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh yeh kam mtadd frymwn par phyl gaya hay aur mrkzay dhaghha dyghr aham karrwaiywn kay liye dstyab haay۔ trky psnd lwdangh: hum aahanghy kay mwda kay sath ، rd aml dstyab hony kay sath sath ajzaaa ko aahastha aahastha lwda aur pysh krskta haay۔as sy saarf ko ayply kyshn kay sath bat chyt karnay ki ajazat mlty hay is sy pehlay keh poray safhaay ki pysh ksh khtm hawjaiay ، js ki wjha sy abtdaiy lwdangh kay awkat aur bhatr karkrdghy ka mzaaharha hawta haay۔ pysh ksh ko bhatr bnanay ka kam: hum aahanghy ka tarykha un ki ahamyt aur ajlt ki bnyad par ryndarngh apdayts ko trjyha denay kay kabl bnata haay۔yha kam trjyhay tazaha karywn ko trjyha dy sakta hay ، jesay saarf ki bat chyt ya aadad wa shmar ki aham tbdylywn ko ، nchly trjyhay tazaha karywn kay mkablay myn۔yha trjyha is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh sab sy zayada mtalkha mwad saarf ko jld sy jld aawyzaan kya jata haay۔ ayrr ki hadwd aur bazayaft: hum aahanghy mwda mkhsawsa ajzaaa main ghltaywn ko alag thlgh krkay aur drkhwast kay dyghr hasawn ko ryndarngh aur kam kaj jary rkhnay ki ajazat dy kar ghltay sy nmtnay main azuafha krta haay۔yha pori ayply kyshn ko krysh hony sy ayk hi ghltay ko rwkta hay aur zayada lchkdar saarf ka tjrbha fraham krta haay۔ awwr ، ry aykt smwrnt mwda ayply kyshnza ko zayada zamha dar ، antrayktw aur lchkdar bna kar saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bnata haay۔as sy dstyab wsail ko bhatr tawr par astamal karnay ، aham ap dayts ko trjyha denay ، aur aahastha aahastha ajzaaa ko lwda aur ryndar karnay kay liye rd aml ki ajazat mlty hay ، js kay ntyjay main hamwar aur zayada kshsh saarf antrfys hawta haay۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo ryazuy ki karrwaiywn kay sath kylkwlytr antrfys pysh krta haay۔
Answer: ry aykt haks kuch kwaad aur bhatryn tarykwn kay sath aatay hain takha un kay sahayha astamal ko ykyny bnaya jaskay aur aam khrabywn sy bcha jaskay۔rd aml kay haks kay sath kam karty wkt kuch aham asawl aur bhatryn tarykwn ki pyrwy karna haay: sirf fnkshnl ajzaaa main haks ka astamal kryn: haks ko amly ajzaaa main astamal karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، nah keh klas ajzaaa myn۔haks fnkshnl ajzaaa kay laif saiykl aur astyt mynjmnt mykanzam par anhasaar karty hayn۔ aaly staha par haks ko kal kryn: haks ko hamyshha ayk fnkshnl jzaw ki aaly staha par blaya jana chahaiay nah keh lwp ، haalat ، ya ghhwnslay waly afaal kay andr۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh hr ryndar par haks ko ayk hi trtyb main blaya jata hay ، aur rd aml ryast ki sahayha ayswsy ayshn ko brkrar rakh sakta haay۔ ayk hi trtyb main haks ka astamal kryn: jab kesi jzaw main ayk sy zayada haks astamal karty ho tou ، hr ryndar par inhain ayk hi trtyb main kal karna ykyny bnaiyn۔as sy ryast aur ryndarza kay mabyn haks ko sahayha tarykay sy mnslk karnay main mdd mlty haay۔ haks ko mshrwta tawr par astamal kryn: agar aap ko mshrwta tawr par hak astamal karnay ki zurwrt hay tou ، is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh haalt msthakm kdr par mbny hay aur ryndarza kay mabyn tbdyl nahin hawty haay۔haks ko hamyshha ayk hi trtyb main hr ryndar par blaya jana chahaiay۔ dwbarha astamal kay l custom apni mrzuy kay mtaabk haks ko astamal kryn: agar aap apnay aap ko haks ka ayk syt dwbarha astamal karty hoey ya kesi jzaw main pychydha mntak rkhtay hain tou ، is mntak ko kstm hak main nkalnay par ghwr kryn۔kstm haks aap ko ayk sy zayada ajzaaa main mntak ko smytnay aur bantnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔haks ki msthakm shnakht honi chahaiay aur isy lwp ya haalat kay andr mthark tawr par tkhlyk nahin kya jana chahaiay۔ ghair faal ajzaaa main haks ka astamal karty hawiay۔ajzaaahaks jzaw kay laif saiykl aur astyt mynjmnt mykanzam par anhasaar karty hayn۔ hr hak ka mksad smjhyn: apnay aap ko hr hak kay mksad aur tarza aml sy wakf kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، ywsstyt hak mkamy ajzaaa ki haalt ko snbhalnay kay liye hay ، ywzafykt hak zumny asarat aur laif saiykl mynjmnt kay liye hay ، aur yw ays sy twnt tykst hak syak wa sbak ki akdar tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay liye haay۔ rd aml kay haks kay sath kam karnay sy bchnay kay liye kamn ki khrabyan: mshrwta tawr par kal haks ko bhwl jana:aghr aap ko mshrwta tawr par hak astamal karnay ki zurwrt hay tou ، is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh haalt pysh karnay walon main mstkl tawr par brkrar rhaay۔aysa karnay main nakamy sy mtzuad ryast aur kyraay ka baasa bn sakta haay۔ ryast ko braha rast tmashna: jab ywstyt jesay haks kay sath ryast ko ap dayt karty ho tou ، ryasty aabjykt ko braha rast tbdyl karnay sy ghryza kryn۔as kay bjaiay ، mnasb ryast ki tazaha karywn ko ykyny bnanay kay liye hak kay zaryaha fraham krdha astyt apdaytr fnkshn ka astamal kryn۔as bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh anhasaar ko sahayha tarykay sy wazuha karain ya ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon sy bchnay kay l appropriate mnasb shraita shaml kryn۔ useefect main anhasaar ko mshghwl krna: jab Useefect hak ka astamal karty ho tou ، is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh aap anhasaar saf main sahayha anhasaar fraham kryn۔anhasaar ko chhwrana ya ghair zurwry afrad ko shaml karna ghair mtwka slwk ka baasa bn sakta haay۔ un nksaanat sy bchnay kay l each ، hr hak ki dstawyzaat aur tarza aml ko achhy tarah sy smjhna ، tjwyza krdha rhanma khtawta par aml karna ، aur apnay ajzaaa main haks ka astamal karty wkt anhasaar aur shraita par ahatyata sy ghwr karna zurwry haay۔bakaadghy sy kwda kay jaizaay aur janch sy hak kay astamal sy kesi bhi mmknha msilay ko pkranay main bhi mdd mil sakti haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo mwad aur twghl faalyt kay sath twt phwt kay kabl saiyda pynl ko dkhata haay۔
Answer: braay pymanay par rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main ، ryast ka antzaam karna zayada pychydha hawjata hay ، aur mtadd ajzaaa main mstkl aur mwsar ryasty antzaam ko ykyny bnanay kay l often is kay liye aksar mrkzay nktaha nzar ki zurwrt hawty haay۔braay pymanay par rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main ryast ko snbhalnay kay liye ryasty antzaamyha ki mtadd laibryryan dstyab hayn۔yhaan kuch mkbwl akhtyarat hayn: rydaks: rydaks ry aykt mahawlyaty nzaam main sab sy zayada astamal hony wali astyt mynjmnt laibryrywn main sy ayk haay۔yha ghair mstkym dayta kay bhaaؤ ki pyrwy krta hay aur ayk wahad aalmy ryast kay drkht ka astamal krta haay۔ajzaaa afaal aur kam karnay walon kay zaryaha ryast kay sath taaml karty hayn۔rydawks ayk mtwka ryasty antzaamyha ka nzaam mhaya krta hay ، js sy drkhwast ki haalt main hony wali tbdylywn kay baray main astdlal karna aasan hawjata haay۔yha mshtrkha ryast aur aaly drjay ki taim trywl daybghngh salahaytwn ki bray mkdar kay sath pychydha ayply kyshnza kay liye mwzawn haay۔ aym aw by ayks: aym aw by ayks ayk aur mkbwl astyt mynjmnt laibryry hay jo sadghy aur rd aml par mrkwza haay۔yha ryast ka antzaam karnay kay liye kabl mshahadha dayta dahanchay aur khwdkar anhasaar sy bakhbr rhanay ka astamal krta haay۔MOBX aap ko mshahadha karnay waly astwrza bnanay aur mshahadha karnay walon ، kmpywtda akdar aur afaal ko nshan zad karnay kay liye sjawt ka astamal karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha ryasty antzaamyha kay l a ayk zayada lchkdar aur bdyhay nktaha nzar pysh krta hay ، khasa tawr par chhwty aur kam pychydha ayply kyshnza kay l .۔ zastynda: zas astynda ayk halka phlka ryast ki antzaamyha ki laibryry hay jo rd aml kay haks aur syak wa sbak API ka faidha athaty haay۔yha ryasty kntynrza bnanay aur un ka antzaam karnay kay liye ayk sadha aur aalanyha API fraham krta haay۔zastynda karkrdghy aur karkrdghy par twjha denay kay sath ، ryasty antzaam kay liye ayk kam sy kam lekin taaktwr hal pysh krta haay۔yha ryast ki ayk aatdal psnd mkdar kay sath chhwtay sy drmyanay drjay kay ayply kyshnza kay liye mwzawn haay۔ rykwl: bykar ayk ryasty antzaamyha ki laibryry hay jo fys bk kay zaryaha tyar ki hogi haay۔as main haks ka rd aml ka faidha athata hay aur ryast kay antzaam kay l a ayk zayada lchkdar aur danay dar nktaha nzar fraham krta haay۔bazayaft aytmwn kay tsawr ko mtaarf krata hay ، jo ryast kay anfrady tkrawn ، aur slyktrza ki nmaindghy karty hain ، jo aytmwn par mbny niy ryastwn ki akdar ko haasal karty hayn۔yha ryast ki tshkyl par zawr dyta hay aur ryasty antzaamyha kay liye zayada विकेंद्रीकृत nktaha nzar ki hawsalha afzaaiy krta haay۔ ghraf kyw ayl: ghraf kyw ayl khud ryasty antzaamyha ki laibryry nahin hay blkha APIs kay liye astfsar ki zaban aur rn taim haay۔as ko blt un kychngh aur sbskrpshn ki salahaytwn ka faidha athatay hoey ry aykt ayply kyshnza kay liye ryasty antzaam kay hal kay tawr par astamal kya jaskta haay۔ghraf kyw ayl kay zaryaha ، aap ayk askyma ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo aap kay atalak kay dayta ki zurwryat ki nmaindghy krta hay aur ghraf kyw ayl klaint jesay apwlw klaint ya rylay ko dayta lanay ، kychngh ، aur ap dayt karnay kay liye astamal krta haay۔ astyt mynjmnt laibryry ka antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki pychydghy par mnhasar hay ، js ka saiza ، saiza ka saiza ، js ka saiza ، saiza ka saiza ، js ka saiza aap ki drkhwast ki pychydghy par mnhasar haay۔ryast ، aur aap ki trkyaty tym ki trjyhaat۔yha zurwry hay keh tjarty talkat ka ahatyata sy andazaha karain ، sykhnay kay mnhany khtawta par ghwr karain ، aur ryasty antzaam kay hal ka antkhab karain jo aap kay mkhsawsa mnsawbay ki zurwryat ko bhatr bnaiay۔mzayd braan ، yeh bat kabl ghwr hay keh mkamy ajzaaa astyt mynjmnt kay sath mil kar ry aykt ka blt un syak wa sbak API bhi chhwty drkhwastwn ya alag thlgh ryasty antzaam ki zurwryat kay liye kafy hawskta haay۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo slaiyda asharay aur aatw play kay akhtyarat kay sath ayk zamha dar carousel pysh krta haay۔
Answer: ry aykt aabaiy ayk frym wrk hay jo fys bk nay tyar kya hay jo dawylprza ko jawa askrpt aur rd aml ka astamal karty hoey mkamy mwbail ayply kyshnza bnanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha isi asawlwn par mbny hay jesay rd aml hay lekin khasa tawr par mwbail ayp ki nshwwnma kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔yhaan klydy nkat hain jo wyb dawylpmnt kay liye rd aml sy mkhtlf hayn: targht plyt farm: ry aykt bnyady tawr par wyb ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo wyb braؤzarza main chltay hain ، jabky ry aykt aabaiy mwbail ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo iOS aur Android aalat par chltay hayn۔ry aykt aabaiy dawylprza ko ayk bar kwda lkhnay aur isy ayk sy zayada plyt farmza par taynat karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jabky rd aml wyb par mbny ayply kyshnza par mrkwza haay۔ saarf antrfys: ry aykt aabaiy aabaiy mkamy UI ajzaaa astamal krta hay jo saarf kay antrfys ko pysh karnay kay liye bnyady plyt farm (iOS ya Android) kay zaryaha fraham krdha fraham krdha haay۔as sy mkamy ayps ko wyb par mbny ry aykt ayply kyshnza kay mkablay main zayada mkamy nzar aur mhasws karnay ki ajazat mlty hay ، jo UI ryndarngh kay liye HTML aur CSS ka astamal karty hayn۔ trky ka nktaha nzar: ry aykt aabaiy UI kay ajzaaa ki tamyr kay liye ayk aalanyha nktaha nzar astamal krta hay ، jesay wyb kay liye rd aml۔taham ، rd aml dysy ajzaaa ko khasa tawr par mwbail plyt farm kay sath kam karnay aur mwbail sy mtalk khsawsayat aur afaal ki pysh ksh kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔ry aykt aabaiy aalha ki salahaytwn ، jesay kymra ، jghrafyaiy mkam ، aur psh atalaaat kay sath bat chyt karnay kay liye pehlay sy tamyr shuda ajzaaa aur API ka ayk syt bhi fraham krta haay۔ astailngh: jabky wyb kay liye rd aml astail kay liye sy ays ays ka astamal krta hay ، rd aml ka astamal astailngh sstm ka astamal krta hay jo isi tarah ka haay۔sy ays ays lekin mwbail ayp ki nshwwnma kay liye mwzawn۔rd aml ka aabaiy ajzaaa kay l style astail ki wzuahat kay liye jawa askrpt aur un lain astail aabjykt ka ayk mjmwaha astamal krta haay۔yha pwzayshnngh ajzaaa kay l flex flyks baks par mbny trtyb ka nzaam bhi fraham krta haay۔ trky ka mahawl: ry aykt dysy ayps ko tyar karnay kay liye IOS aur Android kay liye mkamy trkyaty mahawl ko trtyb denay ki zurwrt hawty hay ، bshmwl plyt farm sy mtalk twlza ، ays day kay aur aymwlytrza ko anstal krna۔dwsry taraf ، wyb dawylpmnt kay liye rd aml ، sirf ayk wyb braؤzar aur tykst aydaytr ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ thrda party laibryrywn: rd aml ka talk tesri party ki laibryrywn aur khasa tawr par mwbail ayp ki nshwwnma kay liye bnaiay gaye ajzaaa ka apna mahawlyaty nzaam rkhta haay۔aghrchha kuch laibryrywn aur ajzaaa ko wyb kay liye rd aml kay sath shyir kya gaya hay ، bohat sy lwgh ry aykt aabaiy kay liye tyar kyay jatay hain aur mwbail plyt farm kay liye mkhsawsa afadyt fraham karty hayn۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، rd aml ka astamal jawa askrpt aur rd aml ka astamal karty hoey mkamy mwbail ayply kyshnza ki tamyr ka ayk frym wrk haay۔yha hadf plyt farm ، ywzar antrfys ryndarngh ، dawylpmnt aprwch ، astailngh ، aur trkyaty mahawl kay lhaaza sy wyb dawylpmnt kay rd aml sy mkhtlf haay۔ry aykt aabaiy khasa tawr par mwbail ayp ki nshwwnma kay l optim bhatr hay aur dawylprza ko kras plyt farm mkamy mwbail ayply kyshnza ki tamyr kay l their apnay mwjwdha rd aml kay alm ko faidha athanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo apni mrzuy kay mtaabk daaؤn lwda kay akhtyarat kay sath fail daaؤn lwda kay liye pyshrft kay asharay ko zaahar krta haay۔
Answer: srwr lys ayply kyshnza ، rd aml kay tnazar main ، un ayply kyshnza ka hawalha dyn jo srwr lys kmpywtngh plyt farm ka astamal karty hoey bnaiay gaye aur taynat hayn۔srwr lys fn tamyr main ، srwr saiyda anfrastrkchr aur mynjmnt ko khlasaha kya jata hay ، js sy dawylprza ko srwr mynjmnt ، askyl ayblty ، ya anfrastrkchr ki frahamy kay baray main fkr kyay baghair kwda aur bldangh ayply kyshnza par twjha mrkwza karnay ki ajazat di jati haay۔ jab srwr lys plyt farm ، aam tawr par ry aykt ayply kyshn ki taynaty haay۔nktaha nzar srwr lys afaal aur klaؤda astwryj srwsza ka mjmwaha astamal karna haay۔as aml ka ayk jaizaha yeh haay: srwr lys afaal: srwr lys plyt farm jesay AWS lymbdaa ، Azure fnkshnza ، ya ghwghl klaؤda afaal aap ko mkhsawsa trghrza ya HTTP drkhwastwn kay jwab main chhwtay ، wakaha sy chlnay waly afaal ko chlanay kay kabl bnatay hayn۔yha afaal aap kay ry aykt ayply kyshn kay liye psdyd mntak kay tawr par kam krsktay hayn۔ aay py aai akhttamy nkat: aap apnay ry aykt ayply kyshn kay liye API kay akhttamy mkamat ko snbhalnay kay liye srwr lys afaal tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔yha afaal aanay wali drkhwastwn ko snbhal saktay hain ، zurwry prwsysngh ya dayta ki bazayaft anjam dy saktay hain ، aur klaint saiyda ry aykt ayply kyshn ka jwab waps krsktay hayn۔srwr lys afaal jawa askrpt (nwda. jay ays) ، azaghr ، ya dyghr maawn zabanwn jesi zabanwn main lkha jaskta haay۔ klaؤda astwryj: aych ty aym ayl ، sy ays ays ، jawa askrpt failwn ، aur mydaya failwn (tsaawyr ، wydaywza) jesay jamd asaasawn kay liye ، aap badl ka faidha atha saktay hayn۔astwryj srwsza jesay aymyzawn ays 3 ، ayzawr blab astwryj ، ya ghwghl klaؤda astwryj۔yha khdmat aap kay ry aykt ayply kyshn kay asaasawn kay liye twsya pzayr aur kabl aatmad astwryj mhaya krty hayn۔ dawylpmnt: apnay ry aykt ayply kyshn ko srwr lys plyt farm par taynat karnay kay l you'll ، aap aam tawr par apnay ayply kyshn kwda ko bndal aur bhatr bnanay kay liye wyb pyk ya parsl jesay blda twl ka astamal karain ghay۔as kay ntyjay main jamd asaasawn ko phir klaؤda astwryj srws main ap lwda kya jata haay۔srwr lys afaal kay l you ، aap plyt farm sy mtalk mkhsawsa taynaty mykanzam ، jesay AWS klaؤda farmyshn ، Azure ryswrs mnyjr ، ya ghwghl klaؤda taynaty mnyjr ko astamal karain ga takha fnkshn ko taynat kya jaskay۔srwr lys plyt farm kay zaryaha fraham krdha HTTP drkhwastwn ya APIs ka astamal karty hoey srwr lys afaal۔aap apnay srwr lys akhttamy nktaha par drkhwastyn karnay kay liye Axios ya blt main bazayaft API jesi laibryrywn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ srwr lys plyt farmza main ry aykt ayply kyshnza ko taynat karnay kay fwaid main shaml hayn: askyl ayblty: srwr lys plyt farmza aanay waly tryfk ki bnyad par aap ki ayply kyshn ko khud bkhwd askyl karain ، mwsar wsail kay astamal ko ykyny bnaiyn۔.kwst tasayr: srwr lys fn tamyrat kay sath ، aap sirf apnay afaal aur astwryj kay asal astamal kay liye adaiyghy karty hain ، bjaiay srshar srwrza ko brkrar rkhnay aur adaiyghy karnay kay bjaiay۔frnt aynda kay ajzaaa۔ aaly dstyaby: srwr lys plyt farm aam tawr par blt un faltw pn aur ghltay rwadary fraham karty hain ، jo aap ki drkhwast ki aaly dstyaby ko ykyny bnatay hayn۔ yeh aap kay mntkhb krdha srwr lys plyt farm ki mkhsawsa khsawsayat aur hadwd par ghwr karna zurwry hay ، nyza kesi bhi azuafy khdmat ya tshkylat ki bhi zurwrt haay۔twsayk ، dayta bys anzumam ، aur kychngh jesi chyzawn kay l a ، srwr lys mahawl main mkml tawr par faal rd aml ki ayply kyshn ki tamyr aur taynat karnay kay liay۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw lkhyn jo mthark mwad kay liye mamar kay asar kay sath ayk zamha dar ghrda la aaؤt dkhata haay۔
Answer:
