Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo mntkhb awkat aur mnt kay sath taim chnnay waly ko pysh krta haay۔
Answer: braay aur pychydha ajzaaa ya saarf kay antrfys ki tamyr kay l rea rd aml ajzaaa ki trkyb sy mrad mtadd chhwtay ajzaaa ko jwranay ki mshk haay۔as main ghhwnsla karna aur dwbarha astamal kay kabl ajzaaa ko shaml karna shaml hay takha aysay ajzaaa ka ayk drjha bndy pyda kya jaskay jo ayk mkhsawsa faalyt ya fychr ko pora karnay kay liye mil kar kam karty hayn۔ksy drkhwast kay hasaay۔ajzaaa ki tshkyl kwda kay dwbarha astamal ko kis tarah frwgh dyty hay is kay baray main kuch aham nkat yeh hayn: dwbarha astamal ki salahayt: UI ko chhwtay ، dwbarha astamal kay kabl ajzaaa main twra kar ، aap mkhsawsa afadyt ya bsary anasar ko alag thlgh aur ankpt krsktay hayn۔as kay bad yeh ajzaaa poray atalak main mtadd bar astamal kyay jasktay hain ، kwda ki nkl ko kam karty hain aur mstkl mzaajy ko frwgh dytay hayn۔ khdshat ko khtm krna: jzaw ki tshkyl aap ko mkhtlf khdshat ya zamha darywn ko alag alag ajzaaa main alag karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔har jzaw kesi khasa kam par twjha mrkwza krskta hay ، jesay fharst pysh karna ، saarf kay un pt ko snbhalna ، ya dayta lana۔yha alyhadghy kwda bys ko mnzam ، smjhnay aur brkrar rkhnay main aasan bnaty haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh aap mazeed pychydha ajzaaa ya saarf antrfys bnanay kay l contents ajzaaa ko aktha krsktay hayn۔ayk dusray kay andr ajzaaa ko ghhwnsla karnay sy ، aap aysay ajzaaa ka drjha bndy bnasktay hain jo UI ki sakht aur tarza aml ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔zamha darychhwtay ajzaaa ko tharyr karnay sy ، hr jzaw kesi khasa kam ya zamha dary par twjha mrkwza krskta hay ، js sy kwda bys ko zayada madaywlr ، kabl janch ، aur brkrar rkhnay kay kabl bnaya jaskta haay۔mkhtlf ajzaaa ko ayk sath tharyr krkay ، aap mkhtlf hasawn ko dwbarha astamal krkay aur amtzaaj krkay kesi jzaw ya UI ki mkhtlf haaltyn tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔yha lchk aap ko kwda ko dwbarha lkhnay ya nkl kay baghair astamal kay maamlat ya tkazuwn main UI ko dahalnay kay kabl bnaty haay۔aaly staha kay ajzaaa nchlay drjay kay ajzaaa ko ykja krkay aur un ka antzaam krkay pychydha mntak ya tarza aml ko khlasaha krsktay hayn۔yha tjrydy kwda bys ki tfhaym aur dykh bhal ko aasan bnata haay۔ awwral ، rd aml main jzaw ki tshkyl kwda ko dwbarha astamal kay kabl ، kmpwza aybl aur ghhwnsla ajzaaa main twra kar kwda kay dwbarha astamal ko frwgh dyty haay۔as sy kwda bys ki madaywlryty ، brkrar rkhnay aur lchk main azuafha hawta hay ، js sy dawylprza ko pychydha aur twsya pzayr ayply kyshnza ko mwsar andaza main bnanay kay kabl bnata haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo hasb zurwrt dayta aur astail kay sath barkwda ya kyw aar kwda jnrytr ko dkhata haay۔
Answer: rd aml kay dayzaain kay nmwnay aam msail kay kaim krdha aur dwbarha kabl astamal halwn ka hawalha dytay hain jn ka dawylprza ka samna karty wkt dawylprza ka samna karna prata haay۔yha nmwnay rd aml kay ajzaaa ki tshkyl aur un ko mnzam karnay ، ryast ka antzaam karnay ، dayta kay bhaaؤ ko snbhalnay ، aur mkhtlf khsawsayat ko nafza karnay kay liye rhanma khtawta aur bhatryn taryk kar mhaya karty hayn۔ry aykt ayply kyshnza main kuch aam tawr par astamal shuda dayzaain kay nmwnay yeh hayn: kntynr kay ajzaaa ka nmwnha: kntynr ajzaaa ka nmwnha (jsay asmart damym jzaw pytrn bhi kaha jata haay) ajzaaa ko do ksmwn main alag krta haay: kntynr kay ajzaaa aur pryzantyshnl ajzaaa۔kntynr kay ajzaaa ryast kay antzaam ، dayta lanay ya tghyrat ko snbhalnay aur byrwny khdmat kay sath bat chyt karnay kay liye zamha dar hayn۔pryzantyshnl ajzaaa UI anasar ko pysh karnay aur prwps kay zaryaha kntynr ajzaaa sy dayta wsawl karnay par twjha dytay hayn۔yha nmwnha ajzaaa ki dwbarha prywstyt aur khdshat ki alyhadghy ko frwgh dyta haay۔ ryndar prps pytrn: ryndar prps pytrn main kesi jzaw kay tawr par kesi fnkshn ko mntkl karna shaml hawta hay ، js sy jzaw ko waldyn kay jzaw kay zaryaha fraham krdha mwad ya tarza aml ko pysh kya jaskta haay۔yha nmwnha ajzaaa kay mabyn kwda aur faalyt ko bantnay kay kabl bnata hay ، js sy yeh lchkdar aur dwbarha kabl astamal hawta haay۔msaalwn main ryasty antzaam ko bantnay ، twsayk sy nmtnay ، ya dwbarha astamal kay kabl aadad wa shmar ko haasal karnay waly mntak ko nafza karnay kay liye ryndar prps ka astamal shaml haay۔ haaiydar aardar jzaw (HOC) pytrn: aaly aardar kay ajzaaa aysay kam hain jo ayk jzaw lytay hain aur is jzaw ka bhatr wrzen waps karty hayn۔HOCs aap ko lpyt kar ajzaaa main azuafy faalyt shaml karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔aam astamal kay maamlat main twsayk ، laghngh ، ya prwps kay zaryaha dayta fraham karna shaml hayn۔HOCs mntak ko dwbarha astamal karnay aur ajzaaa ko un ki bnyady zamha darywn par mrkwza rkhnay ka ayk tarykha fraham karty hayn۔ rydawks pytrn: rydawks ry aykt ayply kyshnza kay liye ryasty antzaamyha ki ayk mkbwl laibryry haay۔yha flwks fn tamyr ki pyrwy krta hay aur ghair mstkym dayta kay bhaaؤ ko mlazamt dyta haay۔rydaks pytrn main ayk mrkzay astwr ki wzuahat karna shaml hay jo drkhwast ki haalt rkhta hay aur ryast main trmym karnay kay liye akdamat bhyjta haay۔ajzaaa knykt fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey astwr sy rabtaha krsktay hain ، jo ryast aur afaal ko jzaw kay shaaray par nkshha bnatay hayn۔yha nmwnha pychydha ayply kyshnza kay l state ryast kay antzaam ka ayk pysh kyasy hal fraham krta haay۔yha jzaw kay drkht main mtadd ajzaaa main aalmy ya mshtrkha ryast ko bantnay kay liye mfyd haay۔syak wa sbak fraham karnay waly aysay ajzaaa ko lpyttay hain jn ko mshtrkha aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty hay ، aur saarfyn drkht ko kryb trien fraham knndha sy dayta tak rsaiy haasal karty hayn۔yha nmwnha prwp darlngh ko aasan bnata hay aur thymza ، lwklaizayshn ، ya twsayk ki haalt kay antzaam kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha nmwnha kwda kay dwbarha astamal ، khdshat sy alyhadghy ، aur madaywlr trky ko frwgh dyta haay۔ajzaaa ko ayk sath tharyr krkay ، dawylpr lchkdar aur twsya pzayr UIs tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔ yeh ry aykt ayply kyshnza main astamal hony waly dayzaain nmwnwn ki sirf chnd msaalyn hayn۔dayzaain pytrn ka antkhab drkhwast ، pychydghy aur tym ki trjyhaat ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar haay۔ry aykt dayzaain kay nmwnay mshtrkha chylnjwn kay liye rhanmaiy aur saabt hal fraham karty hain ، js sy dawylprza ko mzubwta ، brkrar rkhnay aur mwsar rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki tamyr main mdd mlty haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw lkhyn jo pas wrda ki taakt ki twsayk kay sath pas wrda un pt fylda dkhata haay۔
Answer: rd aml main ، API kalza ، sbskrpshnza ، ya dawm hayra phyry jesay zumny asarat aam tawr par useefect hak ka astamal karty hoey snbhalay jatay hayn۔ywzafykt hak aap ko fnkshnl ajzaaa main zumny asarat anjam denay aur un kay laif saiykl ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔as ka ayk jaizaha yahan hay keh USEEFFECT hak ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: USEEFECT hak draamd kryn: JSXCOPY CODEMPORT React ، 'USEEFECT}' rd aml 'say ؛ zumny asar ki mntak ki wzuahat kryn: fnkshnl jzaw kay andr ، USEEFECT hak ka aalan karain aur ayk kal byk fnkshn fraham karain js main mwjwd haay۔zumny asar mntak۔as kal byk fnkshn ko ajzaaa kay pysh aanay kay bad aml main laya jaye gha۔// anhasaar araypysyt anhasaar (akhtyary): yw ays ay ay ayfykt hak dusri dlyl kay tawr par akhtyary anhasaar srny la sakta haay۔yha saf un akdar ki wzuahat krty hay js par asar mnhasar hawta haay۔aghr anhasaar main sy koi bhi bdl jata hay tou ، is ka asar dwbarha aml main laya jaye gha۔anhasaar srny ko chhwrana ya khaly srny ([]) ko ghzarna is ka mtalb hay keh abtdaiy ryndar kay bad ، asar sirf ayk bar chlay gha۔، aap ywzafykt kal byk sy safaiy ka fnkshn waps krsktay hayn۔as safaiy ka fnkshn is sy pehlay keh is ajzaaa ko ghair mnkwlha ya dwbarha pysh kya jaiay۔rd aml kay ajzaaa main zumny asarat ko snbhalnay ka ayk taaktwr tarykha fraham krta haay۔astamal kay kuch aam maamlat yeh hayn: API sy dayta lana: JSXCOPY CodyUseefect (() => {Const FechData = async () => {kwshsh karain {kant response jwab = antzaar karain bazayaft ('https://api.example.com/data') ؛ const dayta = jwab denay wala jwab۔ json () ؛ // dayta par karrwaiy kryn} kych (ghltay) {// hayndal ghltay}} ؛ fych daata () ؛} ، []) ؛ asal wkt ki tazaha karywn ko sbskraib krna: jsxcopy coduseeffect)dom dawm main trmym krna: jsxcopy coduseefect (() => {const ansar = dstawyza۔ getElementByid ('myelement') ؛ ansar. astail.byk ghraؤnda klwr = 'srkh' ؛ wapsy () => {// dawm tbdyl karain ansar۔ astail. byk ghraؤnda klr = '' ؛} ؛} ، []) ؛ ywzafykt hak ka astamal krkay ، aap mnasb laif saiykl mynjmnt ko ykyny bnatay hoey rd aml kay ajzaaa main zumny asarat ko mؤsar tarykay sy snbhal saktay hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo mrzuy kay mtaabk dayta aur chart ki aksam kay sath dayta wyzenaizayshn chart pysh krta haay۔
Answer: ry aykt sspns ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo rd aml main pysh ki hogi hay jo ajzaaa ko ryndarngh ko "matal" karnay ki ajazat dyty hay jabky ghair mtzalzal dayta ko lwda karnay ka antzaar krty haay۔yha hum aahanghy wzua kay sath mil kar kam krta hay ، jo ayk tjrbaty rd aml ki khsawsayt hay jo chhwtay ywntwn main ryndarngh kay braay kamwn ko twra kar hum aahanghy ki pysh ksh aur bhatr saarf kay tjrbay ko kabl bnaty haay۔ rd aml sspns aur hum aahanghy mwda kay sath ، aap apnay rd aml ki ayply kyshnza kay lwdangh tjrbay ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔sst lwdangh aur dayta ko zayada hamwar aur saarf dwst andaza main lanay ka aml۔yhaan ayk jaizaha hay keh hum aahanghy wzua kay kamwn aur is kay fwaid kay sath kis tarah rd aml zaahar karty hayn: ryndarngh ko matal kryn: jab kesi jzaw ko aadad wa shmar ko mtnasb tawr par lanay ki zurwrt hawty hay tou ، jab tak dayta dstyab nahin hawta hay tou woh is ki pysh ksh ko matal karnay kay liye rd aml ka astamal krskta haay۔as sy saarf ko khaly ya jzawy tawr par bhry hui UIs zaahar karnay sy bch jata haay۔as kay bjaiay ، rd aml sspns ayk fal byk UI ، jesay lwdangh aspnr ya knkal askryn ko zaahar krta hay ، jabky dayta ko haasal kya jarhaa haay۔ dayfryda astyt apdayts: hum aahanghy mwda kesi bhi wkt twkf aur ryndarngh ko dwbarha shrwa karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، yahan tak keh poray ryndar mrhalay ko mkml karnay sy pehlay hayas sy aadad wa shmar ki bazayaft jesay nchlay trjyhay tazaha karywn par aaly trjyhay ap dayts ، jesay saarf ki bat chyt ko trjyha denay kay kabl bnata haay۔rd aml kuch ajzaaa ki pysh ksh ko mwkhr krskta hay jab tak keh aaly trjyhay kam mkml nah hawjaiay ، is ki drkhwast ki smjhy janay wali karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaiay۔jb tak keh pora drkht nah pysh kya jaiay۔as sy dusray ajzaaa ko pysh karnay aur saarf ki bat chyt ka jwab denay ki ajazat dy kar jnky ya ghair jwaby UIs sy bchnay main mdd mlty hay jabky ghair mtzalzal kamwn ko mkml karnay ka antzaar karty hawiay۔ghyr mtzalzal karrwaiywn kay doran ryndarngh aur fal byk UIs ki nmaish krkay ، saarfyn ko drkhwast main achank mnjmd ya takhyr ka samna nahin karna prata haay۔as sy yeh tasar mlta hay keh drkhwast mstkl tawr par lwdangh aur jwab dy rahi hay ، yahan tak keh wkt astamal karnay waly kamwn sy nmtnay kay wkt bhy۔har jzaw kay andr waday ki rd re yon ya ghltaywn ko dsty tawr par snbhalnay kay bjaiay ، aap aadad wa shmar ki bazayaft kay doran rwnma hony wali ghltaywn ko pkranay aur snbhalnay kay liye ghltay ki had kay jzaw ka astamal krsktay hayn۔as sy ghltay ko snbhalnay aur ajzaaa ko mtzuad ya twty hui haalt main janay sy rwknay main mdd mlty haay۔ hum aahanghy mwda kay sath aar aay sy ty sspns ghair mtzalzal dayta ki bazayaft aur ry aykt ayply kyshnza main pysh karnay kay liye ayk taaktwr tarykha kar fraham krta haay۔yha hamwar lwdangh ka aml ، bhatr rdaml aur bhatr ghltay sy nmtnay kay zaryaha saarf kay tjrbay ko brahata haay۔an khsawsayat ko brwiay kar latay hoey ، dawylprza zayada mwsar aur saarf dwst ayply kyshnza tyar krsktay hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo mrzuy kay mtaabk mwad kay sath darygh aybl aur ryj aybl mwdal wndaw ko dkhata haay۔
Answer: rd aml ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ki tknyk ryndarngh ki rftar ko bhatr bnanay aur ry aykt ayply kyshnza kay bndal saiza ko kam karnay par mrkwza haay۔rd aml ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly tarykay yeh hayn: mymwzaaizayshn aur mymwaizayshn laibryry: mymwaizayshn mhanghay fnkshn kalwn kay ntaij ko kych karnay aur un ko dwbarha astamal karnay ka aml hay jab un pt ayk jesay hi rahain ghay۔rd aml main ، aap faal ajzaaa ko yaddasht karnay aur ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon ko rwknay kay liye React.memo aaly aardar jzaw (HOC) ka astamal krsktay hayn۔mzayd braan ، rysylykt aur yw ays aym ay aym aw jesi laibryrywn ko slyktrza ya kmpywtda wylywza kay ntaij ko yaddasht karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔as kay bjaiay ، aap sirf mriy anasar ko pysh karnay kay liye wndawngh ya safhaha bndy jesi wrchwilaizayshn tknyk ka astamal krsktay hain ، js sy ryndarngh kay bwjh ko kam kya jaskta haay۔laibryryan jesay ry aykt wndaw aur ry aykt wrchwilaizada karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l efficient mwsar wrchwilaizayshn kay ajzaaa mhaya krty hayn۔ fysalha kn aur thrwtlngh: aywnt kay hayndalr ya mhanghay aapryshn jo saarf ki bat chyt kay zaryaha mthark hain ، jesay skrwlngh ya saiza tbdyl karna ، bar bar dwbarha aanay waly ryndarza ka sbb bn sakta haay۔daybwnysngh aur thrwtlngh tknyk is shrha ko mhadwd karnay main mdd krty hay js par un karrwaiywn ko anjam diya jata hay ، js sy ghair zurwry ryndarza ki tadad kam hawty haay۔lwdash jesi laibryryan daybwnysngh aur thrwtlngh aywnt hayndalrza kay liye afaal mhaya krty hayn۔aap wyb pyk ki mthark draamd ya rd aml jesay twlza astamal krsktay hayn۔ kwda tksym karnay aur ajzaaa ki sst lwdangh ko nafza karnay kay liye lyzay۔as sy aap ko ajzaaa ko sirf is wkt lwda karnay ki ajazat mlty hay jab un ki zurwrt ho ، bndal kay saiza ko bhatr bnana aur abtdaiy bwjh kay wkt ko kam krna۔ try lrzana aur chhwty chhwty chyza: drkht lrzana ayk aysa aml hay jo ghair astamal shuda kwda ko bndal sy khtm krta hay ، js sy is kay saiza ko kam kya jata haay۔yha ES6 madaywl nhaw aur wyb pyk ya rwl ap jesay twlza ka faidha atha kar haasal kya jaskta haay۔mzayd braan ، mnyfykyshn ki tknyk jesay jawa askrpt ، sy ays ays ، aur aych ty aym ayl ko mnyfngh karna ghair zurwry harfwn ko khtm krkay aur prwdakshn kay liye kwda ko bhatr bna kar bndal kay saiza ko mazeed kam krskty haay۔ prwdakshn ki tamyr ko bhatr bnana: jab pydawar kay liye drkhwast ki tamyr karty ho tou ، kwda mnyfykyshn ، kmpryshn ، kmpryshn ، aur jesay asalahaat ko kabl bnaiay jatay hayn۔kychngh haydar karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bnasktay hayn۔wyb pyk aur babl jesay twlza prwdakshn blda aaؤt pt ko bhatr bnanay kay l configuration trtyb kay akhtyarat aur plgh un fraham karty hayn۔ karkrdghy ki prwfailngh aur nghrany: nghrany aur prwfailngh twlza aap kay rd aml ki drkhwast main karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ki nshandhay karnay main mdd krsktay hayn۔ry aykt dawylpr twlza ، braؤzar daywtwlza ، aur prfarmns manytrngh laibryry jesay ry aykt prwfailr ya lait haaؤs un alakwn ki nshandhay karnay main maawn saabt hawsktay hain jn main asalaha ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jesay sst ryndarngh ajzaaa ya zurwrt sy zayada dwbarha ryndar۔ un asalaha ki tknykwn ko nafza karnay sy ، aap apnay ry aykt ki karkrdghy ko braha saktay hayn۔drkhwast ، ryndarngh kay awkat ko kam karna aur saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bnana۔yha zurwry hay keh aap apni mkhsawsa drkhwast ki karkrdghy ki khsawsayat ka tjzayha karain aur is kay mtaabk asalahaat ka atalak kryn۔

Question: "ayk rd aml ka jzaw lkhyn jo ayk zamha dar wydayw plyir ko khyl ، twkf ، aur hajm kntrwl kay sath dkhata haay۔"
Answer: jab byrwny anhasaar ya APIs par anhasaar karty hain tou rd aml kay ajzaaa ki janch karty wkt ، yeh zurwry hay keh jza ko tyst kay that alag thlgh karain aur kabl aatmad aur mstkl tyst kay ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye byrwny anhasaar ka mzaak araaiyn۔as tarah kay mnzarnamwn main tystngh sy nmtnay kay liye kuch nktaha nzar yeh hayn: laibryrywn ya afaal ka mzaak araana: jyst ki blt un mzaak ki salahaytwn ya tesri party ki laibryrywn jesi mzaak karnay wali laibryrywn ka astamal kryn۔mzaak araanay sy aap ko API kalwn kay liye kstm rdaml ya tarza aml ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat mlty hay ، janch kay doran pysh kyasy ntaij ko ykyny bnatay hawiay۔as tarah ، aap asal byrwny anhasaar par anhasaar kyay baghair mkhtlf mnzarnamwn ، jesay kamyaby ، nakamy ، ya mkhsawsa knaray kay maamlat ki nkaly krsktay hayn۔ anhasaar anjykshn: anhasaar anjykshn ka astamal janch kay doran jzaw par byrwny anhasaar ya APIs kay mzaak wrzen fraham karnay kay liay۔an anhasaar kay frzuy aml ko anjykshn lghatay hoey ، aap un kay tarza aml aur rdaml ko kntrwl krsktay hayn۔yha nktaha nzar aap ko jzaw ko alag thlgh karnay aur is ki faalyt ko mkhtlf mnzarnamwn main asal API kalza bnanay ya hakyky byrwny anhasaar par anhasaar karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha ayk rypr jzaw tshkyl dy kar kya jaskta hay jo asal jzaw ko ghhyray main la kar zurwry haay۔mtbadl kay tawr par ، aap byrwny anhasaar kay sath taaml karnay waly mkhsawsa tarykwn ya afaal ko tbdyl karnay kay liye tyst sy mtalk mkhsawsa astbs ya mzaak astamal krsktay hayn۔ antyghryshn tystngh: ywnt tyst kay alawha anzumam tyst karnay par bhi ghwr kryn۔anzumam tyst main asal byrwny anhasaar ya APIs kay sath mil kar jzaw ki janch karna shaml haay۔as maamlay main ، aap hakyky API kal karain ga ya asal byrwny anhasaar kay sath bat chyt karain ghay۔taham ، yeh ykyny bnana zurwry hay keh yeh tyst mnasb tarykay sy alag thlgh hain ، syt ap aur aansw ko kntrwl karty hain ، aur mjmway tawr par tyst swyt ki karkrdghy ya wshwsnyyta ko mtasar nahin karty hayn۔ snyp shat tystngh: asnyp shat tystngh kesi jzaw ki mtwka pydawar ko haasal karnay kay liye karaamd saabt hawskty hay jo anhasaar krta haay۔byrwny anhasaar ya APIs۔ajzaaa kay mhaya krdha aaؤt pt kay snyp shats ka mwazanha krkay ، aap byrwny awaml kay zaryaha mtaarf krwaiy janay wali kesi bhi ghair aradta tbdylywn ya rjatwn ka ptha lghasktay hayn۔taham ، asnyp shats ko ap dayt karna ykyny bnaiyn jab mtwka aaؤt pt jan bwjh kar tbdyl hawta haay۔ aakhr tak tystngh: byrwny anhasaar ya API par bohat zayada anhasaar karnay waly ajzaaa ki jama janch kay liye ، saiprs jesay akhttamy akhttam (E2E) tystngh frym wrk ko shaml karnay par ghwr kryn۔ya sylynym۔E2E tyst saarf kay taaml ki nkaly karty hain aur byrwny nzaamwn kay sath taaml smyt poray atalak kay bhaaؤ ki twsayk karty hayn۔yha tyst byrwny anhasaar kay sath jzaw kay tarza aml aur anzumam par aaly staha par aatmad fraham karty hayn۔ yeh yad rakhien keh byrwny anhasaar kay sath ajzaaa ki janch kay liye byrwny awaml ko alag thlgh aur kntrwl kay sath kabl aatmad aur jama janch ki zurwrt ko mtwazan karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔mnasb janch kay nktaha nzar ka antkhab jzaw ki pychydghy ، byrwny anhasaar ki nwayt ، aur jzaw ki faalyt main aatmad ki mtalwbha staha par mnhasar haay۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo anwan aur mwad kay alakay kay sath twt phwt kay pynl ko pysh krta haay۔
Answer:
rd aml main ، ghltay sy nmtnay sy mrad ajzaaa ki pysh ksh ya laif saiykl tarykwn kay doran hony wali ghltaywn sy khwbsawrty sy nmtnay aur bazayaft kay aml sy mrad haay۔phalay sy taay shuda tawr par ، jab kesi rd aml kay jzaw main ghltay hawty hay tou ، yeh jzaw kay ghair mnktaa hony ki taraf jata hay aur mmknha tawr par poray jzaw kay drkht ko mtasar krta haay۔ghltay ki hadwd rd aml kay ajzaaa hain jo apnay jzaw kay drkht main kahain bhi ghltaywn ko pkraty hain ، js sy aap pehlay sy taay shuda ghltay kay pyghamat ki bjaiay fal byk byk UIs ko snbhalnay aur zaahar karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔wha hafazaty jal ki haysayt sy kam karty hain ، ghltaywn kay phylaؤ ko rwktay hain aur ayply kyshn ko ryndarngh aur kam ko jary rkhnay kay kabl bnatay hayn۔ ghltay ki hadwd ko jzaw bnanay kay l you ، aap ayk aysay jzaw ki wzuahat karty hain jo rd aml daat kam ki klas main twsya krta hay aur ajzaaa daydakch laif saiykl kay tarykha kar ko nafza krta haay۔yha tarykha is wkt kaha jata hay jab ghltay ki had kay nechay jzaw kay drkht kay andr ghltay hawty haay۔ajzaaa dayda kych kay tarykha kar kay andr ، aap ghltay ko lagh un krkay ya jzaw ki haalt ko ap dayt krkay kesi ghltay ka pygham zaahar krsktay hayn۔ ayk ghltay ki hadwd ki ayk msaal haay: JSXCOPY CODECLASS ghltay baؤndary twsya krta haay۔؛this.state = {haysrr: ghlta} ؛} ajzaaa dayda kych (ghltay ، ghltay anfw) {// ghltay ko snbhalyn ، jesay ، isy lagh un karain ya fal byk byk UI knswl۔ ayrr (ghltay) dasplay kryn۔this.setState ({haserror: true}) ؛} ryndar () {aghr (this.state.haserror) {// jab ghltay hawty hay tou fal byk UI dasplay karain

kuch ghalat ho ghya۔

؛} // bchwn ko aam tawr par yeh waps kryn۔} the ghltay ki had kay jzaw ko astamal karnay kay l you ، aap isy ajzaaa ya jzaw kay drkht kay ghrd lpyt dytay hain js kay liye aap ghltaywn ko snbhalna chahti hayn۔yha waldyn kay ajzaaa kay ryndar kay tarykha kar main kya jaskta haay: JSXCOPY kwda < /errorboundary> ghltay ki hadwd kay jzaw ko hakmt amly sy rakh kar ، aap is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh is kay sab try kay andr pysh aanay wali ghltayan pkray jati hain aur mnasb tarykay sy snbhalty hayn۔ghyr mnkwlha astsanaa ki wjha sy krysh hony say۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh ghltay ki hadwd sirf ghltaywn ko pkraty hain jo ryndarngh ya laif saiykl tarykwn kay doran hawty hayn۔wha aywnt kay hayndalrza ، ghair mtzalzal kwda (jysay ، syt taim aaؤt) ، ya srwr saiyda ryndarngh kay doran ghltayan nahin pkratay hayn۔mzayd braan ، ghltay ki hadwd apnay andr ghltayan ya bchwn ki ghltay ki hadwd main ghltaywn ko nahin pkra sakti hayn۔lhazaa ، yeh tjwyza kya jata hay keh ajzaaa kay drkht kay mkhtlf hasawn kay ghrd mtadd ghltay ki hadwd ko lpytnay ki sfarsh ki jati hay takha ghltaywn ko zayada danay dar tarykay sy hayndal kya jaskay۔ aar aay sy ty ki ghltay ki hadwd kesi jzaw kay drkht main ghltaywn ko snbhalnay aur bazayaft karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krty hain ، js sy ry aykt ayply kyshnza kay asthakam aur saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bnaya jata haay۔wha aap ko fyl byk byk UIs zaahar karnay ki ajazat dytay hain aur pori drkhwast kay haadsaay ki bjaiay ghltayan snbhalnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔

Question: ayk rd aml kay jzaw ko nafza karain jo mnswkhy ki hamayt kay sath fail ap lwda kay liye mthark pyshrft kay asharay ko zaahar krta haay۔
Answer:
rd aml ka syak wa sbak API rd aml ki ayk khsawsayt hay jo aap ko hr staha par wazuha tawr par prps pas kyay baghair jzaw kay drkht kay zaryaay ryast ko shyir karnay aur dayta ko mntkl karnay ki shawlt dyta haay۔yha aalmy ya mshtrkha ryast ko zayada mwsar aur jama andaza main snbhalnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔ rd aml ka syak wa sbak API do aham ajzaaa par mushtamil haay: fraham knndha aur saarf۔fraham knndha jzaw ko aadad wa shmar ki wzuahat kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo mshtrkha hoga aur jzaw kay drkht ko nechay sy ghzar jaye gha۔yha ayk wylyw prwp ko kbwl krta hay jo mshtrkha dayta rkhta haay۔saarfyn kay jzaw ko kesi jzaw kay andr mshtrkha aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy aur astamal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ yahan rd aml syak wa sbak ko astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: jsxcopy kwda // ayk syak wa sbak ko myContext = react.createContext () ؛ // un ajzaaa ko lpyt dyn jn tak rsaiy ki zurwrt haayfraham knndha ayp () kay sath syak wa sbak {CHEREDDATA = 'syak wa sbak sy haylw!' ؛wapsy ( ) ؛} // saarf ki tshkyl chailda kampynt () {wapsy ( {value = ka astamal karty hoey kesi jzaw kay andr syak wa sbak ka astamal kryn>

{kdr}

} ) ؛} is msaal main ، mshtrkha dayta mtghyr fraham knndha kay jzaw ka astamal karty hoey jzaw kay drkht kay nechay ghzar jata haay۔as kay bad chailda kmpwynt saarfyn kay jzaw ka astamal karty hoey mshtrkha aadad wa shmar ko khata hay aur isy pysh krta haay۔ rd aml syak wa sbak API bnyady tawr par ayk chhwtay sy drmyanay drjay kay atalak main ryast kay antzaam kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha prwp darlngh ki zurwrt kay baghair ajzaaa kay mabyn ryast ko bantnay ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krta haay۔taham ، yeh bat kabl ghwr hay keh rd aml ka syak wa sbak API un mnzarnamwn kay liye bhatryn mwzawn hay jahan kuch ajzaaa ko mshtrkha aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ dusri taraf ، rydaks braay pymanay par rd aml ki ayply kyshnza main aalmy ryast kay antzaam kay liye ayk mshhawr ryasty antzaamyha laibryry haay۔rydaks ayk mrkzay astwr pytrn ki pyrwy krta hay ، jahan drkhwast ki pori haalt kesi ayk astwr main mhafwza hawty haay۔yha ayk pysh ghwiy karnay wala ryast kntynr mhaya krta hay js main aamal aur rydawsrza ka astamal karty hoey rsaiy aur is main trmym ki jaskty haay۔ rydawks rd aml kay syak wa sbak kay mkablay main kiy fwaid pysh krta haay: mrkzay haalt: rydawks ayk mrkzay astwr mhaya krta hay js main drkhwast ki haalt hawty haay۔as sy poray ayply kyshn main ryast main hony wali tbdylywn ka nzam wa nsk aur tryk karna aasan hawjata haay۔ mdal wyir: rydawks mdal wyir kay astamal ki ajazat dyta hay ، jesay rydawks thnk ya rydawks sagha ، jo zayada kntrwl aur mnzam andaza main mtzuad akdamat aur zumny asarat ko snbhalnay kay kabl bnata haay۔taim trywl aynda daywtwls: rydawks taaktwr daywtwlza mhaya krta hay jo aap ko wkt kay sath sath ryasty tbdylywn ka maainha aur tryk karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔aap daybghngh aur dawylpmnt main mdd karnay ، ayply kyshn astyts ko dwbarha pysh karnay kay liye bhi aml ko dwbarha chla saktay hayn۔ mdal wyir mahawlyaty nzaam: rydawks main mdal wyir aur plgh un ka ayk bohat braa mahawlyaty nzaam mwjwd hay jo is ki faalyt ko braha sakta hay ، js sy yeh astamal kay maamlat ki ayk wsya rynj kay mtaabk bn jata haay۔ karkrdghy ki asalaha: rydawks pysh kshynmymwraizayshn aur slyktr laibryrywn jesay mkhtlf asalahaat (jysay ، rysrch) jo ryasty ap dayts ko bhatr bna kar aur ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon ko kam krkay karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaskty hayn۔ jab rd aml syak wa sbak main chhwty ayply kyshnza main ryast kay antzaam kay liye kafy hawskta hay tou ، rydawks pychydha ayply kyshnza kay liye bhatr mwzawn haay۔ayk bray ryast aur ryast kay antzaam kay jdyd trien tkazuay۔ khlasaha main ، rd aml syak wa sbak API ayk jzaw kay drkht kay andr ryast ko bantnay kay liye halka phlka hal hay ، jabky rydaks ayk taaktwr astyt mynjmnt laibryry hay jo braay pymanay par ayply kyshnza main aalmy ryast kay antzaam kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، jo trky yaftha fraham krta hay ، jo trky yaftha haay۔khsawsayat aur asalahaat۔an kay darmiyan antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat aur pychydghy par mnhasar haay۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw lkhyn jo trtyb denay waly kalmwn aur ktaar kay antkhab kay sath ayk zamha dar tybl dkhata haay۔
Answer: jab kesi ry aykt ayply kyshn main srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) ko snbhaltay ho js main twsayk ki zurwrt hawty hay tou ، bohat sary nktaha nzar hain jn par aap ghwr krsktay hayn۔as main shaml akdamat ka ayk amwmy khakha yeh haay: twsayk ki hakmt amly ki nshandhay kryn: twsayk ki hakmt amly ka tayn karain jo aap apnay rd aml ki drkhwast kay liye astamal karna chahti hayn۔yha twkn par mbny twsayk (jysay ، jay dablyw ty) ، syshn par mbny twsayk ، ya tesri party ki twsayk fraham karnay wala (jysay ، awaawt) hawskta haay۔ srwr saiyda ki twsayk ko syt kryn: twsayk ki drkhwastwn aur msilay ko snbhalnay kay liye srwr saiyda ki twsayk ki mntak ko nafza kryn۔twsayk twkn ya syshn kwkyza۔as main aam tawr par saarf ki asnad ki twsayk karna ، twkn ya kwkyza tyar karna ، aur srwr par twsayk ki malwmat ko zakhyrha karna shaml hawta haay۔ tsadyk ki haalt ko klaint ko pas kryn: srwr saiyda ryndarngh kay doran ، tsadyk ki haalt (jysay ، twsayk twkn ، saarf ki malwmat) ko klaint ko pas kryn۔abtdaiy HTML rdaml ka hasaha۔aap jawa askrpt mtghyr main twsayk ki haalt ko srayt krsktay hain ya isy srwr saiyda astyt mynjmnt hal jesay rydawks ya rd aml syak wa sbak main astwr krsktay hayn۔ klaint ki taraf sy haaiydaryt klaint saiyda ayply kyshn: klaint saiyda par ، jab ry aykt ayply kyshn ko haaiydaryt kya jata hay tou ، twsayk ki haalt ko bazayaft kryn۔srwr sy pas hoa aur is ryast kay sath klaint saiyda ki twsayk kay nzaam ko shrwa kryn۔yha akdam ykyny bnata hay keh klaint saiyda ayply kyshn sahayha twsayk ki haalt sy shrwa hawty haay۔ rwayty rastay: aap kay rd aml ki drkhwast main ، un rastwn ki hafazat karain jn ki twsayk ki zurwrt hawty haay۔mhafwza rastwn tak rsaiy ki ajazat denay sy pehlay twsayk ki haalt ko chyk karnay kay liye mntak ko nafza kryn۔aghr kesi saarf ki twsayk nahin ki hogi hay tou ، inhain lagh un safhaay par ry daairykt karain ya kesi mnasb rsaiy sy ankar shuda pygham dkhaiyn۔ twsayk ki karrwaiywn ko pysh kryn: apnay rd aml kay ajzaaa main twsayk kay aamal (jysay lagh un ، lagh aaؤt) ko snbhalnay kay liye mntak ko nafza kryn۔jb twsayk ki karrwaiywn ko mthark kya jata hay tou ، twsayk ki haalt ko ap dayt karain aur mmknha tawr par API kalza ko srwr ko zurwry twsayk ki karrwaiywn ko anjam denay kay l .۔ tsadyk ki tsadyk ki haalt ko snw: is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh tsadyk ki haalt klaint aur srwr kay mabyn hum aahangh haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh mؤkl par twsayk ki haalt main kesi bhi tbdyly (jysay ، lagh an/lagh aaؤt) ko srwr tak phanchaya jana chahaiay ، aur is kay braks۔yha hum aahanghy API kalza kay zaryaha ya wyb sakt knkshn kay zaryaha haasal ki jaskty haay۔ un akdamat par aml karty hoey ، aap srwr saiyda ryndarngh ko kesi ry aykt ayply kyshn main snbhal saktay hain js main twsayk ki zurwrt hawty haay۔twsayk kay hafazaty phalwؤn par ghwr karna aur is bat ko ykyny bnana zurwry hay keh tsadyk kay aml main hasas malwmat ko mhafwza tarykay sy snbhala jaiay۔mzayd braan ، srwr saiyda ryndarngh aur twsayk kay mmknha karkrdghy kay mzumrat par ghwr karain ، kywnkha abtdaiy twsayk aur dayta ki bazayaft abtdaiy safhaha kay bwjh main awwr hayda ko shaml krskty haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo aaitmza ki fharst ki fwry fltrngh kay sath srch fltr pysh krta haay۔
Answer: ry aykt mymw ayk aaly aardar ka jzaw (HOC) hay jo ry aykt kay zaryaha fraham kya jata hay jo aap ko fnkshnl ajzaaa ki pysh ksh ko bhatr bnanay ki shawlt dyta haay۔as sy ajzaaa ko ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon ko rwknay main mdd mlty hay js main jzaw ko yad kar kay aur sirf is wkt ap dayt kya jata hay jab is ko mwsawl hawta haay۔ jab kesi jzaw ko ry aykt mymw sy lpyta jata hay tou ، rd aml kay ntyjay main pysh aanay walon kay mabyn prwps ka atly mwazanha anjam dyta haay۔aghr prwps ayk jesay hi rahain tou ، rd aml jzaw kay pehlay pysh krdha ntaij ko dwbarha astamal kray ga ، js sy poray ryndarngh kay aml ko chhwra diya jaye gha۔as sy karkrdghy ko bohat bhatr bnaya jaskta hay ، khasa tawr par aysay mnzarnamwn main jahan kesi jzaw kay shaaray shaza wa nadr hi tbdyl hawtay hayn۔ mymw ko rd aml astamal karnay kay l you ، aap apnay fnkshnl jzaw ko rd aml kay sath lpyt dytay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: JSXCOPY Codemport 'React' sy rd aml ka azahaar ؛ const mycompointent = react.memo (props => {// jzaw ryndarngh mntak yhaan}) ؛ braamd dayfalt mycompointe ؛ is msaal main ، mycomponent ko rd aml kay sath lpyt diya gaya haay۔asay bhatr bnanay kay l me yad rkhna chahaiay۔jzaw ka yadghar wrzen React.memo kay zaryaha waps kya jaye ga ، aur is kay bad kay pysh knndghan tb hi hon ga jab prwps tbdyl hawchkay hayn۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh ry aykt mymw sirf prps ka atly mwazanha anjam dyta haay۔aghr prwps khud ashyaa ya safyn hain tou ، rd aml mymw un ki akdar ka ghhara mwazanha nahin kray gha۔as tarah kay maamlat main ryndarngh ko bhatr bnanay kay l you ، aap dyghr tknykwn ko astamal krsktay hain jesay adm asthakam ya kstm mwazanha kay afaal۔ REACT mymw khasa tawr par fnkshnl ajzaaa kay liye mfyd hay jo mhangha prata hay ya ksart sy dwbarha pysh kya jata haay۔taham ، is ko ansaaf kay sath astamal karna zurwry hay kywnkha mymwaizayshn nay kuch azuafy awwr hayda ka azuafha kya haay۔jb aap nay tsadyk ki hay keh un kay prps ksart sy tbdyl nahin hawtay hain ya un ki pysh ksh kmpywtyshnl tawr par mhangha nahin hawta hay tou sirf ry aykt mymw kay sath sirf ajzaaa ko lpytyn۔bhatr karkrdghy aur bhatr saarf ka tjrbha۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo hasb zurwrt taim ywntwn aur farmytngh kay sath alty ghnty taimr dkhata haay۔
Answer: jab bat ry aykt ayply kyshnza main kwda aarghnaizayshn aur prwjykt kay dahanchay ki ho tou ، bohat sary bhatryn aml hain jo saaf aur twsya pzayr kwda bys ko brkrar rkhnay main mdd krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch aam tawr par tjwyza krdha mshkyn hayn: jzaw par mbny fn tamyr: ajzaaa kay ard ghrd apnay kwda bys ko mnzam kryn۔ghrwp sy mtalk failyn (jysay ، jzaw failyn ، astail ، tyst) ayk sath ayk daairyktry kay andr۔yha madaywlr nktaha nzar kwda ko smjhnay aur brkrar rkhnay main aasany pyda krta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap rastwn ، khsawsayat ya madaywlza ki bnyad par failwn ko mnzam krsktay hayn۔ghhary ghhwnsla sy bchnay aur failwn ko tlash karna aur un ka nzam karna aasan bnanay kay liye flyt dahanchay ka mksad۔mntak ، pryzantyshn ، aur astail ko alag rkhyn۔jzawy failwn ko pryzantyshnl ajzaaa (UI ki pysh ksh kay liye zamha dar) aur kntynr ajzaaa (aadad wa shmar ki bazayaft aur ryasty antzaam kay liye zamha dar) main alag kryn۔zurwrt sy zayada pychydha ajzaaa bnanay sy ghryza karain jo bohat sary kamwn ko snbhaltay hayn۔pychydha ajzaaa ko chhwtay ، dwbarha astamal kay kabl ajzaaa main twra dyn۔ rywsyblty: dwbarha kabl astamal ajzaaa aur afadyt kay afaal pyda krkay kwda kay dwbarha astamal ko frwgh dyn۔jzaw kay tarza aml ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye mrkb aur shaaray kay astamal ki hawsalha afzaaiy kryn۔mshtrkha ajzaaa ya aaly aardar waly ajzaaa (HOCs) main mshtrkha faalyt ko nkalyn۔ fwldar aur fail nam: fwldarza aur failwn kay liye many khyza aur wzuahaty nam astamal kryn۔namngh kay mstkl knwnshn ka antkhab karain ، jesay awnt kys ya kbab kys ، aur is ko poray prwjykt main mstkl tawr par lghaiyn۔rwt sy mtalk failwn aur ajzaaa ko kesi srshar fwldar ya daairktry main trtyb dyn۔ astyt mynjmnt: braay pymanay par ayply kyshnza kay liye ، aalmy ayply kyshn astyt ko snbhalnay kay liye rydawks ya mwbks jesi astyt mynjmnt laibryry ka astamal karnay par ghwr kryn۔ryasty antzaamyha aur ajzaaa sy ryast sy mtalk alag alag mntak kay liye tjwyza krdha nmwnwn par aml kryn۔ tystngh: un kwda kay sath sath tyst failwn ko bhi rakhien js ki woh janch krrhaay hain ، js main un kay mksad ki akasy hawty hay (jysay ، ajzaaa nam.tyst daat jay ays) ki akasy hawty haay۔tystngh kay ajzaaa ya khsawsayat ki bnyad par tystwn ko alag kryn۔apnay trjyhay kwda astail sy mlnay aur bhatryn tarykwn par aml pyra hony kay liye un ki tshkyl kryn۔ dstawyzaat: apnay kwda bys kay andr wazuha aur jama dstawyzaat shaml kryn۔pychydha mntak ki wzuahat karnay ، syak wa sbak fraham karnay ، ya aham thafzaat ki dstawyza karnay kay liye tbsaray ka astamal kryn۔mzayd braan ، zandha dstawyzaat bnanay kay liye dstawyzaat jnryshn kay aalay jesay jay ays day aw sy ya astwry bwk kay astamal par ghwr kryn۔ yeh bhatryn tarykwn sy rhanma khtawta kay tawr par kam karty hain ، aur aap inhain apnay mnsawbay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat aur zurwryat ko pora karnay kay l ap un ko apna saktay hayn۔mstkl mzaajy aur prahnay ki ahalyt klydy haysayt rkhty hay ، lhazaa is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh aap ki tym mntkhb krdha dahanchay par mtfk hay aur poray mnsawbay main mstkl tawr par is ki pyrwy krty haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw lkhyn jo hasb zurwrt mwad aur pwzayshn kay sath ayk zamha dar twl tp dkhata haay۔
Answer: ry aykt ayply kyshnza main safhaha bndy ko snbhalnay main mwjwdha safhaay ki haalt aur hr safhaay ko zaahar karnay kay liye aaitmza ki tadad ka antzaam karna shaml haay۔yhaan safhaha bndy ki kuch aam tknykyn hayn: klaint saiyda pyghynyshn: klaint saiyda pyghynyshn main ، srwr sy tamam dayta laya jata hay ، aur safhaha bndy ko klaint ki taraf sy snbhala jata haay۔pwra dayta syt klaint par dstyab hay ، aur is ka sirf ayk hasaha ayk wkt main zaahar hawta haay۔safhaha bndy kay kntrwl ، jesay pchhlay aur aghlay btnwn ya safhaha nmbrwn ، saarfyn ko dayta kay zaryaay tshryf la janay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ klaint saiyda pyghynyshn ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap aam tawr par mwjwdha safhaha nmbr aur jzaw ki haalt main hr safhaay ki tadad ko astwr karain ghay۔jb aadad wa shmar ko pysh karty ho tou ، aap mwjwdha safhaay aur hr safhaay par aaitmza ki tadad ki bnyad par dayta srny ko slais karain ghay۔braay aadad wa shmar kay sytwn kay l .۔syrwr saiyda pyghynyshn: srwr saiyda pyjynyshn main ، mtalwbha safhaay aur hr safhaay par aaitmza ki tadad ki bnyad par chhwtay hasawn main srwr sy dayta laya jata haay۔srwr safhaha bndy ki mntak ko snbhalta hay aur hr safhaay kay liye sirf zurwry dayta lwtata haay۔ srwr saiyda pyjynyshn ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap aam tawr par srwr par API kal karty hain js main pyramytrza kay sath mwjwdha safhaay aur hr safhaay ki ashya ki tadad ki nshandhay hawty haay۔srwr un pyramytrza par karrwaiy krta hay aur mtalkha dayta ko lwtata haay۔ PROS: braay dayta syt kay liye mwsar ، abtdaiy dayta bwjh ko kam krta hay ، jo mnzarnamay kay liye mwzawn hay jahan dayta aksar tbdyl hawta haay۔lamhadwd askrwl: lamhadwd askrwl ayk aysy tknyk hay jahan saarf safhaha kay nechay skrwl krta haay۔rwayty safhaha bndy kay bjaiay ، jab saarf mwjwdha fharst kay akhttam par phanch jata hay tou nya dayta laya aur mwjwdha dayta main shaml kya jata haay۔ lamhadwd askrwl ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap aam tawr par askrwl aywnts kay liye snyn ga aur jab saarf phanchnay par azuafy dayta lanay kay liye API kal karain ghay۔ayk pehlay sy taay shuda ktab ki dhalyza۔niay bazayaft shuda dayta ko mwjwdha dayta syt main shaml kya gaya hay ، js sy mslsl skrwlngh aur lwdangh ki ajazat mlty haay۔karkrdghy agar mnasb tarykay sy bhatr nah haw۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap abtdaiy tawr par srwr sy ayk chhwta sa dayta syt krsktay hain aur is dayta syt kay andr bad main nywyghyshn kay liye klaint saiyda pyghynyshn anjam dy saktay hayn۔jb zurwrt ho tou ، aap braay dayta sytwn kay l additional ya mkhsawsa dayta ki tlash karty wkt azuafy API kal krsktay hayn۔ PROS: lchk fraham krta hay ، dayta kay saiza aur astamal kay nmwnwn par mbny bhatr karkrdghy ki ajazat dyta haay۔mntak ، azuafy API akhttamy nkat ya pyramytrza ki zurwrt praskty haay۔ safhaha bndy ki tknyk ka antkhab aadad wa shmar kay syt kay saiza ، ap dayt ki frykwinsy ، karkrdghy kay thafzaat ، aur saarf kay tjrbay ki zurwryat jesay awaml par mnhasar haay۔aap kay mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlay kay l pagition mnasb safhaha bndy kay nktaha nzar ka tayn karnay kay liye dayta lwdangh ، abtdaiy safhaha bwjh kay wkt ، aur saarf ki bat chyt kay mabyn tjarty talkat par ghwr kryn۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo tygh klaؤda ko hasb zurwrt tygh saiza aur shylywn kay sath pysh krta haay۔
Answer: mthark draamdat ka astamal karty hoey sst lwdangh aur kwda tksym karna ayk aysy tknyk hain jo kesi rd aml ki ayply kyshn main ajzaaa ki lwdangh aur ryndarngh ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jati hayn۔yha tknyk abtdaiy bndal kay saiza ko kam karnay aur kwda ko chhwtay hasawn main tksym krkay aur sirf jab zurwrt pranay par inhain lwda krkay karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krty haay۔ kwda tksym krna: kwda tksym karna aap kay ayply kyshn kay kwda bys ko chhwtay ، zayada kabl antzaam hasawn main twrana shaml haay۔pwray ayply kyshn kwda ko kesi ayk fail main bndal karnay kay bjaiay ، kwda tksym karnay sy aap ko ayk sy zayada chhwtay bndal bnanay ki ajazat mlty haay۔har bndal main aap kay ayplykyshn kwda ka ayk sab syt hawta hay ، aam tawr par rastwn ya mntaky dawyzenwn par mbny hawta haay۔ kwda ko tksym karty hoey ، aap apni drkhwast kay sirf zurwry hasawn ko lwda krsktay hain jab un ki zurwrt hawty hay ، abtdaiy bwjh ka wkt kam karna aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana۔kwda tksym karna khasa tawr par pychydha khsawsayat wali bray ayply kyshnza kay l useful mfyd hay ya jab ayply kyshn kay kuch hasaay hawtay hain jo kam ksart sy astamal hawtay hayn۔ REACT sst lwdangh: rd aml sst lwdangh ayk khsawsayt hay js main rd aml 16.6 main mtaarf kraya jata hay jo aap ko lazmi tawr par ajzaaa ko lwda karnay ki shawlt dyta haay۔sst lwdangh kay sath ، ajzaaa aan daymanda par bhry hawtay hain ، aam tawr par jab un ki pysh ksh ki jati haay۔yha nktaha nzar ajzaaa ki lwdangh ko mwkhr krkay abtdaiy bndal kay saiza ko kam karnay main mdd krta hay js ki fwry zurwrt nahin haay۔ sst jzaw kay l you ، aap ry aykt.lyzay () fnkshn ka astamal karty hain ، jo is ki dlyl kay tawr par mthark draamd ka byan lyta haay۔mthark draamd ka byan jzaw fail kay mkam ki wzuahat krta haay۔React.lazy () fnkshn ayk nya jzaw lwtata hay jo isy mhay .a kya jata hay jab isy sst rwy sy bhry hawjaiay ghy۔ yahan rd aml sst lwdangh kay astamal ki ayk msaal haay: JSXCOPY Codemport rd aml ، {sst ، sspns} 'ry aykt' sy ؛ kanst mmpwnt = sst ((())=> draamd ('./ mycompident')) ؛ kanst ayp = () => ( lwdangh ... }> ) ؛ is main ؛ is main ؛msaal kay tawr par ، jab is ko mataly kay jzaw main pysh kya jata hay tou maikmpmnt sst tawr par bhry hui hawty haay۔sspns jzaw fal byk UI (as maamlay main ، ayk lwdangh mysj) fraham krta hay jabky jzaw ko lwda kya jarhaa haay۔ nwt karain keh sst lwdangh fy alhaal sirf pehlay sy taay shuda braamdat kay liye kam krty hay ، lhazaa aap ko yeh ykyny bnana hoga keh aap js jzaw ko sst lwdangh main braamd kya gaya haay۔phalay sy taay shuda aykspwrt daat kam bainngh kwda tksym aur sst lwdangh aap ko apni ry aykt ayply kyshn main ajzaaa ki lwdangh aur ryndarngh ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔jb zurwrt ho tou ajzaaa ko mthark tawr par draamd krkay ، aap abtdaiy bndal kay saiza ko nmayan tawr par kam krsktay hain aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔yha nktaha nzar khasa tawr par pychydha khsawsayat kay sath bray bray ayply kyshnza kay liye faidha mnd hay ya jab aahastha aahastha nyt wrk rabtawn ko nshanha bnatay hayn۔

Question: ayk rd aml kay jzaw ko nafza karain jo aaitmza ki ayk bray fharst kay zaryaay tshryf la janay kay liye safhaha bndy ka kntrwl dkhata haay۔
Answer: ry aykt skht mwda ayk dawylpmnt mwda twl hay jo rd aml kay zaryaha fraham kya jata hay jo aap kay atalak kay kwda main mmknha msail aur aam ghltaywn ki nshandhay karnay main mdd krta haay۔as ka mksad pydawary mahawl main astamal kay liye nahin hay ، blkha trky kay doran aap kay kwda kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay kay ayk aalay kay tawr par haay۔ jab aap apni drkhwast ya is kay kesi khasa hasaay ko skht mwda main lpyttay hain tou ، rd aml azuafy chyk aur antbahaat anjam dyta hay jo mmknha amwr ko ajaghr krta haay۔yhaan rd aml skht wzua kay astamal kay kuch fwaid hayn: ghair mhafwza tarykwn ki nshandhay krna: skht mwda aap ko ghair mhafwza tarykwn ki shnakht aur mtnbha karnay main mdd krta hay jo aap ki drkhwast main pryshany ka sbb bn saktay hayn۔yha haadsaaty zumny asarat aur dyghr aam ghltaywn kay mmknha zaraia ka ptha lghata hay aur is ko lagh un krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par ، yeh khbrdar hoga keh agar aap kay pas un kay ryndar tarykwn main zumny asarat kay sath ajzaaa mwjwd hain ، jo ghair mtwka slwk ka baasa bn saktay hayn۔yha frswdha ya jld hi khtm hony wali khsawsayat ki bhi janch pratal krta hay aur un ko astamal karnay kay liye antbaha fraham krta haay۔ lyghysy APIs ka ptha lghana: skht mwda aap ko myrasay API sy ptha lghanay aur hajrt karnay main mdd krta haay۔yha frswdha laif saiykl tarykwn kay liye antbaha fraham krta hay ، jesay ajzaaa wِl rysywyprwps ، ajzaaa wylmaؤnt ، aur dyghr ، aap ko haks kay sath tazaha trien laif saiykl tarykwn ya fnkshnl ajzaaa ko astamal karnay ki trghyb dyta haay۔ mmknha nazak kwda ki nshandhay krna: skht mwda aap ko kwda lkhnay ki trghyb dyta hay jo mstkbl main rd aml ki tazaha karywn par razuy haay۔as main mstkbl kay kyraay kay mmknha zaraia kay baray main mtnbha kya gaya hay ، jesay ghair mhafwza laif saiykl tarykwn ka astamal ، ryast ka braha rast atprywrtn ، ya dawm ko braha rast is tarah tak rsaiy haasal karna jo rd aml kay mstkbl kay wrzen kay sath mtaabkt nahin rkhta haay۔ karkrdghy kay amkany amwr ko haaiy lait krna: skht mwda azuafy chyk ko kabl bnata haay۔as sy aap ko apni drkhwast main karkrdghy ki mmknha pryshanywn ko pkranay main mdd mlty haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، yeh ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon kay baray main mtnbha krta hay js ki wjha sy ghair msthakm kynt kwmpynt ap dayt kay nfaza kay sath ajzaaa ki wjha sy hawta haay۔as sy aap ko mmknha pryshanywn ، frswdha khsawsayat aur ghair mhafwza tarykwn ko jldy sy pkranay main mdd mlty hay ، js sy aap apnay rd aml ki drkhwast kay mayar ، karkrdghy aur brkrar rkhnay ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔taham ، yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh skht wzua chandy ki ghwly nahin hay aur is par anhasaar nahin kya jana chahaiay keh tamam msail ka ptha lghanay kay wahad zaryaha hawn۔aap ki drkhwast kay mjmway mayar ko ykyny bnanay kay liye abhi bhi mkml janch aur kwda jaizaay karna zurwry haay۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw lkhyn jo twsya aur khatmay ki faalyt kay sath try kay twt janay waly drkht ka nzaarha dkhata haay۔
Answer: rd aml main ، aap mkhtlf tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey mtadd ajzaaa kay mabyn ryasty hum aahanghy ko snbhal saktay hayn۔yhaan kuch aam tawr par astamal hony wali tknykyn hayn: lft astyt ap (waldyn aur bchwn ki bat chyt): agar aap kay pas waldyn ka koi jzaw hay jo bchwn kay mtadd ajzaaa pysh krta hay tou ، aap mshtrkha ryast ko kryb trien aam aabaؤ ajdad tak atha saktay hayn۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh mshtrkha ryast ka antzaam waldyn kay jzaw kay zaryaha kya jata hay ، aur yeh bchwn kay ajzaaa ko prwps kay tawr par mntkl krdyta haay۔jb kesi bchay kay jzaw ko mshtrkha ryast ko ap dayt karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay tou ، is ko waldyn kay jzaw ki taraf sy ayk prwp kay tawr par mnzawr krdha fnkshn kehty hayn۔ yeh nktaha nzar is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh ryast mtadd ajzaaa main hum aahangh rhaty hay kywnkha woh sab waldyn sy ayk hi tazaha trien ryast wsawl karty hayn۔: rd aml ka syak wa sbak aap ko ayk aalmy ryast bnanay ki ajazat dyta hay js ko ajzaaa kay drkht main kesi bhi jzaw kay zaryaha wazuha tawr par prwps pas kyay baghair rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔rd aml kay syak wa sbak kay sath ، aap ayk syak wa sbak fraham karnay waly ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo mshtrkha haalt rkhta hay ، aur fraham knndha kay dairha kar main koi bhi jzaw is ryast tak rsaiy aur ap dayt krskta haay۔ syak wa sbak sy USEContext hak ya saarf kay jzaw ka astamal karty hoey ، ajzaaa mshtrkha haalt ka astamal krsktay hayn۔awr hum aahanghy main rhayn۔jb koi jzaw fraham knndha kay zaryaha ryast ko ap dayt krta hay tou ، tamam mnhasar ajzaaa jo astamal karty hain keh ryast khud bkhwd ap dayt hawjaiay ghy۔ astyt mynjmnt laibryrywn: ryasty antzaamyha ki laibryryan jesay rydawks ، mwbks ، ya bazayaft ry aykt ayply kyshnza kay liye mrkzay ryasty antzaam kay hal fraham karty hayn۔yha laibryryan aap ko aysy aalmy ryast ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyty hain js tak aap ki drkhwast main kesi bhi jzaw kay zaryaha rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔ astyt mynjmnt laibryrywn kay sath ، aap ryast ko ap dayt karnay kay liye karrwaiywn ya kam karnay walon ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، aur ajzaaa kyam kay liye ryast kay mkhsawsa hasawn ko sbskraib krsktay hayn۔ham aahanghyyha laibryryan pychydha ryast kay antzaam kay l middle mdal wyir ، taim trywl daybghngh ، aur blt un twlza jesi azuafy khsawsayat mhaya krty hayn۔ ryasty antzaamyha ki laibryry ka astamal faidha mnd saabt hawskta hay jab aap kay pas pychydha ryasty taaml aur mtadd ajzaaa kay sath ayk bray drkhwast hawty hay js ki zurwrt hawty haay۔dayta۔ thrda party laibryryan: ry aykt main ryasty hum aahanghy kay liye tesri party kay laibryryan aur nmwnay bhi dstyab hain ، jesay aywnt aymytrza ، mshahadha karnay waly ، ya pb sab kay nmwnwn۔yha laibryryan ryast ko snbhalnay aur ajzaaa kay mabyn hum aahangh karnay kay mtbadl tarykay mhaya krty hayn۔ yeh laibryryan aksar apnay mnfrd APIs aur ryasty antzaamyha kay liye nktaha nzar pysh krty hain ، lhazaa yeh zurwry hay keh aap kay mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlay kay l their un ki mnasbyt ka andazaha karain aur un ki mtaabkt ko ry aykt kay ryndarngh aur laif saiykl mykanzam kay sath ghwr kryn۔. ryasty hum aahanghy kay nktaha nzar ka antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki pychydghy ، mshtrkha ryast ka saiza ، aur ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta kay bhaaؤ ki nwayt jesay awaml par mnhasar haay۔jb fysalha karna hay keh kon sa nktaha nzar astamal karnay ka fysalha karty hain tou ، tjart kay baray main ghwr karna zurwry haay۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo hasb zurwrt hadwd kay sath tykstyrya un pt kay liye ayk kryktr kaؤntr pysh krta haay۔
Answer: srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) kay sath rd aml sspns rd aml ki mataly ki twsya hay jo aap ko srwr ki taraf mtnazaaha dayta bazayaft aur pysh karnay ko snbhalnay ki shawlt dyta haay۔yha saarf ko jld sy jld mhaya krdha mwad ko dkha kar saarf kay tjrbay ko kabl bnata hay ، yahan tak keh agar kuch dayta abhi bhi haasal kya jarhaa haay۔mؤkl ko mkml HTML jwab bhyjnay sy phalay۔as kay ntyjay main tawyl arsaay sy lwdangh kay awkat aur saarf ko abtdaiy mwad ko zaahar karnay main takhyr hawskty haay۔ mataly aur ays ays aar kay rd aml kay sath ، aap srwr par mwjwd mwad ko pysh karna shrwa krsktay hain aur dayta dstyab hawtay hi mؤkl ko aahastha aahastha is ko aaghay braha saktay hayn۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh srwr abtdaiy mwad kay sath HTML rspans ko mؤkl ko bhyjna shrwa krskta hay ، chahaay kuch ajzaaa ya dayta abhi tak mkml tawr par bhry nah hawn۔chwnkha ghmshdha aadad wa shmar ko hal kya gaya hay ، klaint ki taraf sy rd aml ka azahaar is bat ko ykyny bnaiay ga keh ghmshdha hasawn ko waps aur pysh kya jaye ga ، js main klaint par mwad ko ap dayt kya jaye js main mkml safhaha dwbarha lwda ki zurwrt hawghy۔srwr par mwad pysh karna aur klaint ko is ko astrym karty hoey ، aap saarf ko jldy sy kuch abtdaiy mwad dkha kar saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham krsktay hayn۔as sy yeh tasar mlta hay keh safhaha tyzay sy lwda ho raha hay ، yahan tak keh agar kuch hasaay abhi bhi haasal kyay jarhaay hayn۔ saarf kay tjrbay kay sath: rd aml ki mataly kay sath ، aap klaint ki taraf sy ghair mtzalzal dayta lanay aur pysh karnay ko bhi snbhal saktay hayn۔as sy aap ko baghair kesi rkawt kay srwr sy fraham krdha mwad sy klaint ki taraf sy mkml tawr par bhry hui mwad main mntkly ki jaskty hay ، js sy kesi bhi tarah ki lwdangh astyts ya mwad ki chmk ko kam kya jaskta haay۔khrydar.aap aadad wa shmar ki bazayaft kay l the wahi aalanyha kwda kay nmwnwn aur ajzaaa ko astamal krsktay hain ، js sy alyhadha mntak ki zurwrt ko kam kya jaskta hay aur kwda ko dwbarha astamal karnay ki zurwrt ko kam kya jaskta haay۔as sy aap kay atalak kay tarza aml kay baray main astdlal karna aasan hawjata hay aur srwr aur klaint par mkhtlf nfaza ki wjha sy kyraay kay amkan ko kam kya jata haay۔ yeh bat kabl zakr hay keh ays ays aar kay sath mataly ka rd aml zaahar hawta hay keh srwr ki taraf sy dayta lanay ko snbhalnay kay liye azuafy syt ap aur trtyb ki zurwrt hawty haay۔aap ko yeh ykyny bnana hoga keh aap ka srwr astrymngh rdaml ki hamayt krta hay aur dayta ryzawlwshn aur mataly ki ryastwn ko snbhalnay kay liye zurwry mntak ko nafza krta haay۔mzayd braan ، laibryrywn ya APIs ko haasal karnay waly tamam aadad wa shmar ko rd aml sspns aur ays ays aar kay sath mtaabkt nahin hawskta hay ، lhazaa is nktaha nzar ko nafza karty wkt mtaabkt aur dstyab twlngh par ghwr karna zurwry haay۔ awwr ، ays ays aar kay sath sspns ka rd aml ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hay jo lwdangh kay tjrbay ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakti haay۔aap ki drkhwast main ، tyzay sy abtdaiy ryndarngh aur mkml tawr par bhry hui haalt main hamwar mntkly fraham krna۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo mrzuy kay mtaabk mthark tsaawyr kay sath darygh aybl aur ryj aybl mwdal daaiylagh ko dkhata haay۔
Answer: ry aykt prfarmns prwfailngh kay mtadd twlza mhaya karty hain jo karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ki nshandhay karnay aur rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ko bhatr bnanay main mdd karty hayn۔ry aykt ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko prwfailngh kay liye kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly twlza yeh hayn: ry aykt prwfailr: ry aykt prwfailr braؤzarza kay liye ry aykt dawylpr twlza ki twsya main dstyab ayk blt un twl haay۔yha aap ko apnay rd aml kay ajzaaa ki pysh ksh kay aml kay baray main karkrdghy ki malwmat par kbzuha aur tjzayha karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ry aykt prwfailr kay sath ، aap un ajzaaa ki nshandhay krsktay hain jo ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon ka sbb bn rahay hain ya ryndar main zayada wkt la rahay hain ، aap ko karkrdghy kay amkany amwr ki nshandhay karnay main mdd mlty haay۔، bshmwl rd aml ki drkhwastyn۔yha aap ko apni drkhwast ki karkrdghy ko rykarda karnay aur is ka tjzayha karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، js main ryndarngh ، askrptngh ، nyt wrkngh ، aur bohat kuch shaml haay۔aap is twl ko jawa askrpt par aml draamd ki rkawtwn ، trtyb aur ryndarngh kay msail ، aur nyt wrk sy mtalk karkrdghy kay msail ki nshandhay karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔ REACT Devetools prwfailr tyb: ry aykt dawylpr twlza ki twsya main prwfailr tyb ayk antrayktw UI fraham krta hay js ki prwfailngh rd aml ki karkrdghy ki karkrdghy haay۔yha aap ko jzaw pysh karnay ، ap dayts aur awkat sy mtalk karkrdghy kay aadad wa shmar ko rykarda aur tjzayha karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔aap anfrady ajzaaa main darl krsktay hain ، kal astyk ka maainha krsktay hain ، aur un ajzaaa ki nshandhay krsktay hain jo karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ka sbb bn rahay hayn۔ aar aay sy ty prfarmns bynch markngh laibryrywn: bynch markngh aur karkrdghy ki janch kay rd aml kay ajzaaa kay liye kiy tesri party ki laibryryan dstyab hayn۔yha laibryryan ، jesay rd aml bynch mark aur ry aykt prf ، aap kay ajzaaa ki pysh ksh ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ki pymaish kay l tools twlza mhaya krty hayn۔wha aap ko tyst chlanay ، mkhtlf nfazaat ka mwazanha karnay ، aur wkt kay sath karkrdghy main bhatry ko tryk karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ kstm karkrdghy ki nghrany aur tjzayat: aap apni ry aykt ayply kyshn main kstm prfarmns manytrngh aur tjzayat kay hal ko bhi nafza krsktay hayn۔ghwghl aynaltks ، nya awshysh ، ya kstm prfarmns manytrngh laibryry jesay twlza aap ko mkhtlf karkrdghy ki pymaish ، jesay bwjh kay awkat ، ryndarngh taimza ، nyt wrk ki drkhwastwn aur bohat kuch ka sragh lghanay aur un ki pymaish karnay main mdd krsktay hayn۔an twlza ko mrbwta karnay sy ، aap apni drkhwast ki karkrdghy kay baray main bsayrt haasal krsktay hain aur asalaha kay l areas alakwn ki nshandhay krsktay hayn۔ jab un prfarmns prwfailngh twlza ka astamal karty hoey ، yeh zurwry hay keh aap ki drkhwast kay karkrdghy kay ahadaf ki wazuha tfhaym haasal ki jaye aur hakykt psndanha haalat main apni ayply kyshn ki wzuahat ki jaskay۔mzayd braan ، karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ko bhatr bnanay par twjha mrkwza karna zurwry hay jn ka saarf kay tjrbay par sab sy zayada asar prata hay aur asalaha kay asarat ki pymaish karna is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh un ka mtalwbha asar haw۔hamwar aur zamha dar saarf kay tjrbay ko ykyny bnanay kay liye apni drkhwast ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaiyn۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jza lkhyn jo zawm aur pyn faalyt kay sath ayk zamha dar amyj ghylry dkhata haay۔
Answer: ry aykt ayply kyshnza main fail ap lwda ko hayndal karna mkhtlf tarykwn aur laibryrywn ka astamal karty hoey haasal kya jaskta haay۔yhaan aam tawr par astamal hony waly kuch tarykay hayn: HTML fail un pt: sab sy bnyady nktaha nzar HTML <an pt taip = "fail"> ansar ko astamal karna haay۔as sy saarfyn ko apnay mkamy sstm sy failyn mntkhb karnay aur fail ap lwda kay aml ko mthark karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔aap apnay rd aml kay jzaw main aan chynj ya awnsmyt jesay jawa askrpt aywnt kay hayndalrza ka astamal karty hoey fail ka antkhab aur ap lwdak ko snbhal saktay hayn۔taham ، is nktaha nzar kay liye azuafy khsawsayat jesay fail ki twsayk ، pyshrft sy bakhbr rhanay ، aur ghltay sy nmtnay kay dsty aml draamd ki zurwrt haay۔ farm dayta API: farm dayta API fail ap lwdaza kay liye mlty part/farm dayta ki drkhwastwn ki tamyr aur bhyjnay ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krta haay۔aap ayk nya farm dayta aabjykt tshkyl dy saktay hain ، mntkhb krdha fail (zabanyn) ko is main shaml krsktay hain ، aur bazayaft ya ayksyws laibryry ka astamal karty hoey srwr ko dayta bhyj saktay hayn۔yha nktaha nzar aap ko ayk sy zayada failwn ko snbhalnay aur failwn kay sath azuafy farm dayta shaml karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ REACT fail ap lwda laibryrywn: bohat sari tesri party ki laibryryan dstyab hain jo ry aykt ayply kyshnza main fail ap lwda ko snbhalnay kay aml ko aasan bnaty hayn۔yha laibryryan fail kay antkhab ، ap lwda ki pyshrft ، twsayk ، aur ghltay sy nmtnay kay liye dwbarha astamal kay kabl ajzaaa aur afadyt fraham krty hayn۔kchh mshhawr laibryrywn main shaml hayn: ry aykt-darwpzawn: ayk lchkdar fail darap zawn jzaw jo darygh aynda darap fail ko aplwdas ki hamayt krta haay۔ ry aay sy ty-darwpzawn-aplwdar: ayk laibryry jo ayk sy zayada failwn ، pyshrft sy bakhbr rhanay ، pysh nzaarha ، ki hamayt kay sath ayk mkml fail ap lwda hal fraham krty hay ،awr mrzuy kay mtaabk UI ajzaaa۔ REACT-FILEPOND: fail hayra phyry ، tsawyry pysh nzaarha ، aur darygh aynda darap faalyt kay liye mdd kay sath astamal main aasan fail ap lwda laibryry۔ yeh laibryrywn ki aaly staha ki pysh ksh ki jati hay aur aksar azuafy khsawsayat kay sath aatay hain aur aksar is tarah kay azuafy khsawsayat kay sath aatay hayn۔klaؤda astwryj srwsza kay sath amyj ka saiza tbdyl karna ، fail ki twsayk ، aur anzumam۔ klaؤda astwryj srwsza: jab bray failwn ya ap lwdaza ki ayk aaly mkdar sy nmtnay kay liye ، klaؤda astwryj srwsza jesay aymyzawn ays 3 ، ghwghl klaؤda astwryj ، ya fair bys astwryj ka faidha athana aam haay۔yha khdmat fail ap lwda ko snbhalnay kay liye kabl aatmad aur twsya pzayr hal pysh krty hayn۔an kay mtalkha ays day kay ya APIs ki mdd sy ، aap apnay rd aml ki ayply kyshn sy failwn ko braha rast klaؤda astwryj par ap lwda krsktay hain ، apnay srwr par fail ap lwda ko snbhalnay ki zurwrt ko khtm karty hayn۔ klaؤda astwryj srwsza kay sath anzumam main aksar srwr par dstkhta shuda yw aar ayl ya twkn tyar karna shaml hawta haay۔astwryj srws par braha rast failwn ko ap lwda karnay kay liye klaint saiyda kwda main aur un ka astamal kryn۔ nktaha nzar ka antkhab aap ki fail ap lwda ki zurwryat ki pychydghy ، tkhsaysa ki mtalwbha staha ، aur fail ki twsayk jesay azuafy khsawsayat ki zurwrt jesay awaml par mnhasar haay۔، trky sy bakhbr rhanay ، aur klaؤda astwryj anzumam۔apnay ry aykt ayply kyshn kay liye mwzawn trien hal tlash karnay kay l your apnay mkhsawsa astamal kys ki bnyad par dstyab akhtyarat aur laibryrywn ka andazaha kryn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo mthark trky kay bar ko mthark tranzayshn kay sath pysh krta haay۔
Answer: ry aykt smwrty wzua ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo ry aykt 18 main mtaarf krwaiy hogi hay js ka mksad saarf kay tjrbay aur rd aml ki ayply kyshnza ki rdaml ko bhatr bnana haay۔yha byk wkt mtadd kamwn par kam karnay kay kabl rdaml ko kabl bnata hay ، js sy bhatr nzaam alawkat aur kam ki trjyha ki ajazat mlty haay۔ rwayty rd aml pysh karnay main ، ryndarngh ka aml hum aahanghy aur msdwd haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh jab koi jzaw ki tazaha kary ya nya jzaw pysh kya jata hay tou ، rd aml ka azahaar jzaw kay drkht ko kar dyta hay aur ayk hi pas main poray drkht ko ap dayt krta haay۔as sy tawyl almyaad awkat ka sbb bn sakta hay aur ghair zamha dar saarf antrfys ka baasa bn sakta hay ، khasa tawr par jab pychydha ya braay ajzaaa sy nmtnay kay۔taim slaisngh ryndarngh kay kam ko chhwtay ywntwn main tksym krta hay jsay "taim slaisza" kehty hain aur un ko trjyhaat tfwyzu krty hayn۔as kay bad rd aml un trjyhaat ki bnyad par rkawt aur dwbarha shrwa karnay ka aaghaza krskta hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh aaly trjyhay kam ، jesay saarf kay un pt ka jwab dena ، zayada tyzay sy karrwaiy ki jati haay۔ rd aml kay smwrnt mwda kay klydy fwaid main shaml hayn: bhatr rdaml: ryndarngh kay kam ko twra kar ryndarngh kay kam ko twra krchhwtay hasaay ، hum aahanghy ka mwda tawyl ryndarngh kay kamwn ko mrkzay dhaghay ko rwknay sy rwkta haay۔as sy saarf kay antrfys ko zamha dar rhanay ki ajazat mlty hay aur yeh ykyny bnata hay keh saarf ki bat chyt aur mthark tsaawyr hamwar hain ، yahan tak keh bhary ryndarngh wrk bwjh kay doran bhy۔as kay ntyjay main saarfyn kay liye zayada trky psnd aur azuafy pysh ksh ka tjrbha hawta hay ، jahan woh ayply kyshn ko zayada tyzay sy jwab dytay aur ap dayt karty hoey dykh saktay hain ، yahan tak keh agar mkml ryndarngh ka aml abhi tak mkml nahin hoa haay۔ prywrytaizada kam: hum aahanghy ka tarykha kar is ki bnyad par ryndarngh kay kam ko trjyha denay kay kabl bnata haay۔ahamytaaly trjyhay kam ، jesay saarf ki bat chyt ko snbhalna ya saarf kay un pt ka jwab dena ، pehlay is par karrwaiy ki jaskty hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnatay hoey keh anthaaiy nazak kam fwry tawr par mkml hawjaiyn aur saarf ka antrfys antrayktw rhata haay۔ bytr ryswrs ka astamal: smwrty mwda kay sath ، rd aml zayada mwsar bna sakta haay۔dstyab wsail ka astamal۔kam kay nzaam alawkat aur trjyha denay sy ، rd aml ghair zurwry ya bay kar ryndarngh aapryshnwn sy bch sakta hay ، sy py yw kay mjmway astamal ko kam krta hay aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnata haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh hum aahanghy kay mwda ko faal karnay sy khud bkhwd kesi ry aykt ayply kyshn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr nahin hawta haay۔as kay liye kam ko twranay aur trjyhaat ki wzuahat karnay kay liye rd aml kay hum aahanghy waly APIs ، jesay mataly aur niay ustransition hak kay swchay smjhay astamal ki zurwrt haay۔mzayd braan ، kesi ry aykt ayply kyshn kay tamam hasawn ko hum aahangh hony ki zurwrt nahin hay ، aur dawylprza mkhsawsa ajzaaa ya is ayply kyshn kay hasawn par smwrty mwda ko mntkhb tawr par laghw krsktay hain jahan yeh sab sy zayada faidha fraham krta haay۔awr zayada mwsar ryndarngh aur kam ki trjyha ko kabl bnatay hoey rd aml ki drkhwastwn ki rdaml۔yha dawylprza ko zayada prfarmns aur zamha dar saarf antrfys bnanay ki ajazat dyta hay ، khasa tawr par bhary ryndarngh ya pychydha ajzaaa waly mnzarnamwn myn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo tkhsaysa bkhsh rngh farmyts aur prysyts kay sath rnghyn chnnay wala dkhata haay۔
Answer:
rd aml ki ghltay ki hadwd rd aml kay ajzaaa hain jo apnay bchwn kay ajzaaa kay pysh ksh ، laif saiykl tarykwn aur aywnt hayndalr kay doran jawa askrpt ki ghltaywn ko pkraty hayn۔wha ghltaywn ko snbhalnay aur fal byk UI ko khwbsawrty sy snbhalnay aur zaahar karnay sy rwknay main mdd karty hain jab un kay sab try kay andr koi ghltay waka hawty haay۔ pehlay sy taay shuda tawr par ، jab kesi rd aml kay jzaw main ghltay hawty hay tou ، yeh jzaw kay drkht ko phylata hay jab tak keh yeh upar ki staha kay jzaw tak nah phanch jaiay۔(aam tawr par jra ka jzaw)۔yha slwk saarf ko ghltay ka pygham krysh hony ya zaahar karnay ka baasa bn sakta haay۔ ayrr ki hadwd ayk khasa jzaw sab try main un ghltaywn ko rwknay aur un ko snbhalnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krty hayn۔wha ayk khasa jzaw kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey tshkyl dyiay gaye hain jsay ajzaaa dayda kych (klas ajzaaa myn) ya ajzaaa dayda kych laif saiykl hak (USEEFECT hak waly fnkshnl ajzaaa myn) kehty hayn۔jb ajzaaa kay bchwn kay andr koi ghltay phynk di jati hay tou yeh tarykha tyar kya jata haay۔ ajzaaa dayda kych ka tarykha do pyramytrza wsawl krta haay: ghltay (pkray hogi ghltay) aur ghltay anfw (ghltay kay baray main azuafy malwmat ، jesay astyk trys par mushtamil ayk shay)۔as tarykha kar kay andr ، aap ghltay ko lagh un krsktay hain ، fal byk UI dasplay krsktay hain ، ya ghltay ko ykyny tawr par snbhalnay kay l other dyghr mnasb akdamat krsktay hayn۔ yahan ghltay ki had kay jzaw ki ayk msaal haay: jsxcopy kwdaklas ghltay baؤndary main twsya hawty haay۔prwps) ؛this.state = {haysrr: ghlta} ؛} ajzaaa dayda kych (ghltay ، ghltay anfw) {// ghltay knswl ko snbhalyn۔ ayrr (ghltay) ؛// ryast ko fal byk UI ko zaahar karnay kay liye mkrr kryn۔} ryndar () {aghr (this.state.haserror) {// ryndar fal byk UI rytrn

kuch ghalat ho ghya۔

؛} // bchwn ko mamwl kay mtaabk pysh kryn۔} earr ghltay ki had kay jzaw ko astamal karnay kay l you ، aap isy jzaw ya ajzaaa kay ghrd lpyttay hain js kay liye aap ghltaywn ko snbhalna chahti hayn: jsxcopy kwda

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw lkhyn jo hawwr asarat aur tranzayshn kay sath ayk zamha dar karda ghrda la aaؤt dkhata haay۔
Answer: REACT ayply kyshnza main kychngh dayta bar bar dayta bazayaft ki zurwrt ko kam krkay karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakta haay۔ry aykt main kychngh kay aadad wa shmar kay liye yahan mtadd tknykyn hayn: klaint saiyda kychngh: dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye klaint saiyda kyshngh: jesay braؤzar ka lwkl astwryj ya syshn astwryj ، jesay klaint saiyda kyshay ka astamal kryn۔jb kesi API sy dayta latay ho tou ، chyk karain keh aya niy drkhwast karnay sy pehlay dayta pehlay sy mwjwd hay ya nhayn۔yha nktaha nzar thwray mkdar main aadad wa shmar kay l suitable mwzawn hay jo mkamy tawr par brkrar reh sakta haay۔ mymwizayshn: mymwraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jahan kesi fnkshn kal ka ntyjha is kay un pt pyramytrza ki bnyad par kysh kya jata haay۔rd aml mhanghay hasab ya dayta ki tbdylywn ko yaddasht karnay kay liye yw ays ay aym aym aw hak fraham krta haay۔akdar ki yaddasht sy ، aap ghair zurwry bhaaly sy bch saktay hain aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، agar aap kay pas koi jzaw hay jo kesi API sy dayta lata hay tou ، aap bazayaft shuda dayta ko jzaw ki ryast main astwr krsktay hain ya dayta ko kysh karnay kay liye rydawks ya mwbks jesi astyt mynjmnt laibryry ka astamal krsktay hayn۔as tarah ، jzaw chyk krskta hay keh aya kesi niy API ki drkhwast ko mthark karnay sy pehlay dayta pehlay hi dstyab hay ya nhayn۔ srwr saiyda kychngh: agar aap ko srwr par kntrwl hay tou ، aap srwr saiyda kychngh ki tknyk ko nafza krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap braؤzar ko kyshay kay rdaml ki hadayt kay liye HTTP kychngh haydar (jysay ، kyshay-kntrwl aur ay ty aay jy) astamal krsktay hayn۔mzayd braan ، aap srwr saiyda kychngh mykanzam ko nafza krsktay hain jesay rydays ya mym kych ko ksart sy zakhyrha karnay aur apnay srwr par bwjh ko kam karnay kay l .۔ dayta ko bazayaft karnay wali laibryrywn: dayta sy bahar kychngh ki hamayt karnay waly aadad wa shmar ko astamal karain ، jesay ayksyws ، ays dablyw aar (basy (basyjb woh dwbarha tkhlyk) ، ya apwlw klaint۔yha laibryryan aksar blt un kychngh mykanzam mhaya krty hain jo mkhsawsa haaltwn par mbny kychngh ، kyshay ko ghalat ، aur khwdkar dayta rychngh ko snbhalty hayn۔ astyt mynjmnt laibryrywn: rydawks aur mwbks jesi astyt mynjmnt laibryryan bhi dayta kychngh main mdd krskty hayn۔an laibryrywn kay zayr antzaam aalmy ryast main dayta astwr krkay ، aap bay kar API kalwn sy bch saktay hain aur mtadd ajzaaa main kychda dayta ko dwbarha astamal krsktay hayn۔ HTTP kychngh: API kay rdaml main mnasb kychngh haydar bhyj kar HTTP kychngh mykanzam ka astamal kryn۔zayadha sy zayada amr ، koi kyshay ، ya koi astwr jesay kyshay par kabw panay waly haydarza ko trtyb dy kar ، aap mؤkl (jysay ، braؤzar) ko kyshay kay jwabat denay aur ghair zurwry drkhwastwn sy prhayza karnay ki hadayt krsktay hayn۔ jab dayta kychngh ko nafza karna zurwry hay tou ، kyshay par ghwr karna zurwry haay۔jb aadad wa shmar main tbdyly aaty hay tou kyshay ko ghalat aur ap dayt krna۔aap ko kyshay ki myaad khtm hony ko bhi snbhalna chahaiay aur is bat ko ykyny bnana chahaiay keh kychda dayta tazaha trien haay۔ yeh yad rakhien keh kychngh syak wa sbak sy mtalk hay ، aur aap js kychngh ki hakmt amly ka antkhab karty hain isy apni mkhsawsa drkhwast ki zurwryat ، dayta ki tazaghy ki zurwryat aur dayta tak rsaiy kay nmwnwn kay sath hum aahangh hona chahaiay۔karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay aur is bat ko ykyny bnana keh aadad wa shmar drst aur tazaha trien rahain is bat ko ykyny bnana zurwry hay keh kychngh dayta kay mabyn twazan brkrar rkhna zurwry haay۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo drjha bndy kay akhtyarat kay sath darap daaؤn slykt fylda pysh krta haay۔
Answer:
ry aykt ryndar prps ayk nmwnha hay jo rd aml main jzaw ki tshkyl kay liye astamal hawta hay jahan ayk jzaw kesi fnkshn ko ayk prwp kay tawr par kbwl krta hay aur zurwry aadad wa shmar aur faalyt kay sath kam krta haay۔yha nmwnha ajzaaa ko pychydha wrasat ya lpytnay waly ajzaaa ki zurwrt kay baghair kwda aur tarza aml ko bantnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ ryndar prps kay pychhay bnyady khyal yeh hay keh ayk jzaw ayk ryndar prwp ko bay nkab krta hay ، jo ayk aysa fnkshn hay jo kuch dlail lyta hay aur jay ays ayks ko lwtata hay jsay pysh kya jana chahaiay۔jzaw ryndar prwp fnkshn ko zurwry aadad wa shmar ya tarza aml fraham krta hay ، js sy astamal karnay waly jzaw ko ryndarngh lajk par kabw panay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ hr ayk msaal pysh karnay ki ayk msaal hay keh ryndar prwps kis tarah kam karty hayn: jsxcopy kwda // parentcompointe.jsimport 'React' ؛ klas pyrntkpynt twsyareact.component {reder () {const dayta = 'haylw ، dnya!' ؛wapsy (

waldyn ka jzaw < /h1> } />

chailda jza

{ryndarprwp (dayta)}

Question: ayk rd aml kay jzaw ko nafza karain jo mrzuy kay mtaabk astail kay sath mlty mrhalha kay aml kay l a pyshrft ka mzaaharha krta haay۔
Answer: ry aykt haks main kwaad aur bhatryn tarykwn ka ayk syt hawta hay js ki pyrwy ki jany chahaiay takha mnasb astamal ko ykyny bnaya jaskay aur aam ghltaywn sy bcha jaskay۔ry aykt haks kay sath kam karnay kay liye yahan kuch asawl aur bhatryn aml hayn: sirf aaly drjay par kal haks: haks ko sirf fnkshnl jzaw ki aaly staha par ya dusray kstm haks kay andr blaya jana chahaiay۔lwps ، haalat ، ya ghhrylw afaal kay andr haks ko kal karnay sy ghryza karain ، kywnkha is sy ghair mtwka slwk ka sbb bn sakta haay۔ ayk hi trtyb main haks kal kryn: jab kesi jzaw kay andr ayk sy zayada haks astamal karty ho tou ، hr ryndar par inhain isi trtyb main kal karna ykyny bnaiyn۔yha ykyny bnata hay keh rd aml haks aur un ki mtalkha ryastwn kay mabyn mnasb ayswsy ayshn ko brkrar rkhta haay۔ fnkshnl ajzaaa main haks ka astamal kryn: haks sirf fnkshnl ajzaaa ya kstm haks main astamal hawsktay hayn۔wha klas ajzaaa main astamal nahin hawsktay hayn۔aghr aap ko kesi tabkay kay jzaw main ryast ya laif saiykl slwk ko astamal karnay ki zurwrt hay tou ، aap ko isy ayk fnkshnl jzaw main tbdyl karna chahaiay aur haks۔ nam kay haks ko sahayha tarykay sy astamal karna chahaiay: kstm haks ko lfza "astamal" kay sath pysh kya jana chahaiay takha is bat ki nshandhay ki jaskay keh woh haks hayn۔yha nam denay wala knwnshn haks ko bakaadha afaal sy mmtaza karnay main mdd krta hay aur yeh wazuha krta hay keh inhain haks kay kwaad par aml karna chahaiay۔ mshrwta haks: haks ko mshrwta tawr par nahin kaha jana chahaiay ، kywnkha haks ka aardar ryndarza kay par mstkl rhana chahaiay۔aghr aap ko mshrwta tawr par kesi hak kay tarza aml ko laghw karnay ki zurwrt hay tou ، kesi prchm ko snbhalnay kay liye ywsstyt hak kay astamal par ghwr karain jo jzaw kay andr mwjwd slwk ko kntrwl krta haay۔ mtadd haks kay sath sypyryt khdshat: agar kesi jzaw ko mtadd khdshat hain tou ، un ko ykja karnay kay bjaiay ayk sy zayada haks astamal karnay ki sfarsh ki jati haay۔ayk hi pychydha hak myn۔chhwtay ، mrkwza haks main faalyt ko twrana prahnay ki ahalyt ko bhatr bnata hay ، dwbarha astamal ki salahayt ko bhatr bnata hay ، aur janch aur daybghngh ko aasan bnata haay۔kstm haks aap ko mtadd ajzaaa main mntak ko ghhyrnay aur dwbarha astamal karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ rd aml kay haks kay sath kam karnay sy bchnay kay liye kamn ghltaywn main shaml hayn: lwp ya shraita kay andr haks ka astamal: haks ko mshrwta ya andr kay andr nahin kaha jana chahaiay ، kywnkha is sy mtzuad slwk aur kyraay pyda hawsktay hayn۔haks ko hamyshha ghair mshrwta tawr par kesi fnkshnl jzaw ki aaly staha par blaya jana chahaiay۔ ywzayfykt anhasaar srny main anhasaar karnay wali anhasaar: jab USEEFECT hak ka astamal karty ho tou ، is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh tamam anhasaar anhasaar saf main drj hayn۔anhasaar chhwranay sy basy ya ghalat aadad wa shmar ka asar hawta hay js ka asar andr astamal hawta hay ، aur is kay ntyjay main thyk thyk kyraay pyda hawsktay hayn۔ ryast ko braha rast tmashna: jab ywstytyt hak ka astamal karty ho tou ، ryast ko braha rast tbdyl karnay sy ghryza kryn۔as kay bjaiay ، ryast ko ap dayt karnay kay liye hak kay zaryaha fraham krdha astyt sytr fnkshn ka astamal kryn۔ryast ko braha rast tbdyl karnay sy ghair mtwka slwk ka baasa bn sakta hay aur mnasb dwbarha pysh karnay sy bcha jaskta haay۔ USEEFECT klyn ap fnkshn ko smjhna nhayn: USEEFECT hak ayk safaiy fnkshn ko waps krskta hay jsay ajzaaa ghair mraaat ya jab anhasaar tbdyl hawta hay tou kaha jata haay۔yha smjhna zurwry hay keh mymwry lyk ya ghair aalanyha zumny asarat sy bchnay kay l this is safaiy kay fnkshn ko kis tarah sahayha tarykay sy astamal kya jaiay۔ ryast aur ryast kay ghair mntaky mntak ki aamyzash: kesi ayk jzaw kay andr ryasty aur astyt lys mntak ko mlanay sy prhayza kryn۔aghr kesi jzaw ko ryasty aur bay rya dono tarza aml ki zurwrt hawty hay tou ، isy mtadd ajzaaa main tksym karnay ya ryast ki mntak ko kstm hak main nkalnay par ghwr kryn۔ haks kay mnasb astamal ko ykyny bnanay aur un ghltaywn sy bchnay kay l reac ، ry aykt kay ahadydar kay zaryaha fraham krdha kwaad aur rhanma asawlwn ko achhy tarah smjhna bohat zurwry haay۔dstawyzaatmzayd braan ، aap kay ajzaaa aur haks kay liye tyst lkhnay sy kesi bhi mmknha msilay ko pkranay main mdd mil sakti hay aur yeh ykyny bn sakta hay keh aap kay haks twka kay mtaabk brtaؤ kryn۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw lkhyn jo rynj slykshn aur hasb zurwrt tarykh kay farmyts kay sath tarykh chnnay wala dkhata haay۔
Answer: ry aykt ayply kyshnza main zamha dar dayzaain ko snbhalnay main trtyb aur UI kay ajzaaa ko mkhtlf askryn saiza aur aalat par dahalna shaml haay۔rd aml main jwabdha trtyb bnanay kay liye kuch tknyk yeh hayn: sy ays ays mydaya kay swalat: askryn kay saiza ki bnyad par mkhtlf shylywn ko laghw karnay kay liye sy ays ays mydaya kay swalat ka astamal kryn۔aap mkhsawsa bryk pwaints kay liye mkhtlf sy ays ays kwaad ki wzuahat krsktay hain aur is kay mtaabk trtyb ، fwnt kay saiza ، wkfha kary ، ya kesi aur bsary phalw ko aydajst krsktay hayn۔ jwaby UI laibryrywn: bwtstryp ، mady UI ، ya tyl wnda CSS jesay zamha dar UI laibryrywn ka astamal karain ، jo pry blt fraham karty hayn۔zamha dar ajzaaa aur la aaؤt sstm۔an laibryrywn main aksar blt un rdaml ki khsawsayat hawty hain ، jesay ghrda sstm ، jwabdha nwa taip ، aur jwabdha bryk pwaints۔ sy ays ays ghrda aur flyks baks: sy ays ays ghrda aur flyks baks sy ays ays main taaktwr la aaؤt sstm hain jo zamha dar dayzaain bnanay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔wha aap ko lchkdar aur mthark trtyb ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dytay hain jo mkhtlf askryn saiza kay mtaabk dahaltay hayn۔an sy ays ays ki khsawsayat ko jwaby trtyb bnanay kay liye ry aykt kay klas nam ya astail prps kay sath astamal kryn۔ wyw pwrt ywnt: sy ays ays wyw pwrt ywnt ، jesay wy dablyw (wyw pwrt chwraaiy) aur wy aych (wyw pwrt awnchaiy) ، aap ko wyw pwrt saiza kay lhaaza sy saiza mrtb karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔aap un ka astamal askryn kay saiza ki bnyad par mtnasb tawr par ajzaaa ya kntynrza ko bnanay kay liye krsktay hayn۔ mshrwta ryndarngh: askryn saiza ya dyghr shraita ki bnyad par mshrwta tawr par mkhtlf ajzaaa ya anasar pysh karty hayn۔ry aykt ki wndaw۔ anr wdath ko askryn ki chwraaiy ko mthark tawr par taay karnay aur is kay mtaabk mkhtlf ryndarngh mntak ka atalak karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ jwaby laibryrywn: rdaml ko snbhalnay kay liye mtadd rd aml sy mtalk laibryryan dstyab hain ، jesay rd aml ، rd aml ، rdaml-jwaby ajzaaa ، ya rd aml ka rdaml۔zamha dar UI۔yha laibryryan aysay ajzaaa aur afadyt mhaya krty hain jo zamha dar dayzaain kay nfaza ko aasan bnaty hain ، bshmwl askryn saiza par mbny mydaya kay astfsar hayndalngh aur mshrwta ryndarngh۔ jwaby tarza aml kay liye haks: ywzaymydayakyry ya astamal wndawza jesay rd aml ko zayada prwghramaty andaza main zamha dar slwk ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha haks aap ko askryn kay saiza ki bnyad par ajzaaa ko mthark tawr par aydajst karnay ya mkhsawsa aamal ko mthark karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔as sy aap jawa askrpt mtghyrat ، afaal ، ya prps ka astamal karty hoey jwabdha astail bnanay ki ajazat dytay hain ، js sy jzawy mrkwza andaza main rdaml ko snbhalna aasan hawjata haay۔ yeh zurwry hay keh aap apnay mnsawbay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par ghwr karain aur un tknykwn ka antkhab karain jo aap ki zurwryat kay mtaabk hawn۔zamha dar dayzaain sy ays ays ، la aaؤt sstm ، mshrwta ryndarngh ، aur bazu awkat jawa askrpt mntak ka ayk mjmwaha haay۔an tknykwn ko laghw krkay ، aap zuaf apyl aur saarf dwst antrfys tshkyl dy saktay hain jo mkhtlf askryn saiza aur aalat kay mtaabk khwbsawrty sy apnatay hayn۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw bnaiyn jo drjha bndy kay nzaam ko hasb zurwrt shbyhayn aur haaf astar spwrt kay sath pysh krta haay۔
Answer:
rd aml ka syak wa sbak API ayk khsawsayt hay jo rd aml kay zaryaha fraham ki jati hay jo aap ko jzaw kay drkht ki hr staha par dsty tawr par prwps pas kyay baghair aalmy ryast ka antzaam karnay aur ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta shyir karnay ki shawlt dyty haay۔yha aadad wa shmar ko wazuha tawr par aadad wa shmar ko pas karnay kay liye antrmydayt ajzaaa ki zurwrt kay baghair jzaw kay drkht ko dayta ko mntkl karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔ rd aml kay syak wa sbak ka klydy tsawr tkhlyk kar tykst fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey syak wa sbak ki chyza ki tkhlyk haay۔as syak wa sbak kay aabjykt kay do ajzaaa is kay sath wabstha hayn: fraham knndha aur saarf۔ prwwydar: fraham knndha jzaw aadad wa shmar ya ryast ki frahamy kay liye zamha dar hay js ko mshtrkha karnay ki zurwrt haay۔yha jzaw kay drkht ki jra par rakha jata hay aur un ajzaaa ko lpytta hay jn ko mshtrkha aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔fraham knndha jzaw ayk wylyw prwp ko kbwl krta hay js main mshtrkha aadad wa shmar mwjwd hayn۔ saarf: saarfyn ka jzaw ajzaaa kay andr astamal hawta hay jn ko mshtrkha aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔yha un ajzaaa ko syak wa sbak ko sbskraib karnay aur mshtrkha aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔saarfyn ka jzaw ayk ryndar prwp pytrn ka astamal krta hay ، jahan mshtrkha aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy kay l a ayk bchay kay tawr par ayk fnkshn fraham kya jata haay۔ aalmy ryast kay antzaam kay liye rd aml syak wa sbak API ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay: JSXCOPY kwda // ayk syak wa sbak ki tshkyl myContext = react.createContext () ؛ // un ajzaaa ko lpytyn jn ko fraham knndha ayp () kay sath mshtrkha dayta tak rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty hay {CHEREDDATA = {pygham: 'haylw ، rd aml syak wa sbak!'} ؛wapsy ( ) ؛} // saarfyn ki tshkyl kay ajzaaa () {wapsy (
