Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo rynj kay antkhab aur hasb zurwrt andaza kay sath darygh aybl slaiydar dkhata haay۔
Answer: ry aykt srwr saiyda ryndarngh (ays ays aar) haaiydaryshn woh aml hay js kay zaryaha srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshn ko abtdaiy tawr par srwr par pysh karnay kay bad antrayktw klaint saiyda ayply kyshn main tbdyl krdya jata haay۔ jab koi ry aykt ayply kyshn srwr saiyda ki pysh ksh hay ، srwrHTML mwad tyar krta hay jo drkhwast ki abtdaiy haalt ki nmaindghy krta haay۔yha HTML mwad mؤkl ko bhyja jata hay aur braؤzar main pysh kya jata haay۔taham ، is mkam par ، mhaya kya gaya HTML abhi tak antrayktw nahin hay aur is kay sath koi aywnt hayndalr ya klaint saiyda ry aykt ajzaaa nahin hayn۔ ayply kyshn ko antrayktw bnanay kay liye ، rd aml ays ays aar haaiydaryshn rwnma hawta haay۔haaiydaryshn aywnt kay hayndalrza ko mnslk karnay ، jzaw kay drjha bndy ko trtyb denay ، aur mhaya krdha HTML ko klaint saiyda ry aykt kwda sy mrbwta karnay ka aml haay۔yha klaint saiyda ry aykt kwda ko mhaya krdha HTML par kabw panay aur ayply kyshn ki haalt aur antrayktywyty ka antzaam karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ haaiydaryshn kay aml kay doran ، rd aml srwr sy pysh krdha HTML ka mwazanha klaint saiyda ry aykt ajzaaa sy krta haay۔yha aywnt kay hayndalrza ko mnasb DOM anasar sy jwrata hay ، mwjwdha DOM dahanchay ko mhafwza rkhta hay ، aur zayada sy zayada srwr sy pysh krdha HTML ko dwbarha astamal krta haay۔rd aml ka tayn karnay kay liye bhi mfahamt ka kam anjam dyta hay takha ajzaaa kay drkht kay kon sy hasawn ko ap dayt karnay ki zurwrt haw۔ haaiydaryshn ka aml kiy wjwhaat ki bnaa par aham haay: trky psnd azuafha: ays ays aar haaiydaryshn drkhwast ko saarf ko jld sy jld astamal kay kabl aur antrayktw tjrbha fraham karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔srwr sy pysh krdha mwad fwry tawr par nzar aata hay aur klk karnay wala hay ، yahan tak keh klaint saiyda jawa askrpt ko bwjh daalta hay aur is sy zayada hawta haay۔ SEO aur asharyha sazay: srch anjn aur wyb kralr srwr sy pysh krdha mwad ko bhatr bna saktay hain kywnkha abtdaiy HTML pehlay hi dstyab haay۔as sy srch anjn aaptymaizayshn (SEO) ko bhatr bnaya jaskta hay aur dryaft main mdd mil sakti haay۔ rywsyblty۔as sy bwjh kay awkat aur bhatr karkrdghy ka baasa bn sakta haay۔ rd aml main ays ays aar haaiydaryshn ko anjam denay kay l you ، aap aam tawr par klaint ki taraf sy ry ayktdawm daat ryndar () tarykha kay bjaiay ry ayktdawm۔ haaidaryt () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔yha tarykha aywnt kay hayndalrza ko mnslk karnay aur srwr sy fraham krdha HTML ko klaint saiyda ry aykt ajzaaa kay sath msaalhat karnay kay liye rd aml ko btata haay۔ yahan ayk msaal hay keh ays ays aar haaiydaryshn ko ayk rd aml ki drkhwast main kis tarah anjam diya jata haay: JSXCOPY kwdaympwrt ry ayktdam 'ry aykt-dawm' ؛ ampwrt ayp sy draamd ayp sy draamd ayp sy draamd ayp sy draamd ayp say'./app' ؛// klaint saidar ay sy tydawm par srwr sy tyar krdha mwad ko haaiydaryt kryn۔kalngh ry ayktdawm۔klaint saiyda ry aykt ajzaaa ki antrayktywyty kay sath srwr saiyda ryndarngh kay fwaid ، tyza aur antrayktw saarf ka tjrbha fraham karty hayn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw lkhyn jo mthark tranzayshn kay sath twt janay wali saidabar mynw ko dkhata haay۔
Answer:
ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ryil taim apdayts ko snbhalnay aur braha rast dayta ka antzaam karnay kay l you ، aap apni mkhsawsa zurwryat kay mtaabk mkhtlf tknykwn aur laibryrywn ko astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly nktaha nzar hayn: wyb sakt mwasalat: wyb skat klaint aur srwr kay mabyn do tarfha mwasalaty chynl fraham karty hain ، js sy ryil taim ap dayt bhyjnay aur mwsawl hony ki ajazat hawty haay۔aap klaint aur srwr kay mabyn knkshn aur aykschynj dayta kaim karnay kay liye braha rast sakt.yw ya wyb sakt API jesay wyb sakt laibryrywn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ pwlngh: pwlngh main wkta fwkta ap dayt ki janch pratal kay liye srwr sy drkhwastyn karna shaml hayn۔aap bakaadghy sy wkfwn par drkhwastyn karnay kay liye ayksyws jesay syt antrwwl ya laibryrywn ka astamal krsktay hain ya bazayaft krsktay hayn۔taham ، mstkl pwlngh ghair zurwry nyt wrk tryfk pyda krskty haay۔as nktaha nzar ko bhatr bnanay kay l you ، aap langh pwlngh ko nafza krsktay hain ، jahan srwr drkhwast ko khla rkhta hay jab tak keh waps bhyjnay kay liye koi tazaha kary nah haw۔ syrwr synt aywnts (ays ays ay): ays ays ay ayk ghair mstkym mwasalat ki tknyk hay jahan srwr klaint ko ap dayt ko aaghay brahata haay۔ayk hi HTTP knkshn۔mwkl ays ays ay akhttamy nktaha par sbskraib krta hay ، aur jab bhi nya dayta hawta hay tou srwr wakaat bhyjta haay۔braؤzarza ya laibryrywn main aywnts swrs API jesay aywnts swrs ya sys chynl ko SSE.Push atalaaat ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay: agar aap ko srwr sy klaint ko ryil taim ap dayt bhyjnay ki zurwrt hay tou ، aap fair bys klaؤda mysjngh (ayf sy aym) jesay psh nwtyfykyshn srwsza ko astamal krsktay hayn۔pshryha khdmat aap ko ghahakwn ko atalaaat ya pyghamat bhyjnay aur ryil taim apdayts ko mwsar tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔ jab un ryil taim tknykwn ko ry aykt ayply kyshnza main zum karnay ki bat aaty hay tou ، aap aam tawr par laif saiykl kay tarykwn ، haks ، ya srshar laibryrywn ka astamal karty hayn۔wyb sakt mwasalat ka astamal karty hoey yahan ayk aasan msaal haay: JSXCOPY kwdaympwrt ry aykt ، {USEEFFECT ، 'REACT' sy 'react' ؛ CONST WEBSOCTCOMPOINTER = () => {CONST [pygham ، SETMessage] = usestate ('') ؛useeffect (() => {const sakt = nya wyb sakt ('wss: //example.com') ؛ sakt.wnwpyn = () => {knswl.lagh ('wyb sakt knkshn kaim') ؛} ؛ sakt.an mysyj =wakaha => {setMessage (aywnt.dayta) ؛} ؛ sakt.awnklwza = () => {knswl.lagh ('wyb sakt knkshn bnd') ؛} ؛ wapsy () => {sakt.klwza () ؛} ؛} ؛} ؛، []) ؛waps
{pygham}
؛} default dayfalt wyb sakt kampynt braamd karain ؛ is msaal main ، wyb sakt kampynt yw ays ay ayfykt hak ka astamal karty hoey ayk wyb sakt knkshn kaim krta haay۔yha aanay waly pyghamat ko snta hay aur isi kay mtaabk ryast ko ap dayt krta haay۔jb jzaw ka mkablha nahin hawta hay tou ، mymwry lyk ko rwknay kay liye wyb sakt knkshn band hawjata haay۔ ghltay kay mnzarnamwn ، dwbarha rabtaha kaim karnay ، twsayk ، aur aap kay mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlay par mbny dyghr mtalkha thafzaat ko snbhalnay kay liye yad rkhyn۔ awwr ، ry aykt ayply kyshnza main ryil taim apdayts ko snbhalnay main mnasb antkhab karna shaml haay۔tknyk aur blt un braؤzar APIs ، laibryrywn ، ya khdmat ka astamal karty hoey zurwry mntak ko nafza karna ، js main koi knkshn kaim kya jaskay ، dayta bhyjyn/wsawl karain ، aur isi kay mtaabk UI ko ap dayt kryn۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo fail ap lwdar ko darygh aur darap spwrt aur fail ki twsayk kay sath pysh krta haay۔
Answer: haks kay sath ry aykt fnkshnl ajzaaa rwayty tabkaty ajzaaa kay mkablay main rd aml main ajzaaa lkhnay kay liye ayk nya nktaha nzar hayn۔fnkshnl ajzaaa jawa askrpt kay afaal hain jo UI ki wzuahat kay liye JSX waps karty hayn۔haks aysay afaal hain jo astyt mynjmnt aur fnkshnl ajzaaa main azuafy khsawsayat ko ahal bnatay hayn۔klas ajzaaa sy zayada haks kay sath fnkshnl ajzaaa kay astamal kay kuch fwaid yeh hayn: sadghy aur prahnay ki ahalyt: haks waly fnkshnl ajzaaa main ayk aasan nhaw hawta hay aur klas ajzaaa kay mkablay main smjhnay aur prahnay main aasany hawty haay۔wha wakf fnkshn dayklryshn nhaw ki pyrwy karty hain ، js sy kwda ko zayada jama aur bwailrplyt ko kam kya jata haay۔ koi 'yha' pabnd nhayn: tabkaty ajzaaa main ، aap ko aksar is ko prwps ، ryast ya msaal kay tarykwn tak rsaiy kay l use astamal karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔haks kay sath fnkshnl ajzaaa ko is kay astamal ki zurwrt nahin hawty hay ، js sy kwda ko ghltaywn ka kam khtarha hawta hay aur syak wa sbak kay baray main aljhn ko kam kya jata haay۔ karkrdghy ki karkrdghy: haks waly fnkshnl ajzaaa haks ki bhatr nwayt ki wjha sy bhatr karkrdghy ka mzaaharha karty hayn۔haks ryasty tazaha karywn par zayada sy zayada kntrwl par kabw panay ، ghair zurwry dwbarha pysh karnay walon sy prhayza karnay ، aur bhatr asalaha kay mwaka ko kabl bnanay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ kwda tnzaym: haks kesi jzaw kay andr mtalkha faalyt ko mnzam karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham karty hayn۔usestate ، useefefect ، aur USEContext jesay haks kay sath ، aap mntaky tawr par ghrwp aur alag alag khdshat ko alag krsktay hain ، js sy kwda bys ko zayada madaywlr aur brkrar rkhnay ka ahatmam kya jaskta haay۔ ayk tjrbha: haks waly fnkshnl ajzaaa aam tawr par klas kay ajzaaa kay mkablay main janch karna aasan hayn۔chwnkha haks afaal hain ، lhazaa aap un ko aazaadanha tawr par janch saktay hain aur kesi pychydha tystngh syt ap ya mzaak karnay waly msaal kay tarykwn ki zurwrt kay baghair ywnt tyst lkh saktay hayn۔ fnkshnl kmpwzayshn: fnkshnl ajzaaa kdrty tawr par khud ko fnkshnl sakht par krzu dytay hain ، jahan aap aasany sy chhwtay ajzaaa ko mil kar tyar krsktay hain takha mazeed tkhlyk krskyn۔pychydhaas sy kwda ki dwbarha astamal aur khdshat ki alyhadghy ko frwgh mlta haay۔ haaks API: rd aml mtadd blt un haks jesay ywsstyt ، yw ays ay ay ayf ay sy ty ، yw ays sy tnt ، aur bohat kuch fraham krta haay۔yha haks ryast ko snbhalnay ، zumny asarat ko snbhalnay ، syak wa sbak tak rsaiy haasal karnay aur ajzaaa ki zandghy kay sath kam karnay kay liye aam astamal kay maamlat ka ahaataha karty hayn۔haks ayk zayada faal prwghramngh astail ko kabl bnatay hain aur aap ko aaly aardar kay ajzaaa ki zurwrt kay baghair mntak ko ankpwlyt karnay ki ajazat dytay hain ya prwp ko pysh karty hayn۔wha sadghy ، bhatr karkrdghy ، bhatr kwda tnzaym ، aur aasan janch pysh karty hayn۔haks ki brahty hui mkbwlyt kay sath ، ry aykt kmywnty faal ajzaaa ko ry aykt ajzaaa lkhnay kay trjyhay tarykha kay tawr par astamal karnay ki taraf brah hogi haay۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw ko nafza karain jo aydajst asplt tnasb aur kam sy km/zayadha sy zayada hadwd kay sath ayk bhaaly shuda asplt pyn ko dkhata haay۔
Answer: kabl rsaiy ry aykt ayply kyshnza ki tamyr yeh ykyny bnanay kay liye bohat zurwry hay keh tamam saarfyn ، bshmwl mazawr afrad ، aap ki drkhwast tak rsaiy aur astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch rd aml kabl rsaiy bhatryn tarykwn aur tknyk hayn: symntk aych ty aym ayl ka astamal kryn: apni drkhwast ko bamksad dahanchha aur syak wa sbak fraham karnay kay liye symntk aych ty aym ayl anasar (<Heder> ، <vav> ، <myn> ، <sykshn> ، wghyrha) ka astamal kryn۔as sy maawn tyknalwjyza ko mwad ko smjhnay aur saarfyn kay liye nywyghyshn ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mlty haay۔ tsaawyr kay l alternative mtbadl mtn: tsaawyr kay liye wzuahaty ALT safat shaml karain takha mtbadl mtn fraham kya jaskay jo tsawyr kay mwad ko byan krta haay۔yha un saarfyn kay liye aham hay jo askryn kay kariyn par anhasaar karty hain ya un ki tsaawyr ko ghair faal krsktay hayn۔ mynj fwks: is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh saarfyn aap ki drkhwast kay zaryaay tshryf latay hi fwks ka sahayha tarykay sy antzaam aur mriy haay۔fwks aardar ko kntrwl karnay kay liye tybyndayks wsaf ka astamal karain ، aur sy ays ays astail ya fwks asharay kay sath mrkwza anasar ko ajaghr kryn۔ ki bwrda nywyghyshn ko hayndal kryn: is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh aap ki bwrda sirf ki bwrda ka astamal karty hoey mkml tawr par kabl aml haay۔mkhtlf ajzaaa aur antrayktw anasar ، jesay btn ، lnks ، aur farm kntrwl kay zaryaay ki bwrda nywyghyshn ki janch kryn۔ aay aar aai aay kay krdar aur awsaaf astamal kryn: maawn tyknalwjyza ko azuafy rsai ki malwmat fraham karnay kay liye aay aar aai aay (kabl rsaiy amyr antrnyt ayply kyshnza) kay krdar aur awsaaf ka astamal kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، anasar kay liye ayk wzuahaty lybl fraham karnay kay liye aay aar aai aay lybl wsaf ka astamal karain jo un kay mshmwlat kay zaryaha mnasb tawr par byan nahin kyay jatay hayn۔ mthark mwad ka antzaam kryn: agar aap ki ayply kyshn mthark tawr par tazaha kary krty hay ya mwad ko pysh krty hay tou ، is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh is ka sahayha tawr par askryn kariyn ko aalan kya gaya haay۔saarfyn ko tbdylywn aur tazaha karywn kay baray main mtala karnay kay liye aryha laiyw ryjnza ya mnasb tknyk ka astamal kryn۔ wazuha aur wzuahaty ghltay kay pyghamat fraham kryn: is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh ghltay kay pyghamat wazuha ، wzuahaty aur smjhnay main aasan hayn۔mazawr saarfyn ko malwmaty ghltay kay pyghamat mwsawl honi chahaiyn jo un kay samna karnay waly kesi bhi msilay ko smjhnay aur isy drst karnay main un ki mdd krty hayn۔ askryn rydarza kay sath tyst: kesi bhi kabl rsai kay msail ki nshandhay karnay kay liye askryn rydarza kay sath bakaadghy sy apni drkhwast ki janch kryn۔askryn kay kariyn jesay NVDA (ghyr wywzal daysk tap rsaiy) aur wais awwr (mykws/aaiy aw ays kay liay) aap ko yeh smjhnay main mdd krsktay hain keh aap ki drkhwast ko bsary khraby waly saarfyn kay zaryaha kis tarah tjrbha kya jata haay۔ rngh kay braks: is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh aap ki ayply kyshn main mtn aur ps mnzar kay anasar kay mabyn rngh ka kafy frk haay۔as sy saarfyn ko kam wzen ya rnghyn andha pn waly mwad ko prahnay aur smjhnay main mdd mlty haay۔apnay dayzaain kay braks tnasb ko janchnay kay liye rngh kay braks twlza ya plgh un ka astamal kryn۔ kabl rsaiy farm: is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh mnasb lybl ، ghltay kay pyghamat aur wazuha hadayat fraham krkay farm kabl rsaiy hayn۔askryn kay kariyn ko farm kay dahanchay ko smjhnay kay l seam aasan bnanay kay l sen symntk farm anasar aur is sy wabstha lyblwn ka astamal kryn۔ malwmat ko phanchanay kay liye sirf rngh ka astamal karty hawiay: is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh malwmat ko mkml tawr par rngh kay zaryaay nahin phanchaya gaya haay۔aham malwmat ko bat chyt karnay kay liye azuafy asharay jesay shbyhayn ، mtn ، ya nmwnay fraham kryn۔ dstawyza ki rsai ki khsawsayat: kabl rsa byan ya dstawyzaat shaml karain jo aap ki drkhwast ki rsai ki khsawsayat aur faalyt ka khakha pysh krta haay۔as sy saarfyn ko rsai ki hamayt ki staha aur kesi bhi mmknha hadwd ko smjhnay main mdd mlty haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh un tarykwn ka atalak nah sirf rd aml blkha aam tawr par wyb dawylpmnt par hawta haay۔rd aml un bhatryn tarykwn ko mؤsar tarykay sy nafza karnay kay l tools twlza aur lchk fraham krta haay۔mzayd braan ، rsai par mbny laibryrywn aur twlza jesay ry aykt ayrya ، ry aykt-rwtr dawm (kabl rsaiy rwtngh kay liay) ، ya khwdkar rsai kay chykwn kay liye ayks kwr jesay kabl rsa tystngh twlza ko shaml karnay par ghwr kryn۔ yaddasht ayk jary kwshsh hay ، aur yeh bat haay۔aap kay rd aml ki drkhwast ki rsai ko ykyny bnanay kay l user saarf ki janch aur aaraa main mazawr saarfyn ko shaml karnay kay liye aham haay۔

Question: ayk rd aml ka jzaw lkhyn jo saarf kay un pt aur ghltay kay pyghamat par mbny mthark twsayk kay sath ayk farm dkhata haay۔
Answer: srwr saiyda ryndarda (ays ays aar) ry aykt ayply kyshnza main kwda aspltngh aur sst lwdangh ko snbhalnay kay liye klaint saiyda ryndarda ayply kyshnza kay mkablay main kdray mkhtlf nktaha nzar ki zurwrt hawty haay۔yhaan ayk amwmy khakha hay keh aap ays ays aar ry aykt ayply kyshnza main kwda tksym aur sst lwdangh ko kis tarah snbhal saktay hayn: kwda tksym karnay waly pwaints ki shnakht kryn: apni drkhwast kay un hasawn ki shnakht karain jo alag alag hasawn main tksym hawsktay hayn۔yha aap kay kwda bys kay ajzaaa ، rastay ، ya aap kay kwda bys ki koi dusri mntaky tksym hawskty hayn۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh hr asplt pwaint ko ayk alyhadha jawa askrpt bndal kay tawr par bhry hui haay۔yha laibryryan ajzaaa ko ghair mtzalzal tawr par lwda karnay ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krty hayn۔ srwr saiyda ryndarngh hakmt amly tyar kryn: ays ays aar main ، aap ko yeh ykyny bnana hoga keh srwr par mtalwbha bndal bhry hui hain aur abtdaiy HTML rdaml kay sath bhyjay gaye hayn۔as ko haasal karnay ka ayk tarykha yeh hay keh srwr par mthark draamd ka astamal krkay aur mtalwbha madaywl haasal karnay kay ntyjay main waday ko hal kya jaiay۔ klaint aur srwr bndal lwdangh ko snwin bnaiyn: is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye keh klaint aur srwr par wahi hasaha bhry hui hay ، aap ko hum aahanghy ki zurwrt haaybndal lwdangh ka aml۔ayk nktaha nzar yeh hay keh srwr par bhry hui bndalyn nkalyn aur un kay hawalha jat klaint ko bhyjyn ، jo phir inhain dwbarha daaؤn lwda karnay sy bchnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔ mtalwbha bndal ko pehlay sy lwda kryn: lwdangh kay tjrbay ko bhatr bnanay kay l you ، aap mtalwbha tkwyt ko astamal krsktay hain ya mtalwbha tknyk astamal krsktay hayn۔mؤkl par bndal۔as sy sst bwjh waly rastwn ya ajzaaa par tshryf la janay par takhyr ko kam karnay main mdd mlty haay۔ ghltayan: kwda tksym karnay ya sst lwdangh kay aml kay doran hony wali kesi bhi ghltaywn ko mnasb tarykay sy snbhalyn۔msaal kay tawr par ، agar koi mtalwbha bndal lwda karnay main nakam hawjata hay tou ، aap fal byk UI zaahar krsktay hain ya saarf ko ayk ghltay ka pygham fraham krsktay hayn۔ tyst aur asalaha kryn: apnay ays ays aar ki ayply kyshn ko achhy tarah sy janchyn takha is bat ka ykyn kya jaskay keh sst bhry hui ajzaaa ya rastwn ko sahayha tarykay sy pysh kya jaiay۔mzayd braan ، mjmway tawr par bndal saiza ko kam sy kam karnay aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay l code kwda tksym karnay wali trtyb aur CHUNK saiza ko bhatr bnaiyn۔ yeh bat kabl zakr hay keh ays ays aar ry aykt ayply kyshnza main kwda tksym aur sst lwdangh ayk pychydha kam hawskta haay۔laibryryan jesi laibryryan ، rd aml kay liye ayk mshhawr ays ays aar frym wrk ، kwda tksym karnay aur sst lwdangh kay liye blt un spwrt fraham krty hain ، js sy ays ays aar mahawl main un khsawsayat ko nafza karna aasan hawjata haay۔aghla. jay ays safhaha kay rastwn par mbny khwdkar kwda tksym karnay ki pysh ksh krta hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh hr safhaay kay liye sirf zurwry kwda bhry hui haay۔ un tknykwn ko mlazamt denay sy ، aap apnay srwr saiyda ryndarda ry aykt ayply kyshnza main mwsar kwda tksym aur sst lwdangh haasal krsktay hain ، js kay ntyjay main bhatr hoa haay۔karkrdghy aur kam abtdaiy bndal saiza۔

Question: ayk ry aykt jzaw bnaiyn jo ayk ksayr staha kay aykardayn mynw ko twsya aur ghrnay ki faalyt kay sath pysh krta haay۔
Answer: rd aml main ، kntrwl shuda aur bay kabw ajzaaa farm un pt aur un sy wabstha ryast kay antzaam kay l two do mkhtlf nktaha nzar hayn۔ kntrwl shuda ajzaaa: kntrwl shuda ajzaaa main ، farm un pt anasar (jysay <an pt> ، <tykstyrya> ، ya <slykt>) mkml tawr par kntrwl hawtay hayn۔rd aml kay zaryahaajzaaa ki ryast ya prps ko un pt ki mwjwdha kymt par nzar rkhnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur un pt wylyw main kesi bhi tbdyly ko aywnt hayndalrza kay zaryaha snbhala jata haay۔ un pt ansar ka astamal karty hoey ayk kntrwl shuda jzaw ki ayk msaal haay: JSXCOPY kwdaklas kntrwl kntrwlda kampynt react.com knstrkchr {knstrkchr {knstrktwr۔(prwps) {spr (prwps) ؛this.state = {an pt wylyw: '' ،} ؛} hayndalchynj (wakaha) {this.setState ({an pt wylyw: aywnt.tarjt.Value}) ؛} ryndar () {wapsy (<an pt ki ksm = "mtn" kdr = {this.state.inputValue} onchange = {this.handlechange.bind (yha)} />) ؛}} is msaal main ، un pt ansar ki kdr ajzaaa ki haalt (this.state.inputValue) sy akhza ki hogi hay ، aur un pt wylyw main koi tbdyly ryast ko ap dayt karnay kay liye hayndal chynj kay tarykha kar ko mthark krty haay۔ kntrwl ajzaaa kay liye maamlat ka astamal kryn: aam tawr par kntrwl shuda ajzaaa haynjb aap ko farm un pt par mkml kntrwl ki zurwrt hawty hay aur jzaw ki haalt main un pt ki kymt ko brkrar rkhna chahti hayn۔kntrwl shuda ajzaaa un mnzarnamwn main mfyd hain jahan aap ko twsayk karnay ، un pt wylyw ki bnyad par kstm slwk ko nafza karnay ، ya mtadd farm un pt ko ayk sath hum aahangh karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ ghair mtnazaaha ajzaaa: is kay braks ، bay kabw ajzaaa apni ryast ko andrwny tawr par brkrar rkhnay ki ajazat dytay hain ، baghair ،rd aml kay zaryaha wazuha kntrwl ki zurwrt haay۔aap ab bhi DOM APIs ka astamal karty hoey un pt akdar tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hain ، lekin rd aml un pt ryast ko tryk ya un ka nzam nahin krta haay۔ yahan un pt ansar ka astamal karty hoey kesi bay kabw jzaw ki ayk msaal haay: JSXCOPY CODECLASS UNTOROLLEDCOMPONENT twsya krta haay۔rwk tham dayfalt () ؛kanst un pt wylyw = this.inputref.value ؛// zurwrt kay mtaabk un pt wylyw ka astamal kryn} ryndar () {rytrn (<farm aanswbyt = {this.handlesubmit.bind (yha)}> <an pt taip = "tykst" ryf = {(ryf) => (this.inputref =ryf)}/> <btn ki ksm = "jma krwaiyn"> jma karain </btn> </farm>) ؛}} is msaal main ، un pt ansar ki kdr ko jzaw ki haalt main antzaam karnay ki bjaiay ryf (this.inputref.value) ka astamal karty hoey haasal kya jata haay۔farm jma kranay ko hayndalyswbyt kay tarykha kar kay zaryaha snbhala jata haay۔ bay kabw ajzaaa kay l cases maamlat ka astamal kryn: ghair mtnasb ajzaaa aam tawr par is wkt astamal hawtay hain jab aap aasan nktaha nzar chahti hain aur mtadd farm un pt kay mabyn wsya pymanay par twsayk ya hum aahanghy ko anjam denay ki zurwrt nahin haay۔bay kabw ajzaaa aasan shklwn ya maamlat kay l useful mfyd saabt hawsktay hain jahan aap ko ryasty antzaam ki zurwrt kay baghair un pt akdar tak fwry rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ dono kntrwl aur bay kabw ajzaaa kay apnay astamal kay maamlat hawtay hain ، aur antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hawta haay۔kntrwl shuda ajzaaa zayada kntrwl fraham karty hain aur pychydha farm hayndalngh ki ajazat dytay hain ، jabky bay kabw ajzaaa bnyady shklwn kay liye sadghy aur shawlt pysh karty hain ya un pt akdar tak fwry rsaiy۔

Question: ayk rd aml kay jzaw ko nafza karain jo mrzuy kay mtaabk akdamat aur shylywn kay sath mlty mrhalha kay aml kay liye pyshrft kay asharay ko zaahar krta haay۔
Answer: rd aml fast ryfrysh rd aml main ayk khsawsayt hay js ka mksad trky kay doran tyza aur mwsar haat madaywl ryplysmnt (aych aym aar) ko chalw krkay trkyaty tjrbay ko bhatr bnana haay۔as sy dawylprza ko braؤzar main apnay kwda main hony wali tbdylyan dykhnay ki ajazat mlty hay baghair kesi poray safhaay ki tazaha kary ki zurwrt hawty hay ya jzaw ki haalt ko khwnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ yahan rd aml fast ryfrysh kay baray main kuch aham nkat hayn: haat madaywl ki tbdyly (HMR): tyza rftar ryfrysh bywryjza par rd aml ka azahaar kryn۔bndalrza kay zaryaha fraham krdha HMR salahaytyn jo baghair kesi mkml dwbarha lwda kay chlanay wali ayply kyshn main tbdyl shuda madaywlza ko ap dayt karnay kay liye fraham krty hayn۔yha ajzaaa ki haalt ko mhafwza rkhta hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh aap apni mwjwdha haalt ko khwnay kay baghair apni drkhwast par kam jary rakh saktay hayn۔ aaraa ki raiay lwp: tyza rftar ryfrysh kay sath ، aap apnay rd aml kay ajzaaa ، sy ays ays astail ، ya dyghr mtalkha failwn main jo tbdylyan karty hain woh fwry tawr par hawtay hayn۔braؤzar main jhlkta haay۔as sy trky kay doran antzaar kay wkt ko nmayan tawr par kam kya jata hay ، js sy aap ko apnay kwda main tbdyly kay asarat ko fwry tawr par dykhnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ ajzaaa ki haalt ko pysh krta haay: rd aml tyza rftar ryfrysh kwda ki tazaha karywn kay doran aap kay ajzaaa ki haalt ko brkrar rkhta haay۔jb kesi tbdyly ka ptha chlta hay tou ، sirf mtasarha jzaw ko ap dayt kya jata hay ، jabky baky drkhwast aur is ki ryast brkrar rhaty haay۔yha aap ki mwjwdha ayply kyshn ki haalt ko khwnay kay baghair hamwar trky kay tjrbay ko ykyny bnata haay۔ kam karnay waly fnkshnl ajzaaa aur haks: rd aml tyza ryfrysh dono klas ajzaaa aur faal ajzaaa kay sath achhy tarah sy kam krta hay ، jn main ry aykt haks astamal karnay waly afrad bhi shaml hayn۔as sy yeh jdyd rd aml ki trky kay tarykwn kay l suitable mwzawn hawta hay aur dawylprza ko fast kwda ki tazaha karywn sy ltaf andwza hawtay hoey fnkshnl ajzaaa aur haks kay fwaid ka faidha athanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ ayrr rwadary: rd aml fast ryfrysh ko ghltay sy brdasht karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh yeh kuch khasa ksm sy bazayaft hawskta haay۔ghltayan aur drkhwast ko ap dayt karna jary rkhyn۔as sy baghair kesi poray safhaay par dwbarha lwda ki zurwrt kay ghltaywn ko pkranay aur thyk karnay main mdd mlty haay۔ tyzay sy ryfrysh ka astamal karty hoey ، dawylpr trkyaty aml kay doran zayada mwsar aur tyzay sy tkrar krsktay hayn۔yha dsty trwtazaha par khrch hony wala wkt kam krta hay ، pydawry ko bhatr bnata hay ، aur mjmway tawr par trky ka ayk hamwar tjrbha fraham krta haay۔rd aml fast ryfrysh ko aam tawr par trky kay twlza jesay wyb pyk aur bndalr knfyghryshn kay sath mil kar astamal kya jata hay jo zayada sy zayada ntaij ko haasal karnay kay liye HMR ki hamayt karty hayn۔
